================================================================================
Question #1 (ID: 474678)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] ক্রমবর্ধমান?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\left(x^{2}+1\right) \times 1-x \times 2 x}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের জন্য [math]f'(x) > 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|^{2}<1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\mathrm{x}|<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1<\mathrm{x}<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ব্যবধি [math]= (-1, 1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #2 (ID: 474679)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2006-2007, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]g(f(-2))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|[/math]
 [math]=4-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(0)=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #3 (ID: 474680)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\infty

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবেযখন, [math]4-x 
otin 0 \Rightarrow 4-x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-4<0 \Rightarrow x<4[/math]
ডোমেন [math](-\infty, 4)[/math]
 বা [math]-\inftyআবার, [math]4-x=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=\frac{4 y^{2}-1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]y≠0[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]0

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #4 (ID: 474681)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}}[/math] বাস্তব ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-2
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<1 / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x<-2 \& x>2,-2


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-4<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|<2 \text { : }=2[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]I=-2[math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=f(0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত যখন, [math]-2<\mathrm{x}<2, \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]=y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #5 (ID: 474682)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #6 (ID: 474683)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #7 (ID: 474684)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \ln(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. (0,1)
খ. (0,∞)
গ. (−∞, ∞)
ঘ. (−∞, 0)


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\ln(x)[/math]
 কেবল ধনাত্মক সংখ্যার জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত। তাই [math]x > 0[/math]
 হলে [math]\ln(x)[/math]
 এর মান বাস্তব হয়। সেজন্য ডোমেন হবে [math](0, ∞)[/math]
।

Explanation:

Question #8 (ID: 474685)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\left|x^2 + 1\right| < 10[/math] এর সমাধান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3 < x < 3[/math]
খ. [math]-3 \leq x < 3[/math]
গ. [math]-3 < x \leq 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^2 + 1 < 10 \Rightarrow x^2 < 9 \Rightarrow -3 < x < 3[/math]
। এখানে [math]x[/math]
 এর পরিসীমা খোলা রাশি, তাই শুধুমাত্র অপশন (১) সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #9 (ID: 474686)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বক্ররেখার বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y = 4x - 5[/math]
খ. [math]y = -4x - 5[/math]
গ. [math]y = 4x + 5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4y + x = 14[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]dy/dx[/math]
 থেকে পাওয়া ঢাল যদি [math]4[/math]
 হয়, তবে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ হবে [math]y = 4x + C[/math]
। [math]y = 4x - 5[/math]
 একমাত্র বাস্তবসম্মত বিকল্প।

Explanation:

Question #10 (ID: 474687)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}[/math] হলে [math]g(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7 x-12}{24 x+79}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9 x-4}{6 x+7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x-10}{21 x+80}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7 x+6}{24 x+79}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{7 x-12}{24 x+79}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}[/math]
 [math]g(g(x))=\frac{3 \cdot \frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}-1}{2 \cdot \frac{3 x-1}{2x + 9}+9}=\frac{9 x-3-2 x-9}{6 x-2+18 x+81}=\frac{7 x-12}{24 x+79}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #11 (ID: 474688)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
f(x) একটি ফাংশন, যখন f: R → R, তাহলে এর ডোমেইন এবং রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\infty , \infty[/math]
খ. R, R
গ. R {4}, R
ঘ. R\{4}, R\{8}


Correct Answer: D.R\{4}, R\{8}

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}=\frac{x^{2}-4^{2}}{x-4}[/math]
f(x) সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি x - 4 [math]
eq[/math]
 0 ⇒ x [math]
eq[/math]
 4[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R - {4} = R\{4}রেঞ্জ R - {2 × 4} = R - {8} = R \{8}$

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #12 (ID: 474689)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{3 - x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হবে

Options:
ক. [math][0,3)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
গ. [math][3, +\infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, +\infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{3 - x}[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হওয়ার জন্য [math]3 - x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 3[/math]
। তাই ডোমেন: [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
।

Explanation:

Question #13 (ID: 474690)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = x^2 + 4[/math], [math]g(x) = 2x + 1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(2))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. 17
B. 16
C. 27
D. 29


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]g(2) = 5[/math]
, [math]f(5) = 25 + 4 = 29[/math]

Question #14 (ID: 474691)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ফাংশনটি [math]f(x) = f(-x)[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=x^{2}-3[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=x^{2}-3[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=|x|[/math]
ঘ. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: D.সবগুলো

Solution:
Option A হতে, [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}-3[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-3=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\text { (B) } f(x)=\cos x+2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-x)=\cos (-x)+2[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+2=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\text { (C) } f(x)=|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-x)=|x|=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #15 (ID: 474692)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]f: x \rightarrow x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{go}(f(0)[/math] -এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]22[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]30[/math]
D. [math]34[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]22[/math]

Solution:
[math]go f(0) =g(f(0)=g(0+3)[/math]
 [math]=g(3)=3^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\times 3+4[/math]
 [math]=9+9+4=22[/math]


Explanation:

Question #16 (ID: 474693)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #17 (ID: 474694)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbf{R}-[5,5][/math]
খ. [math]\mathbf{R}-[-5,5][/math]
গ. [math]R[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: D.কোনোটিই নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]25-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-25<0 \Rightarrow(x+5)(x-5)<0 \Rightarrow(-5,5)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = (-5, 5)

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #18 (ID: 474695)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}-1}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\infty[/math]
খ. [math]R[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbf{R}+\{1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\mathbf{R}-\{-1,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]\mathrm{x}^{2}-1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2} 
eq 1 \therefore \mathrm{x} 
eq \pm 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R - {-1, 1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

গ. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left[-\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{2}\right][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 x এর ডোমেন = [-1,1] এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=\left[-\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{2}\right][/math]

Question #21 (ID: 474698)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math] হলে [math]f(x-2)[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 1, x \geq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x≥1[/math]
গ. [math]x≤3[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \geq 1, x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \leq 1, x \geq 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি [math]x^{2}-4 x+3 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-1)(x-3) \geq 0 \Rightarrow x-3 \geq 0[/math]
 অথবা [math]x-1 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 অথবা [math]x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]x \geq 3, x \leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #22 (ID: 474699)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2} ; f(x)[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 \sin x \cos x-8 \sin x \cos x=-2 \sin x \cos x=-\sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2 \cos 2 x\end{array}[/math]
লঘু-গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin 2 x=0 \Rightarrow 2 x=0, \pi \quad \therefore x=0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(0)=-20 \text {, }[/math]
 লঘুমান বা সর্ব নিম্নমান হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান = [math]3 \sin ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}+4 \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #23 (ID: 474700)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x: x^{2}-5 x+6=0\right\}[/math] এবং [math]T=\left\{x: x^{2}-11 x+24=0\right\}[/math] হলে, [math]s \cap T[/math] এবং [math]T - S[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]\{2,3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
B. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{2\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
D. [math]\{8\}[/math] এবং [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]

Solution:
S এর জন্য , [math]x^{2}-5 x+6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,3[/math]
 [math]\therefore S=\{2,3\}[/math]
আবার T এর জন্য, [math]x^{2}-11 x+24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-8)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=3,8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{S} \cap \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{2,3\} \cap\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3\}[/math]
এবং [math]\mathrm{T}-\mathrm{S}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}-\{2,3\}[/math]
 [math]=\{8\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #24 (ID: 474701)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\cot ^{-1} \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}\left(\cot ^{-} \frac{3}{4}\right) =\cos \left(\cot ^{-1} \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos \cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{5}=\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #25 (ID: 474702)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)-f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}+x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})-\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}+\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}-\mathrm{x}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #26 (ID: 474703)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #27 (ID: 474704)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x: x^{2}-5 x+6=0\right\}[/math] এবং [math]T=\left\{x: x^{2}-11 x+24=0\right\}[/math] হলে, [math]s \cap T[/math] এবং [math]T - S[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]\{2,3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
B. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{2\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
D. [math]\{8\}[/math] এবং [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]

Solution:
S এর জন্য , [math]x^{2}-5 x+6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,3[/math]
 [math]\therefore S=\{2,3\}[/math]
আবার T এর জন্য, [math]x^{2}-11 x+24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-8)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=3,8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{S} \cap \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{2,3\} \cap\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3\}[/math]
এবং [math]\mathrm{T}-\mathrm{S}[/math]

 [math]=\{8\}[/math]

Question #28 (ID: 474705)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] g(f(3)) এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]24[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(3))[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(2 \times 3-1)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(5)[/math]
 [math]=5^{2}-1[/math]
 [math]=25-1=24[/math]


Explanation:

Question #29 (ID: 474706)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log \sqrt{x^{2}-49}[/math] ফাংশন এর ডোমেন কোনটি? যেখানে x একটি ধনাত্মক সংখ্যা।

Options:
ক. [math][7, \infty][/math]
খ. [math](7, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][49,0][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 7][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](7, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log \sqrt{x^{2}-49}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে ।যখন [math]x^{2}-49>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}>49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|^{2}>49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|>7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x>7[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math](7,∞)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #30 (ID: 474707)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log \sin x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 x \cot x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\cos x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\log \sin x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}} \times \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #31 (ID: 474708)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2} e^{-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2} e^{x}[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{e^{-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{-x}}} \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{-x}}} \times\left(-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2} e^{-\frac{x}{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2, g(x)=2 x+5[/math] হলে, [math](\mathrm{gof})(-2)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-11[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(-2)=-8[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{gol}(-2)=g(-8)=-16+5=-11[/math]

Question #34 (ID: 474711)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x \in \mathbb{R}[/math] এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math] হলে, [math]f o g^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{g(x)-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore g^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-2}{3} ;[/math]
 [math]g^{-1}(2)=0 ; f(0)=-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #35 (ID: 474712)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{7}+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #36 (ID: 474713)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S[/math] ও [math]T[/math] যে কোনো দুইটি সেট এবং [math]S^{c}[/math] হলো S এর পুরক সেট। [math]\mathbf{T}-\mathbf{S}^{\mathrm{c}}[/math] এর মান কতা

Options:
ক. [math]S \cup T^{c}[/math]
খ. [math]S \cap T[/math]
গ. [math]S^{c}-T[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{S}^{\mathrm{c}} \cap \mathrm{T}^{\mathfrak{c}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]S \cap T[/math]

Solution:
[math]T-S^{c}=T \cap\left(S^{c}\right)^{c}=T \cap S=S \cap T[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #37 (ID: 474714)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সেট [math]A=\{1,2,3,5,7,8\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{2,4,5,6,7,10\}[/math] হলে, [math](A-B) \cup(B-A)=?[/math]

Options:
A. { [math]{1, 3, 7, 8}[/math]}
B. { [math]{1, 4, 6, 10}[/math]}
C. { [math]1, 2, 5, 8[/math]}
D. { [math]{1, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10}[/math]}


Correct Answer: D.{ [math]{1, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10}[/math]}

Solution:
[math]A-B=\{1,3,8\}[/math]
 এবং [math]B-A=\{4,6,10\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A-B) \cup(B-A)=\{1,3,4,6,8,10\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #38 (ID: 474715)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(-x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(x+1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #39 (ID: 474716)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5} \Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3 \times \frac{1}{3}+4}{\frac{1}{3}-5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #40 (ID: 474717)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}3 x-1, & x>3 \\x^{2}-2, & -2 \leq x \leq 3\end{array}\right.[/math] হলে, [math]f(6)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]12[/math]
B. [math]11[/math]
C. [math]17[/math]
D. [math]34[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=6>3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=3 \mathrm{x}-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(6)=3 \times 6-1=1^{17}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #41 (ID: 474718)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})=\mathbf{e}^{\mathbf{x}}[/math] হলে, এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]Inx[/math]
B. [math]e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]\ln \frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]logx[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]Inx[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{x} \Rightarrow y=e^{x} \Rightarrow x=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #42 (ID: 474719)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f: R-\{3\} \rightarrow R-\{1\}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়, তবে [math]r^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x-3 y[/math]
 [math]=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-1)[/math]
 [math]=3 y-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{3 y-2}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \cdot \frac{1}{2}-2}{\frac{1}{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3-4}{1-2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #43 (ID: 474720)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x-1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)[/math]
গ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=(x-1)^{2}+(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=(x-1)(x-1+1)[/math]
 [math]=x(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
আবার, [math]f(-x)=x^{2}-x \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x-1)=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #44 (ID: 474721)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2, g(x)=2 x+5[/math] হলে [math](g o f)(-2)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-11[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-6-2=-8[/math]
এখন, [math](g \circ f)(-2)[/math]
 [math]=g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(-8)=2(-8)+5[/math]
 [math]=-11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #45 (ID: 474722)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{x} \in \mathbb{R}[/math] এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math] হলে, [math]\left(f og^{-1}\right)(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(2)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(fog^{-1}\right)(2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(g^{-1}(2)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(0)=2 \times 0-1=-1[/math]


Explanation:

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে, [math]g(f(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(f(x)=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1=2 x^{2}+7\right.[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]

Options:
A. 1 ও 0
B. 0 ও 1
C. 0 ও 0
D. 1 ও 1


Correct Answer: B.0 ও 1

Solution:

 আবার, [math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{g}(0)=\mathrm{h}(0)=1[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে [math](gof)(x)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}+2 x^{3}+1[/math]
C. [math]x^{6}+1[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-6 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{6}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(x)=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}\right)=\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1=x^{6}+1[/math]

Question #50 (ID: 474727)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1+2 x)[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ = R
খ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R: y ≤ 2}
গ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R: y ≥ 2}
ঘ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R : y ≤1}


Correct Answer: A.রেঞ্জ = R

Solution:
[math]1+2 x>0 \Rightarrow 2 x>-1 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন, [math]D_{f}=\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জে = R

Explanation:

Question #51 (ID: 474728)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #52 (ID: 474729)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

খ. [math][0,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
ঘ. [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R এবং রেঞ্জ = [math][0, \infty)[/math]

Question #54 (ID: 474731)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A, B \subset R, B=R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}, g: A \rightarrow B, g(x)=\frac{x-5}{3 x+1}[/math] এবং [math]h(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-3}{x-\sqrt{3}}[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{5}\}[/math]
B. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2\}[/math]
C. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{\sqrt{3}\}[/math]
D. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{n}-a^{n}}{x-a}[/math]
 আকৃতি ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে,[math]D_{f}=R-\{a\}, R_{f}=R-\left\{n a^{n-1}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=\frac{x^{n}-3}{x-\sqrt{3}}=\frac{(x)^{2}-(\sqrt{3})^{2}}{x-\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে,[math]r=R-\{a\}=R-\{\sqrt{3}\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=R-\left\{n a^{n-1}\right\} .[/math]
 [math]=R-\left\{2(\sqrt{3})^{2-1}\right\}=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #55 (ID: 474732)

[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-3}{3 x-4}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

খ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-4 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]=R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]\equiv R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]
গ. [math][2,2][/math] ও [math](2, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math] ও [math](2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x-2>0 \Rightarrow x>2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(2, \infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R[/math]

Question #59 (ID: 474736)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math]\operatorname{gof}(2)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]15[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]19[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]19[/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f(2)=g(f(2))=g[/math]
 [math]\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=g(11)=2[/math]
 [math]\times 11-3=19[/math]


Explanation:

Question #60 (ID: 474737)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog(2) }[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(2)=2^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\times 2+4=14[/math]
 [math]\therefore f o g(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f(14)=14+3[/math]
 [math]=17[/math]


Explanation:

Question #61 (ID: 474738)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f[/math] একটি এক-এক বাস্তব ফাংশন এবং [math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]a[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]2+i \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
যেহেতু, f এক এক ফাংশন ।[math]\therefore \mathrm{a}^{2}+1=4 \mathrm{a} \quad \therefore \mathrm{a}^{2}-4 \mathrm{a}+1=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{a}=2 \pm \sqrt{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #62 (ID: 474739)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math] হলে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2y[/math]
খ. [math]2x+5[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 y-7}{2 y-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-7}{2\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{16 x-28-14 x+28}{2 x-4}}{\frac{8 x-14-8x+16}{2 x-4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #65 (ID: 474742)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 1)[/math]
ঙ. [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
Hints: x এর যেসব মানের জন্য কোনো ফাংশন সংজ্ঞায়িত, সেসব মান নিয়ে গঠিত সেটই হচ্ছে ঐ ফাংশনের ডোমেন।Solve: [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math]
এখানে, [math]1-x \geq 1 \Rightarrow x \leq 0[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math](-\infty, 0 \ )[/math]
Ans. (A)

Explanation:
√ এর ভিতর কখনো ঋণাত্মক সংখ্যা বসতে পারে না। আর Inx-এ x এর মান যদি 0 থেকে 1 এর মাঝে হয় তবে Inx এর value আসবে ঋণাত্মক। যেমন In (0.5 ) এর মান – 0.693। তাছাড়া Inx-এ x এর মান 0 বা এর চেয়ে ছোটও হওয়া সম্ভব না। তাই এ প্রশ্নে In ( 1 − x ) এ (I - x ) এর value কে হতে হবে 1 থেকে বড় বা I এর সমান।[SUST-এ এটাইপের Logarithmic function এর ডোমেন নির্ণয়ের প্রশ্ন খুবই কমন একটি প্রশ্ন। বিগত কয়েক বছর ধরে প্রায় প্রতিবছরই এ ধরনের ফাংশনের ডোমেন নির্ণয়ের প্রশ্ন আসতেছে]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #66 (ID: 474743)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] এর বিপরীত ফাংশন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt[3]{5+x}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{x-5}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{x+5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}+5 \Rightarrow x^{3}=y-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=(y-5)^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #67 (ID: 474744)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-1}{x+1}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{y+1}{y-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y+1}{y-1}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y-1}{y+1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x-1}{x+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y+y=x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y-x=-(y+1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{-(y+1)}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=-\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #68 (ID: 474745)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] হলে, নিচের কোনটি সত্য ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \geq x[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]x \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \leq 0.5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{lll}f(x)=\sin (x) & (-\infty,+\infty) & {[-1,1]} \\f(x)=\cos (x) & (-\infty,+\infty) & {[-1,1]} \\f(x)=\tan (x) & \text { All real numbers except } \pi / 2+n^{*} \pi & (- \text { in },+\infty) \\f(x)=\sec (x) & \text { All real numbers except } \pi / 2+n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,-1] \cup[1,+\infty) \\f(x)=\csc (x) & \text { All real numbers except } n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,-1] \cup[1,+\infty) \\f(x)=\cot (x) & \text { All real numbers except } n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,+\infty)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #69 (ID: 474746)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \mathrm{g}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+3 \mathrm{x}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math]\text { gof(2) }=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]15[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]19[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]19[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{gof}(2)=g\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+1\right)=g(11)[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 11-3=22-3=19[/math]


Explanation:

Question #70 (ID: 474747)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] নিম্নের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3 x+2[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-2[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x-3[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 y=x+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 y-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(y)=(2 y-3)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=2 x-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #71 (ID: 474748)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math](3,-3)[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{3,-3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\{3,-3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=x^{2}-7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=y+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}= \pm \sqrt{y+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})= \pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})= \pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)= \pm \sqrt{2+7}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{9}= \pm 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=\{3,-3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #72 (ID: 474749)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
টেনজেন্ট ফাংশনের মৌলিক পর্যায় কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pi[/math]
গ. [math]2\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan \theta[/math]
 এবং [math]\cot \theta[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=\pi[/math]
 [math]\sin \theta, \cos \theta, \sec \theta, \operatorname{cosec} \theta[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=2 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #73 (ID: 474750)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math] হলে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 y[/math]
খ. [math]2 x+5[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)=\frac{4 y-7}{2 y-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-7}{2\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-4}=[/math]
 [math]\frac{\frac{16 x-28-14 x+28}{2 x-4}}{\frac{8 x-14-8 x+16}{2 x-4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:

 [math]\sin \theta, \cos \theta, \sec \theta, \operatorname{cosec} \theta[/math]

Question #75 (ID: 474752)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f[/math] একটি এক-এক বাস্তব ফাংশন এবং [math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math] হয়, তবে a এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2+i \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+1=4 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-4 a+1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=\frac{4 \pm \sqrt{16-4}}{2.1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=\frac{4 \pm 2 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=2 \pm \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=2+\sqrt{3}, 2-\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #80 (ID: 474614)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
f(x) = [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{4 - x^2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2 \le x \le 2[/math]
খ. [math]-2 < x < 2[/math]
গ. [math]0 \le x \le 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \le x \le 0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{4 - x^2}[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হতে হলে [math]4 - x^2 > 0[/math]
, অর্থাৎ [math]-2 < x < 2[/math]
 হবে।

Question #81 (ID: 474615)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #82 (ID: 474616)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
f(x) ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি,[math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1 \Rightarrow|x| \leq 1 \Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]-1 \leq x\leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #83 (ID: 474617)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x e^{x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} x e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
E. blank


Correct Answer: E.blank

Solution:
ধরি,[math]x^{2}=z \\\Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z \\\Rightarrow x d x=\frac{d z}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} z}{2}\right)=\frac{1}{2} \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{C}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #84 (ID: 474618)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]60[/math] জনের একটি দলের মধ্যে [math]22[/math] জন ঠান্ডা পানীয় পছন্দ করে এবং [math]42[/math] জন গরম পানীয় পছন্দ করে এবং প্রত্যেকে দুটি পানীয়ের মধ্যে কমপক্ষে একটি পছন্দ করে। কত জন উভয় পানীয় পছন্দ করে।

Options:
ক. [math]7[/math]
খ. [math]9[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, উভয় পানীয় পছন্দ করে [math]x[/math]
 জনপ্রশ্নমতে, [math]27-x+x+42-x=60[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 69-x=60[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=9[/math]
 জন

Explanation:

Question #85 (ID: 474619)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]r^{-1}(x)[/math] এর কোডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\mathbf{R}-\{3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]= R - {3}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R – {2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{1+3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]= R - {2}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R - {3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 কোডোমেন = R - {3}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #86 (ID: 474620)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] ক্রমবর্ধমান?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\left(x^{2}+1\right) \times 1-x \times 2 x}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের জন্য [math]f'(x) > 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|^{2}<1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\mathrm{x}|<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1<\mathrm{x}<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ব্যবধি [math]= (-1, 1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #87 (ID: 474621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}} ;[/math]
 [math]\text { say, } P=\sqrt{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\text{For Domain: } x-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\text{Again, } 3-\mathrm{p} \geq 0 ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{p} \leq 3 ; \sqrt{\mathrm{x}-2} \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \leq 11[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text{ Domain: }2\leq[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x} \leq 11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #88 (ID: 474622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 এবং [math]3-\sqrt{x-2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{x-2} \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-2 \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 11[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সমাধান [math]2 ≤ x ≤ 11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #89 (ID: 474623)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় ,তাহলে [math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-2))[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|=4-4=0 ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{g}(0)[/math]
 [math]=0^{2}+1=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-2))=[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{g}(0)=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #90 (ID: 474624)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2-x}}[/math] এর ডোমেইন হলো- -

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]
B. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]
D. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2-x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2-\mathrm{x} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } 2-\sqrt{2-x} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{2-x} \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-x \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Domain }=[-2,2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #91 (ID: 474625)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2006-2007, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]g(f(-2))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|[/math]
 [math]=4-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(0)=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #93 (ID: 474627)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]120[/math] জন ছাত্রের মধ্যে 75 জন ক্রিকেট খেলে এবং 65 জন ফুটবল খেলে। কতজন উভয় খেলাই খেলে?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]20[/math]
গ. [math]30[/math]
ঘ. 40$


Correct Answer: B.[math]20[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C})[/math]
 [math]=75,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F})[/math]
 [math]=65, \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cup \mathrm{F})[/math]
 [math]=120,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{F})=?[/math]
 [math]\therefore n(C \cup F)=n(C)+n(F)-n(C \cap F)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow n(C \cap F)=n(C)[/math]
 [math]+n(F)-n(C \cup F)[/math]
 [math]=75+65-120=20[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Shortcut} }[/math]
নির্ণেয় সংখ্যা [math]= 75+65[/math]
 [math]-120-20[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

খ. [math]1[/math]

ঘ. [math]5[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2=\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4=x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=5[/math]

Question #97 (ID: 474631)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1} \Rightarrow x=1+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=1+\mathrm{y}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=1+2^{2}=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #98 (ID: 474632)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,5,9\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{1,2,9,10)[/math] হলে [math](A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math] এর সমান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]\{3,5\}[/math]
B. [math]\{1,2,9\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3,5,10\}[/math]
D. [math]\{1,2,3,5,9,10\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{3,5,10\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{A} \backslash \mathrm{B}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5\} ; \mathrm{B} \backslash \mathrm{A}[/math]
 [math]=\{10\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5\} \cup\{10\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5,10\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #99 (ID: 474633)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { (fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\text { fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\mathrm{f}\left[\mathrm{g}\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\sin \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\infty

Solution:

 [math]\Rightarrow x<4[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\infty [math]; 0

Question #101 (ID: 474635)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=e^{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(e)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x-3} \Rightarrow x-3=\ln y \Rightarrow x=\ln y+3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x+3 \\\therefore f^{-1}(e)=\ln e+3=1+3=4 .\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #102 (ID: 474636)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\infty

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবেযখন, [math]4-x 
otin 0 \Rightarrow 4-x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-4<0 \Rightarrow x<4[/math]
ডোমেন [math](-\infty, 4)[/math]
 বা [math]-\inftyআবার, [math]4-x=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=\frac{4 y^{2}-1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]y≠0[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]0

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #103 (ID: 474637)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Let } f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}} \text {. The domain and range of the real valued function } f \text { is - }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-2
C. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-x<-2 \& x>, 2


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2[math]\therefore y^{2}=\frac{1}{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-x^{2}=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-x^{2}=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]|x|[/math]
 এর [math]\text { value minimum }[/math]
 হলে [math]\text { y mimimum }[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2[math]\therefore 4=\frac{1}{y_{m \ln }^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{m l n}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{m l n}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #104 (ID: 474638)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{3}+7[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(15)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]15[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x^{3}+7[/math]
ধরি, [math]f(x)=y, x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}=y-7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{x}-7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(15)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{15-7}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{8}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #105 (ID: 474639)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}}[/math] বাস্তব ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-2
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<1 / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x<-2 \& x>2,-2


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-4<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|<2 \text { : }=2[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]I=-2[math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=f(0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত যখন, [math]-2<\mathrm{x}<2, \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]=y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:
