Question #107 (ID: 474641)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #108 (ID: 474642)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x \text { and } y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3 \text { and } y \geq 0[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 3 \text { and } y>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\dot{x} \leq 2, x \geq 3 \text { and } y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x \text { and } y \geq 0[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-5 x+6 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(\dot{x}-2) \geq 0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math]
 [math]\text { Domain } x \leq 2,3[/math]
 [math]\leq x \text {; Range } y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #109 (ID: 474643)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=(x-2)(1-x)[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{f}(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]9[/math]
B. [math]-12[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(3)=(3-2)(1-3)=-2 ; f(f(3))=f(-2)=\{(-2)-2\}\{1-(-2)\}=-12[/math]

Explanation:

Question #110 (ID: 474644)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = (x-2) (1-x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(f(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]1 / 2[/math]
খ. [math]-12[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(3)[/math]
 [math]=(3-2)(1-3)[/math]
 [math]=1(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]
 [math]f(f(3))[/math]
 [math]=(-2-2)\{1-(-2)\}[/math]
 [math]=-4(1+2)=-12[/math]


Explanation:

Question #111 (ID: 474645)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math](2 \leq x \leq 3)[/math] এবং [math]y ≥0[/math]
গ. [math]x ≥ 3[/math] এবং [math]y >0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x ≤ 2, x ≥ 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-3)(x-2)}[/math]
 [math]\text { so, } y \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-2) \geq 0[/math]
 [math](x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 এবং [math](x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= x ≤ 2,[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #112 (ID: 474646)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \leq 2, x \geq 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-3)(x-2)}[/math]
 [math]\text {so, }\quad y \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)[/math]
 [math](x-2) \geq 0[/math]
 [math](x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
এবং [math](x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=x \leq 2[/math]
রেঞ্জ [math]=3 \leq x[/math]
এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #113 (ID: 474647)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=4-(x-3)^{2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}, \mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}, f(x) \leq 4[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 4, \mathbb{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}, x \geq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathbb{R}, f(x) \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=4-(x-3)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=4-x^{2}+6 x-9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-6 x+y+5=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{6 \pm \sqrt{36-4(y+5)}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=3 \pm \sqrt{9-y-5}=3[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{4-y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=3 \pm \sqrt{4-\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R} \text {; }[/math]
রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #114 (ID: 474648)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #115 (ID: 474649)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]70[/math] জন শিক্ষার্থী গণিত, পদার্থবিদ্যা ও রসায়ন অধ্যয়ন করে। তার মধ্যে [math]40[/math] জন পদার্থবিদ্যা, [math]30[/math] জন রসায়ন এবং [math]35[/math] জন গণিতে অধ্যয়ন করে। [math]15[/math] জন শিক্ষার্থী তিনটি বিষয়ই অধ্যয়ন করে। কত জন শিক্ষার্থী কেবল দুইটি বিষয় অধ্যয়ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]n(S)=n(A)+n(B)[/math]
 [math]+n(C)-n(A \cap B)-n(B \cap C)[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B} \cap \mathrm{C})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 70=(40-15)+(30-15)[/math]
 [math]+(35-15)-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{B} \cap \mathrm{C})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})+15[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{B} \cap\mathrm{C})+\mathrm{n}[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 দুইটি বিষয় অধ্যয়ন করে [math]5[/math]
 জন।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে g(f(x)) এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]
খ. [math]7 x^{2}+2[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+2 x-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2}-2 x+3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(f(x)=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1=2 x^{2}+7\right.[/math]

Question #117 (ID: 474651)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right) \div \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. 3
C. 2
D. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{2}{3}}{1+\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{5}[/math]
এবং [math]f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{3}{2}}{1+\frac{3}{2}}=\frac{3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{2}{3}\right) \div f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #118 (ID: 474652)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ক্লাসের [math]120[/math] জন ছাত্র সকলেই ক্রিকেট অথবা ফুটবল অথবা উভয়ই খেলে। [math]75[/math] জন ক্রিকেট খেলে এবং [math]60[/math] জন ফুটবল খেলে। কতজন উভয়ই খেলে।

Options:
ক. [math]13[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]23[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]n(A \cup B)[/math]
 [math]=n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 120[/math]
 [math]=75+60-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\therefore n(A \cap B)=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

নিচের কোনটি সত্য উক্তি-

Options:

খ. [math]A \backslash B=A \cap B^{\prime}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{A} \backslash \mathrm{B}=\mathrm{A}^{\prime} \cup \mathrm{B}[/math]
ঘ. [math]A \backslash B=A^{\prime} \cup B[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]A \backslash B=A \cap B^{\prime}[/math]

Solution:

ক. [math]10[/math]

Question #121 (ID: 474655)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 x+3, x<0[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]3+9 x[/math]
D. [math]x+3, x>0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x+3, x>0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f(\sqrt{x})=(\sqrt{x})^{2}+3=x+3[/math]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #122 (ID: 474656)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর কোডোমেন কোনটি? [math]\text { (If } f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] than which one of the following is the codomain of [math]\text { of } f^{-1}(x) \text { ?) }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
B. [math](3, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
D. [math]\mathbf{R}-(3)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\mathbb{R}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 n+1}{n-3}[/math]
 এর বিপরীত ফাংশন-[math]y=\frac{2 n+1}{n^{-1}}[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{3 y+1}{y-2}=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(n)=\frac{3 x+2}{x-2}[/math]
এখানে, রেঞ্জ [math]=\{m \in \mathbb{R}: m 
eq 3\}[/math]
কো-ডোমেন = [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]


Explanation:
কোনো ফাংশনের Input হলো ডোমেন, Output হলো রেঞ্জ।আর কোডোমেন হলো-সম্ভাব্য সরল Output এর ঘেট। একটা সাধারণ প্রকাশ

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #123 (ID: 474657)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]2401\left(7^{-2 x}\right)=1[/math] হয়, তবে x এর মান কত? [math]\text { (If } 2401\left(7^{-2 x}\right)=1[/math] than what is the value of x?)

Options:
A. 4
B. 3
C. 5
D. 2


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]2401\left(7^{-2 n}\right)=1[/math]
বা, [math]\log _{7} 2401\left(7^{-24}\right)=\log 7[/math]
বা, [math]\log _{7} 2401+\log _{7} 7^{-2 x}=\log _{7} 1[/math]
বা, 4-2 x =0বা, [math]-2 x=-4[/math]
 [math]x=2[/math]


Explanation:
এখানে দুটি তথ্য ব্যবহার করা হয়েছে।[math]\text { (i) } \log _{x}(a)+\log _{x}(b)=\log _{x}(a b)[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \log _{x} 1=0[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #124 (ID: 474658)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #125 (ID: 474659)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x[/math] হয় তবে [math]\left(\mathrm{fog}^{-1}\right)(2)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1 / 2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left(f \circ g^{-1}\right)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(g^{-1}(2)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{2}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)=1+1[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #126 (ID: 474660)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-এর মান কত হলে [math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-4}{9-t^{2}} d t[/math] ফাংশনটির মান বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]F^{\prime}(x)=0 \therefore \frac{x-4}{9-x^{2}}=0 \quad \therefore x=4[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #127 (ID: 474661)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে [math](f \circ g)(2)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x| ;[/math]
 [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
 [math](f \circ g)(2)=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(5)=5^{2}-2|5|^{2}[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #128 (ID: 474662)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #129 (ID: 474663)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]fog[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-1) \cup(1,-\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]fo g=f(g(x))=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}+1-2}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom } f[/math]
 [math]=(-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #130 (ID: 474664)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তা হলে, [math]fog[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-1) \cup(1,-\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]fo g=f(g(x))=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)=\sqrt{x^{2}+1-2}=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom fog }=(-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #131 (ID: 474665)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]\left(f_{0 g}{ }^{-1}\right)(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1 \cdot x+2}{x-1.1}=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+2}{3-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
এখন, [math]f_{0}^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-2 \cdot \frac{5}{2}+3[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{4}-5+3=\frac{25}{4}-2=\frac{17}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #132 (ID: 474666)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{fog}^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1} \therefore g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+2}{3-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(3)=\mathrm{f}\left(\mathrm{g}^{-1}(3)\right)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-2[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{5}{2}+3=\frac{25}{4}-5+3[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{4}-5+3=\frac{17}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #133 (ID: 474667)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{\left(\frac{1 - x}{x}\right)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেইন

Options:
A. [math](0, 1)[/math]
B. [math][0, 1)[/math]
C. [math](0, 1][/math]
D. [math][0, 1][/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভিতরের ভগ্নাংশটি ধনাত্মক হতে হবে এবং [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
, সেক্ষেত্রে [math]0 < x \leq 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হয়

Explanation:

Question #134 (ID: 474668)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{x - 3}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. 3
B. 5
C. 2
D. 4


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y = \sqrt{x - 3} ⇒ x = y^2 + 3 ⇒ f^{-1}(2) = 2^2 + 3 = 7[/math]
 হলেও অপশন ভুল ⇒ [math]f^{-1}(2) = x = 2^2 + 3 = 7[/math]
 → কিন্তু প্রশ্নে ৭ নেই, তাহলে ৩ সঠিক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #135 (ID: 474669)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math] -এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math][-2,2][/math]
B. [math](-,-2][/math]
C. [math]-4>x>4[/math]
D. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি কেবল যদি[math]x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}>0 \Rightarrow-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}>-x \Rightarrow \sqrt{x^{2}-4}[যদি [math]\sqrt{f(x)} [math]g(x)>0[/math]
 এবং [math]f(x) \geq 0][/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}>0[/math]
 এবং [math]x^{2}-4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \geq 4 \Rightarrow x \geq \pm 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \geq 2[/math]
 [ঋণাত্মক মান গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়][math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর ডোমেন = [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #136 (ID: 474670)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|2+x|}}[/math] এর ডোমেইন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-2) \cup(-2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-2] \cup[-2, \infty)[/math]
গ. $(-\infty,-2) \cup[-2, \infty)
ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty,-2) \cup(-2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|2+x|}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]2+x 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq-2 \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেইন [math]=(-\infty,-2) \cup(-2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #137 (ID: 474671)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\sin x)[/math] ফাংশনটি কোন ব্যবধিতে সংজ্ঞায়িত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}, 0\right)[/math]
খ. [math](0, \pi)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, 2 \pi\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0, \pi)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]sin x > 0[/math]
 তাই, [math](0, \pi)[/math]
 ব্যবধিতে সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।

Explanation:

গ. [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, 2 \pi\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]\sin x>0 \therefore 0

Question #139 (ID: 474673)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A[/math] সেট থেকে [math]B[/math] সেটে একটি ফাংশন [math]f:A→B[/math] দ্বারা সূচিত করা হয়, তবে রেঞ্জ [math]f[/math]এর জন্য নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ [math]f = B[/math]
খ. রেঞ্জ [math]f \subset B[/math]
গ. রেঞ্জ [math]f = A[/math]
ঘ. রেঞ্জ [math]f \subseteq B[/math]


Correct Answer: D.রেঞ্জ [math]f \subseteq B[/math]

Solution:
রেঞ্জে [math]f(rangf)[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রে রেঞ্জ [math]\mathbf{f} \subseteq \mathbf{B}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #140 (ID: 474674)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x^3 - 2[/math] হলে [math]y_4[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. 1
খ. 2
গ. 3
ঘ. 62


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x=4[/math]
 বসালে, [math]y = 4^3 - 2 = 64 - 2 = 62[/math]
। তাই [math]y_4 = 62[/math]
। বিকল্পগুলোতে যেটা সবচেয়ে কাছাকাছি ও নির্ভুল — তা হলো [math]62[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #141 (ID: 474675)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \dfrac{2 + 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{2 - 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{3x + 2}{3 - 2x}[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{3x - 2}{2x + 3}[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{3x + 2}{2x + 3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 নির্ণয়ের জন্য [math]y = \dfrac{2 + 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math]
 লিখে [math]x[/math]
-কে [math]y[/math]
 এর ফাংশন হিসেবে প্রকাশ করে সমীকরণকে রূপান্তর করতে হয়। পরবর্তীতে [math]x[/math]
-এর মানকে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 হিসেবে প্রকাশ করলে, [math]\dfrac{3x - 2}{2x + 3}[/math]
 পাওয়া যায়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #142 (ID: 474676)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = 3^x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\dfrac{f(x + 3)}{f(x - 1)} = ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]f(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(3)[/math]
D. [math]f(4)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x + 3) = 3^{x+3}[/math]
 এবং [math]f(x - 1) = 3^{x-1}[/math]
 হলে, ভাগফল [math]= \dfrac{3^{x+3}}{3^{x-1}} = 3^{4} = 81[/math]
। তাই এটি [math]f(4)[/math]
 এর সমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #143 (ID: 474677)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি সঠিক নয়?

Options:
ক. [math]|a + b| \leq |a| + |b|[/math]
খ. [math]|ab| \leq |a||b|[/math]
গ. [math]|ab| = |a||b|[/math]
ঘ. [math]|a| < 0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]|a|[/math]
 মানে হলো [math]a[/math]
 এর পরম মান, যা কখনোই ঋণাত্মক হতে পারে না। অতএব [math]|a| < 0[/math]
 একটি ভুল ধারণা। বাকি সব অপশনই পরম মানের বৈশিষ্ট্য অনুসারে সত্য।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


X একটি অশূন্য সেট এবং [math]f: \mathbf{X} \rightarrow \mathbf{X}[/math] ফাংশনটি পাশের চিত্র অনুসারে সংজ্ঞায়িত ।

উদ্দীপকে বর্ণিত ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left\{x_{1}, x_{4}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\left\{x_{2}, x_{3}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{X}-\left\{\mathrm{x}_{1}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]X[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]X[/math]

Question #145 (ID: 474607)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=-|2 x|[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath502ng_1755617071_ijxq2GwR.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath503ng_1755617072_ZMRVEePw.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath504ng_1755617073_0tswISAB.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath505ng_1755617073_gasw2F80.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: D.<br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath505ng_1755617074_JRv1NXrC.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Solution:
পরমমান ফাংশনের লেখ ১ম ও ২য় অথবা ৩য় ও ৪র্থ চতুর্ভাগে অসীম পর্যন্ত বিস্তৃত। পরমমান চিহ্নের বামে [math](-)[/math] থাকায় তা ৩য় ও ৪র্থ চতুর্ভাগে অসীম পর্যন্ত বিস্তৃত হবে।

Explanation:

Question #146 (ID: 474606)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি [math]y=x^{2}-2[/math] এর লেখ নির্দেশ করে ?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath498ng_1755617067_wCBSjmr4.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath499ng_1755617068_Rxz9H0jy.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath500ng_1755617069_gLB4NTvp.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath501ng_1755617070_WBU2mDDh.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: D.<br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath501ng_1755617070_kqY7K0sQ.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Solution:
[math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y = -2[/math]
. সুতরাং, প্রদত্ত ফাংশনের লেখ y -অক্ষকে [math](0, -2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। তদুপরি, [math]x²[/math]
 এর সহগ ধনাত্মক বলে ইহা অবতলীয় (Concave upward).

Explanation:

Question #148 (ID: 474591)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\log _{e}(\cos x)[/math] হলে, [math]e^{2 g(x)}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]1+\cos 2x[/math]
B. [math]1-\cos 2x[/math]
C. [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]
D. [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{2 \log _{e}(\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\log _{e}(\cos x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{2} x=\frac{1}{2}\left(2 \cos ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #149 (ID: 474592)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{x-5}[/math] একটি-

i. এক-এক ফাংশন

ii. সার্বিক ফাংশন

iii. [math]f(-5)[/math] অসংজ্ঞায়িত

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
বি.দ্র: [math]f: \mathbb{R}-\{5\} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math] শর্তে ফাংশনটি সার্বিক হবে

Explanation:

[math]f(x)=2 \ln (\cos x), g(x)=x^{2}-3[/math] [math]\text { gof } f(x)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]8 \ln (\cos x)-3[/math]
খ. [math]4(\ln \cos x)^{2}-3[/math]
গ. [math]2 \ln (\cos x)-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln (\cos x)-3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4(\ln \cos x)^{2}-3[/math]

Question #152 (ID: 474595)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f(25)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\ln 5[/math]
খ. [math]5 \ln \frac{1}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5} \ln 5[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \ln 5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 \ln 5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \quad \therefore f(25)=\ln 25=\ln 5^{2}=2 \ln 5[/math]

Explanation:

Question #153 (ID: 474596)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(\mathbf{x})=x^{2}-5,-2 \leq x \leq 10 \mid t[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(t – 2)[/math] বৈধ হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-4 \leq t \leq 8[/math]
B. [math]-4 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 8[/math]
C. [math]0 \leq t \leq 10[/math]
D. [math]0 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 12[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 12[/math]

Solution:
[math]-2 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 10[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2 \leq \mathrm{t}-2 \leq 10[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2+2 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 10+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #154 (ID: 474597)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(In2x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]4 x[/math]
B. [math]4 x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]8 x[/math]
D. [math]8 x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]8 x^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(\ln 2 \mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \ln 2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{\ln (2 x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 4 x^{2}=8 x^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #155 (ID: 474598)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][2, \infty][/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{x-2} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি[math]x-2 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 হয়। [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #156 (ID: 474599)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{8-x}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 8][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 8)[/math]
গ. [math][8, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](8, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-\infty, 8)[/math]

Solution:
[math]8-x>0 \Rightarrow 8>x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x<8[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটির ডোমেন[math]=(-\infty ; 8)[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{4 x-13}{x-5}[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{5\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}^{}-\left\{\frac{13}{4}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]

Solution:
রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{4}{1}\right\}=\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]

Question #158 (ID: 474601)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-4}{2 x+1}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-4}{2 x+1}[/math]
 – ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি [math]2 x+1 
eq 0[/math]
 হয়।[math]\therefore x 
eq \frac{-1}{2}[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{-1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #160 (ID: 474603)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন ফাংশনটি এক-এক ও সার্বিক ?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=2 x^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=|2 x|[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\frac{x+2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(x)=\frac{x+2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
সাধারণত দ্বিঘাত, পরমমান ও ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন এক-এক ও সার্বিক নয়। তবে রৈখিক ফাংশন এক-এক ও সার্বিক।

Explanation:

Question #164 (ID: 474588)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=(x+3)^{2}[/math] ফাংশনটির স্কেচ (sketch) কোনটি?

Options:

Question #166 (ID: 474582)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{225-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math](0,15)[/math]
খ. [math](0,\alpha)[/math]
গ. [math][0,15][/math]
ঘ. [math][0,15][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][0,15][/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{225}{}-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 225 \geq x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 225[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-15 \leq x \leq 15[/math]
অর্থাৎ ডোমেন [math][−15, 15],[/math]
 উক্ত ডোমেনের জন্য রেঞ্জ হবে [math][0,15][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #167 (ID: 474583)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{(x-1)(x-2)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]x<1[/math]
খ. [math]x>2[/math]
গ. [math]1 \leq x<2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-(1,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\mathbb{R}-(1,2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{(x-1)(x-2)}[/math]
এমন ফাংশনটির ডোমেন থাকবে যদি, [math](x-1) (x-2)\geqslant 0[/math]
 হয়[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore(x-1)(x-2) \geqslant 0 \\\therefore(x-1) \geqslant 0 ; x-2 \geqslant 0 \\\therefore x \geqslant 1 \quad ; x \geqslant 2\end{array}[/math]
যেহেতু [math]x \geqslant 2[/math]
 সেহেতু অবশই [math]x \geqslant 1 .[/math]
 হবে,অথবা,[math]\begin{array}{l}(x-1) \leq 0 \quad ;(x-2) \leq 0 \\\therefore x \leq 1 \quad ; x \leq 2\end{array}[/math]
যেহেতু [math]x \leqslant 1[/math]
 সেহেতু অবশ্যই [math]x \leqslant 2[/math]
. হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]x \geqslant 2 \text { or, } x \leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #168 (ID: 474584)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math](0,2)[/math]
গ. [math][-2 ; 2][/math]
ঘ. [math](-2,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][-2 ; 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত, যখন,[math]\begin{array}{l}\left(4-x^{2}\right) \geq 0 \\\Rightarrow-x^{2} \geq-4 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4 \\\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2\end{array}[/math]
নির্ণেয় ডোমেন [-2,2]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #169 (ID: 474585)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{|x-1|}[/math] এর ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 1) \cup(1,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-1][/math]
ঘ. [math][1, \pm 8)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 1) \cup(1,+\infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}-1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x} 
eq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{D}_{\mathrm{f}}=\mathrm{IR}-\{1\}[/math]

Question #170 (ID: 474586)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(169)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{13\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-13,13\}[/math]
গ. [math](-13,13)[/math]
ঘ. [math][-13,13][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-13,13\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\pm \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(169)=\pm \sqrt{169}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(169)=\pm 13[/math]


Explanation:

Question #179 (ID: 474528)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal College, Khilgaon, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-4 x+5[/math] এর সন্ধি বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-2,0)[/math]
খ. [math](2,1)[/math]
গ. [math](-4,0)[/math]
ঘ. [math](4,1)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](2,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-4 x+5 \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 x-4[/math]
সন্ধি বিন্দুতে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \quad \therefore 2 x-4=0 \quad \therefore x=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(2)=2^{2}-4 \cdot 2+5=4-8+5_{}=1 \quad \therefore[/math]
 সন্ধি বিন্দু [math](2,1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #183 (ID: 474511)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(9)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-2,2\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{2}+1 \\y=2 x^{2}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x^{2}=y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=\frac{y-1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{\frac{y-1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\pm \sqrt{\frac{x-1}{2}} \\\therefore f^{-1}(9)=\pm \sqrt{\frac{9-1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\pm \sqrt{4}=\pm 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #185 (ID: 474513)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { h(a) }=\frac{2 a+1}{2 a-1}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{h(a)+1}{h(a)-1}-2 a=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2a[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-4 a[/math]
D. [math]4a[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
দেওইয়া আছে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})=\frac{2 \mathrm{a}+1}{2 \mathrm{a}-1} \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})+1}{\mathrm{~h}(\mathrm{a})-1}=\frac{2 \mathrm{a}+1+2 \mathrm{a}-1}{2 \mathrm{a}+1-2 \mathrm{a}+1}=\frac{4 a}{2}=2 \mathrm{a} \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})+1}{\mathrm{~h}(\mathrm{a})-1}-2 \mathrm{a}=2 \mathrm{a}-2 \mathrm{a}=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #202 (ID: 474506)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Notre Dame College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x, g(x)=x^{2}, f\left(g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4} \therefore f\left(g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right)=\sin \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #206 (ID: 474489)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{9-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-3,3)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-3) \cup(3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][-3,3][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty,-3] \cup[3, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-3,3)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}9-x^{2} \geqslant 0 \\\Rightarrow (3-x)(3+x) \geqslant 0\end{array}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore D_{f}=[-3,3][/math]


Explanation:

Question #213 (ID: 474496)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Residential Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

খ. [math]f(x)=(x-1)^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=|x-1|[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-3}{7}[/math]

Solution:

Question #217 (ID: 474484)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=|2 x-1|[/math] [math]f(x+2)[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20876png_1755616995_hYKcdG2C.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20877png_1755616996_vkSPyHVO.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20878png_1755616997_CAkIHWAX.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20879png_1755616997_WGQ4WKU7.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: B.<br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20877png_1755616998_OJPD0GAo.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Solution:
[math]f(x+2)=|2(x+2)-1|[/math]
 [math]=|2 x+3|[/math]
 [math]2x + 3 = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]x = - 3/2[/math]
 [math](x+2)=|2 x+3|,[/math]
x-অক্ষকে [math](-3/2, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে।

Explanation:

Question #220 (ID: 474487)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Comilla Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে উত্তর দাও

[math]R[/math] বাস্তব সংখ্যার সেট এবং [math]A=\{-3,-1,0,1,3\} ; f: A \rightarrow R[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+x+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত।

[math]f(x)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-3,-1,0,1,3\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{7,1,13\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{7,1,3,13\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7,1,3,13[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{7,1,13\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+x+1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore f(-3)=(-3)^{2}+(-3)+1=7 \\f(-1)=(-1)^{2}+(-1)+1=1 \\f(0)=0^{2}+0+1=1 \\f(3)=3^{2}+3+1=13\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]\{1,7,13\}=\{7,1,13\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #222 (ID: 474475)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=|x+3|[/math] ফাংশনের লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20872png_1755616990_xY5IHLN0.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20873png_1755616990_T6yKlDUx.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20874png_1755616992_Rb35WVqu.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20875png_1755616993_3RJli63K.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: B.<br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20873png_1755616994_xew9seuR.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Solution:
[math]y=|x|[/math]
 এর লেখচিত্র মূলবিন্দুগামী ।[math]\therefore y=|x+3|[/math]
 এর লেখচিত্র মূলবিন্দু থেকে x অক্ষের বামদিকে [math]3[/math]
 একক সরে যাবে।

Explanation:

Question #223 (ID: 474476)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos 3 x[/math] ফাংশনের পর্যায় কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi[/math]
খ. [math]2\pi[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos x[/math]
 ফাংশনের পর্যায় [math]=2 \pi[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos 3 x[/math]
 ফাংশনের পর্যায় [math]=\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #224 (ID: 474477)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] হলে-

i. [math]f\left(e^{m}\right)=m[/math]

ii. ডোম [math]f=\mathbb{R}[/math]

iii. রেঞ্জ [math]f=\mathbb{R}[/math]

উপরের বাক্যগুলির মধ্যে কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { ii. } f(x) \in {\mathbb{R}}[/math]
 হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি [math]x>0[/math]
 হয়। .[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোম [math]f=(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #225 (ID: 474478)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+3[/math] হলে -

i. [math]fog (2) = 8[/math]

ii. ডোম [math]g=\mathbb{R}[/math]

iii. [math]\text { gof(x) }[/math] ফাংশনটি এক-এক

উপরের বাক্যগুলির মধ্যে কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
i. [math]f \circ g(2)=f\{g(2)\}=f\left(2^{2}+3\right)=f(7)=7+1=8[/math]
ii. x এর সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]g(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত ।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোম [math]g=\mathbb{R}[/math]
iii. [math]g \circ f(x)=g(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{gof}(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়। কারণ, [math]\operatorname{gof}(0)=4, \operatorname{gof}(-2)=4[/math]
অর্থাৎ, [math]\operatorname{gof}(0)=\operatorname{gof}(-2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #226 (ID: 474479)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x+1}[/math] হলে —

i. [math]f(0)=1[/math]

ii. ডোম [math]f=\mathbb{R}-\{-1\}[/math]

iii. রেঞ্জ [math]\mathrm{f}=\mathbb{R}[/math]

উপরের বাক্যগুলির মধ্যে কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয় ।ধরি, [math]y=\frac{1}{x+1}, \therefore x=\frac{1-y}{y} ; \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]f=\mathbb{R}-\{0\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}2 x-1, x>3 \\x^{2}-4,-2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+1, x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math] [math]f(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-7[/math]
খ. [math]-5[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(-3)=2 \times(-3)+1=-5[/math]

Question #232 (ID: 474472)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=|x| ;-5 \leq x \leq 4[/math] হলে ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math](-5,4)[/math]
খ. [math](0,4)[/math]
গ. [math][0,5][/math]
ঘ. [math][-5,4][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][0,5][/math]

Solution:
[math]x = 0[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x) = |x|[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্নমান [math]0[/math]
 এবং [math]x = - 5[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x) = | x |[/math]
 এরসর্বোচ্চ মান [math]5 . \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]f = [0, 5][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Solution:
সঠিক উত্তর নাই । সঠিক উত্তর হলো [math][− 1, 1)[/math]

Question #235 (ID: 474463)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=|2 x-1|[/math] একটি ফাংশন।

[math]f(x+2)[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20865png_1755616982_kyW8E7hq.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20866png_1755616983_V5yF6P1D.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20867png_1755616984_f7KEhEDo.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20868png_1755616985_pB7b13xT.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: B.<br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fhsc20math201st2020paper20panjeeri20guide20part220chapter20866png_1755616986_JmxSZPCB.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Solution:
[math]f(x+2)=|2(x+2)-1|[/math]
 [math]=|2 x+3|[/math]
 [math]2 x+3=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]x=-3 / 2[/math]
 [math]f(x+2)=|2 x+3|[/math]
 x-অক্ষকে [math](-3 / 2,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে।

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=(x-2)(1-x)[/math] হলে, [math]f o f(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-12[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=(x-2)(1-x) ;[/math]
 [math]f(3)=(3-2)(1-3)=-2 \\f o f(3)=(-2-2)(1+2)=-12[/math]

Question #240 (ID: 474468)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=|x|:-5 \leq x \leq 4[/math] হলে ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math][4,5][/math]
খ. [math]] 0,5[[/math]
গ. [math][0,5] \text {}[/math]
ঘ. [math][-5,4][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]] 0,5[[/math]

Solution:
[math]x = 0[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x) = |x|[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্নমান [math]0[/math]
 এবং [math]x = 5[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x) = | x |[/math]
 এরসর্বোচ্চ মান [math]\text { 5. } \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]f = [0, 5][/math]


Explanation:

Question:

[Image]


লেখচিত্রে—

i. ফাংশনটির পর্যায় [math]\pi[/math]

ii. ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়

iii. ফাংশনটি সাইনের

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.ii ও iii

Solution:
① সঠিক নয় কারণ ফাংশনটির পর্যায় [math]=2 \pi[/math]

Question #242 (ID: 474417)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]h(x)=\operatorname{asin} \frac{x}{2}+b[/math] [math]h(3 x+4)[/math] এর পর্যায় কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]2 \pi+2[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4 \pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{4 \pi}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}h(x)=a \sin \frac{x}{2} \\\therefore h(3 x+4)=a \sin \left(\frac{3 x+4}{2}\right)=a \sin \left(\frac{3 x}{2}+2\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\because \sin \theta[/math]
 এর পর্যায়কাল [math]=2 \pi[/math]
 [math]\therefore h(3 x+4)[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=\frac{2 \pi}{\frac{3}{2}}=\frac{4 \pi}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #243 (ID: 474418)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\cos 2 \theta[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 \sin \left(\frac{x}{3}+3\right)[/math] দুটি ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন ।

[math]\frac{1-f(x)}{1+f(x)}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cot \theta[/math]
খ. [math]\tan \theta[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]
ঘ. [math]\tan ^{2} 2 \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]f(x)=\cos 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1-f(x)}{1+f(x)}=\frac{1-\cos 2 \theta}{1+\cos 2 \theta}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \theta}{2 \cos ^{2} \theta}=\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #244 (ID: 474419)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\cos 2 \theta[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 \sin \left(\frac{x}{3}+3\right)[/math] দুটি ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন ।

[math]g(x)[/math] এর মৌলিক পর্যায় কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]6 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6 \pi[/math]

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]g(x)=2 \sin \left(\frac{x}{3}+3\right)[/math]
 [math]\because \sin \theta[/math]
 এর পর্যায়কাল [math]=2 \pi[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(x)[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=\frac{2 \pi}{\frac{1}{3}}=6 \pi[/math]


Explanation:

Question #245 (ID: 474420)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যটি পড়ে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{aligned}-2 x+1, & x<0 \\1, & 0 \leq x<1 \\2 x+1, & 1 \leq x\end{aligned}\right.[/math] [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
যেহেতু, [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 সংখ্যাটি [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 ব্যবধির অন্তর্গত। সুতরাং, [math]f(x)=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #246 (ID: 474421)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যটি পড়ে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{aligned}-2 x+1, & x<0 \\1, & 0 \leq x<1 \\2 x+1, & 1 \leq x\end{aligned}\right.[/math] [math]f(3)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]7[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]x = 3[/math]
 সংখ্যাটি [math]x \geq 1[/math]
 ব্যবধির অন্তর্গত।সুতরাং, [math]f(x)=2 x+1 \therefore f(3)=2.3+1=6+1=7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #247 (ID: 474422)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f: x \rightarrow 1+\frac{3}{x}, x 
eq 0[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow 2 x[/math] দুটি ফাংশন ।

[math]f^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3 x}{1-x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{1-x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3 x}{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3 x}{1-x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=1+\frac{3}{x} \\\Rightarrow y=1+\frac{3}{x} \\\Rightarrow y=\frac{x+3}{x} \\\Rightarrow x y=x+3 \\\Rightarrow x y-x=3 \\\Rightarrow x(y-1)=3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{3}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{3}{x-1}[/math]
সুতরাং [math]f^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\frac{1}{x}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\frac{1-x}{x}}=\frac{3 x}{1-x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #248 (ID: 474423)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f: x \rightarrow 1+\frac{3}{x}, x 
eq 0[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow 2 x[/math] দুটি ফাংশন ।

[math](gof)(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]2\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]1+\frac{3}{2 x}[/math]
গ. [math]2\left(1+\frac{x}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1+\frac{2 x}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because f(x)=1+\frac{3}{x}[/math]
এবং [math]g(x)=2 x[/math]
 [math]go f(x) =g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #249 (ID: 474424)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+2}{x+3}, f[/math] এর রেঞ্জ-

Options:
A. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
B. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]
C. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-1\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{2\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\frac{x+2}{x+3} \\\Rightarrow x y+3 y=x+2 \\\Rightarrow x(y-1)=2-3 y \\\therefore x=\frac{2-3 y}{y-1}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{2-3 y}{y-1} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি [math]y-1 
eq 0 \therefore y 
eq 1[/math]
সুতরাং রেঞ্জ [math]\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #250 (ID: 474425)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান –

Options:
ক. [math]43[/math]
খ. [math]167[/math]
গ. [math]-43[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(x)=(2 x-3)^{2}-2 ; \therefore(gof)(-5)=167[/math]

Explanation:

Question #251 (ID: 474426)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f[/math] এবং [math]g[/math] বাস্তব সংখ্যার ফাংশন। [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x+3[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত। [math](fog) (x)[/math] এর মান —

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}+9 x+7[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}-9 x+7[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2}+2 x+3[/math]
ঙ. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math](fog)(x) =(x+3)^{2}-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+6 x+9-2[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+6 x+7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #252 (ID: 474427)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{2 x-1} ;\left\{x \in \mathbb{R}, x 
eq \frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x-1}{x+3}, \quad x \neq-3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x+3}{2 x-1}, \quad \mathrm{x} \neq 1 / 2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x-1}{x+3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x+3}{2 x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{x+3}{2 x-1}, \quad \mathrm{x} \neq 1 / 2[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\frac{x+3}{2 x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x y-y-x-3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+3}{2 y-1} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{x+3}{2 x-1}, x 
eq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #253 (ID: 474428)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x-3[/math] হলে, [math](gof) (2)[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে কোন দুইটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math](\mathrm{gof})(2)=(\mathrm{fog})(2)[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math](f o g)(2) \neq(\text { gof })(2)[/math]
ঙ. Answer : A & D


Correct Answer: D.[math](f o g)(2) \neq(\text { gof })(2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { (gof) }(x)=2 x+1-3=2 x-2 \therefore \text { (gof) (2) }=2[/math]
এবং [math](f o g)(x)=2(x-3)+1=2 x-5[/math]
 [math]\therefore(fog)(2)=-1[/math]
 এবং [math](\mathrm{gof})(2) 
eq(\mathrm{fog})(2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=x^{3}+3[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(11)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt[3]{5}[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]7[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]f(11) \cdot 11^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(1)=2[/math]

Question #255 (ID: 474430)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}x^{3}+5, \text { যখন } x<0 \\2 x+3, \text { যখন } x \geq 2\end{array}\right.[/math] হলে, [math]f(3)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]32[/math]
B. [math]-32[/math]
C. [math]9[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(2) \cdot 6+3[/math]
 [math]=9[/math]


Explanation:

Question #256 (ID: 474431)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+1}{x-3}(x 
eq 3)[/math] এর বিপরীত ফাংশন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1+3 x}{1-x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1-x}{1+3 x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+3 x}{1-x}(x \neq 1)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-x}{1+3 x}\left(x \neq \frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1+3 x}{1-x}(x \neq 1)[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\frac{x+1}{x-3} \Rightarrow x y-3 y=x+1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x(y-1)=1+3 y \\\therefore f^{-1}(y)=x=\frac{1+3 y}{y-1}, y 
eq 1 \\\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{1+3 x}{x-1}(x 
eq 1)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #257 (ID: 474432)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{f(2)}{f(-1)}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-8[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-8[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(2)=8, \quad f(-1)=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{f(2)}{f(-1)}=-\frac{8}{1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #258 (ID: 474433)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\sin x)[/math] হলে, [math]e^{2 f(x)}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]
C. [math]2(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]
D. [math]2(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\ln (\sin \mathrm{x}) \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{2 \ln (\sin \mathrm{x})}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\ln \left(\sin ^{2} \mathrm{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{2} x=\frac{1}{2}\left(2 \sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #259 (ID: 474434)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(e^{-\sin ^{-1} x}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\pi}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-\pi}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(e^{-\sin ^{-1} x}\right)[/math]
 হলে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\ln \left\{e^{-\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:
