Question #398 (ID: 474303)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x+1)=\frac{x^{2}+1}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f(0)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}+1)=\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}+1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}+1=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(0)=\frac{(-1)^{2}+1}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #399 (ID: 474304)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একই বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত দুটি বলের ক্রিয়ারেখার মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\alpha[/math] এর কোন মানটির জন্য বলদ্বয়ের লব্ধির মান বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. α = 90°
খ. α = 180°
গ. α = 0°
ঘ. α = কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: দুটি বলের লন্দি তখনই সর্বোচ্চ হবে যখন বলদ্বয় একই দিকে ক্রিয়া করবে।Solve : যদি কোনো বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত P ও Q বলের ক্রিয়ারেখার লব্ধির মান W এবং মধ্যবর্তী কোণ α হয় তবে সামান্তরিকের সূত্রানুসারে,[math]\mathrm{W}=\sqrt{\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ \operatorname {cos } \alpha}}[/math]
এখন লব্ধি বৃহত্তম হলে, [math]W= P + Q[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathrm{P}+\mathrm{Q}=\sqrt{\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha} \\\Rightarrow\left(\mathrm{P}+\mathrm{Q)}^{2}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha\right. \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha \\\Rightarrow \cos \alpha=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos \alpha=\cos 0^{\circ} \\\therefore \alpha=0^{\circ}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #400 (ID: 474305)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন, রেঞ্জ এবং বিপরীত ফাংশন নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]R-2, R-\{0\}, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-2}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{2\}, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
গ. [math]R, R, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-2}{2 x+2}[/math]
ঘ. কোনটির নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
 এখানে, x = 2 হলে ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত নয়।তাই এর ডোমেইন , f = R- (2)ধরি, [math]y=f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2} \Rightarrow x y-2 y=2 x-1 \\\Rightarrow x y-2 x=2 y-1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x(y-2)=2 y-1 \\\Rightarrow x=\frac{2 y-1}{y-2} \\\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\frac{2 y-1}{y-2} \\\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
এর ডোমেইন, f = R -{2}f (x) এর রেঞ্জ = R -{2}

Explanation:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
 ফাংশনটির হরে x 2 বিদ্যমান। যদি x-2 এর মান 0 হয়, তবে ফাংশনটি থেকে কোনো মান পাওয়া সম্ভব নয়। কারণ কোনো ভগ্নাংশের হর কখনো 0 হতে পারে না। সহজ কথায় কোনো কিছুকে ০ দ্বারা ভাগ করা সম্ভব নয়। অর্থাৎ, [math]x-2≠0⇒x=2[/math]
যে কারণে ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হয়েছে, R-(2)ডোমেনঃ x এর যেসম মানের জন্য f(x) থেকে Value পাওয়া সম্ভব, সেগুলোই হচ্ছে ফাংশনটির ডোমেন। কিংবা অন্যভাবে বলা যায়, x এর সেসব মানের জন্য f(x) এর মান পাওয়া যায় না, সেগুলো বাস্তব সংখ্যার সেট (R) থেকে বাদ দিলে যা পড়ে থাকে সেগুলোই ডোমেন।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #401 (ID: 474306)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { (fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\text { fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\mathrm{f}\left[\mathrm{g}\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\sin \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

একটি ফাংশন [math]f(x)[/math] যেখানে [math]f(x)=\frac{|x|}{x}[/math] উহার ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R \cup\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R \cap\{0\}[/math]

Question #403 (ID: 474308)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:

Question #404 (ID: 474309)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #405 (ID: 474310)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math] ফাংশনের রেজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math][R-\{0,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন R- {1}এই ডোমেনের মধ্যে f(x) এর মান সর্বদা ঋণাত্মক কারণ [math]x[/math]
 এর [math](x ≠ 1[/math]
 ছাড়া) যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]|1 – x > 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]=(-\infty, 0)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #406 (ID: 474311)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হয়, তবে f একটি-

Options:
ক. এক-এক ফাংশন
খ. জোড় ফাংশন
গ. বিজোড় ফাংশন
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.বিজোড় ফাংশন

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x \quad \therefore f(-x)=\sin (-x)=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})=-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \therefore[/math]
 এটি একটি বিজোড় ফাংশন।

Explanation:

Question #407 (ID: 474312)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1+x+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1+x+x^{2}}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{3}}{x^{4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=\frac{1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x^{4}}}{\frac{1}{x^{2}}}=\frac{x^{4}+x^{2}+1}{x^{2}}=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #412 (ID: 474248)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R → R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-5,4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)=\pm \sqrt{16}=\pm 4=\{-4,4\}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #414 (ID: 474250)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+5, g(x)=x^{2}-2 x+2, h(x)=x^{2}+4 x-21[/math] তিনটি real valued ফাংশন হয় তবে [math]\left(\frac{f+g}{h}\right)[/math] এর [math]\text { domain }[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
B. [math]\mathbb{R}-(4,21\}[/math]
C. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+4 \mathrm{x}-21 ; \mathrm{x}^{2}+4 \mathrm{x}-21=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=(3,-7)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { domain }=\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #415 (ID: 474251)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f=\{(x, y): x \in X, y \in Y[/math] এবং [math]\left.x^{2}+y^{2}=4\right\}[/math] অন্বয়টি কি?

Options:
A. ফাংশন
B. ফাংশন নয়
C. অন্বয়
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.ফাংশন নয়

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4 \Rightarrow y=\pm \sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশন নয় ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #416 (ID: 474252)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{7}+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #417 (ID: 474253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math] এবং [math]x 
eq-\frac{1}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(-2)[/math] এর মান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1} \Rightarrow x-3=2 x y+y \Rightarrow x(1-2 y)=3+y \Rightarrow x=\frac{y+3}{1-2 y} \therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} \therefore f^{-1}(-2) =\frac{-2+3}{1+4}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #418 (ID: 474254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]f(\tan x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan 2 x[/math]
B. [math]\sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} x}{1+\tan ^{2} x}=\cos 2 x[/math]

Explanation:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A→B[/math] এর বিপরীত ফাংশন বিদ্যমান থাকার শর্তসমূহ হলো-

Options:
ক. এক-এক এবং সর্বগ্রাহী উভয় ধরনের ফাংশন
খ. [math]A = B[/math] এবং এক-এক ফাংশন
গ. [math]B = A[/math] এবং সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{A} \subset \mathrm{B},[/math] এক-এক এবং সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন


Correct Answer: A.এক-এক এবং সর্বগ্রাহী উভয় ধরনের ফাংশন

Solution:

Question #420 (ID: 474256)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হয়, তবে f একটি-

Options:
ক. এক-এক ফাংশন
খ. জোড় ফাংশন
গ. বিজোড় ফাংশন
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.বিজোড় ফাংশন

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x \quad \therefore f(-x)=\sin (-x)=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})=-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \therefore[/math]
 এটি একটি বিজোড় ফাংশন।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #421 (ID: 474257)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{2}+6}[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt[6]{x+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6 \Rightarrow y=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #422 (ID: 474258)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #423 (ID: 474259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #424 (ID: 474260)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর সমান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+4)[/math]
খ. [math](x+4)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(4-x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4 ; y=3 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #425 (ID: 474261)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R → R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-5,4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)=\pm \sqrt{16}=\pm 4=\{-4,4\}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #426 (ID: 474262)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=-|x|[/math] তাহলে [math]f[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-1, \infty),(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in R: x \geq 0\},\{x \in R: x \leq 0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R,(-\infty, 0][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R,(-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশন [math]y = f(x) = -|x|[/math] হল একটি স্বপ্নজাদা ফাংশন, যা একটি সমতলের উপর সিমেট্রিক।এটি সমতলের উপর সিমেট্রিক হওয়া মানে হল ফাংশনের মান যখনই x এর মান নেগেটিভ, তখন তা পজিটিভ হয় এবং যখন x এর মান পজিটিভ, তখন তা নেগেটিভ হয়। এরপরেও, আমরা ফাংশনটি একটি স্বপ্নজাদা ফাংশন বলে কথা বলেছি, যা এর মান ক্ষুদ্রতম মানে হয়। তাই, আমরা বলতে পারি যে এই ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ হল [0, নেগেটিভ অসীম] এবং ডোমেন হল সমস্ত রশিমযুক্ত সংখ্যাগুলি।অর্থাৎ,ডোমেইন: সমস্ত রশিমযুক্ত সংখ্যাগুলি।রেঞ্জ: [0, নেগেটিভ অসীম]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]-4 \leq x \leq 4[/math]
খ. [math]-4
গ. [math]-4>x>4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4 \geq x \geq 4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-4

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটি বাস্তব [math]16-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}4 \therefore-4

Question #429 (ID: 474265)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{-4,4\}, B=\{0,4\}[/math] এবং [math]x^{2}+4 y^{2}=16[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত [math]\mathbf{R}: \mathbf{A} \rightarrow \mathbf{B}[/math] অন্বয়টি কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]
B. [math]\{(4,0)\}[/math]
C. [math]\{(0,4)\}[/math]
D. [math]\{(-4,0),(4,4)\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=-4[/math]
 হলে, [math]y^{2}=\frac{16-(-4)^{2}}{4}=0 \Rightarrow y=0[/math]
 [math]x = + 4[/math]
 হলে, [math]y^{2}=\frac{16-4^{2}}{4}=0 \Rightarrow y=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অন্বয়টি = [math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #430 (ID: 474266)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A=R-\{3\}, B=R-\{1\}, f: A \rightarrow B, f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] তবে [math]f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)+f^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 / 3[/math]
B. [math]4 / 3[/math]
C. [math]1 / 3[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of thesc }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]+f^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{3}{2}-2}{\frac{3}{2}-3}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{3 \times \frac{2}{3}-2}{\frac{2}{3}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{-1}{2}}{\frac{-3}{2}}+0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2} \times \frac{2}{-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #431 (ID: 474267)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=2 x^{4}-4 \text { and } g(x)=\sqrt{\frac{x-2}{\sqrt{2}}} \text {, then what is the value of }(f \circ g)(5) ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt[2]{2}[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[2]{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(5)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(5))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt{\frac{5-2}{\sqrt{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(\sqrt{\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}}\right)^{4}-4[/math]
 [math]=9-4=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #432 (ID: 474268)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x+x^{-1}[/math] হয়,তাহলে [math]\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\}^{2}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
ক. [math]3+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]2-f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]2+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]4+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+x^{-1}[/math]
 [math];\{f(x)\}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}+2[/math]
 [math]\cdot x \cdot \frac{1}{x}=x^{2}+x^{-2}+2[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}\right)+2[/math]


Explanation:

খ. [math]5 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]3 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4 \pi[/math]

 এর পর্যায় হবে [math]\frac{2 \pi}{a}[/math]

Question #438 (ID: 474274)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\sin x)[/math] এবং [math]\phi(x)=\ln (\cos x)[/math] হলে [math]e^{2 f(x)}+e^{2 \phi(x)}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos ^{2} x-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin 2 x}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]e^{2 f(x)}+e^{2 g(x)}[/math]
 [math]=e^{2 \ln \sin x}[/math]
 [math]+e^{2 \ln \cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]+\cos ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #439 (ID: 474275)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] এবং [math]g: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে যথাক্রমে [math](f(x)=2 x-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+6[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]g(g(x))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]
B. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]4 x^{2}-20 x+31[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-20 x+30[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(g(x))=\left(x^{2}+6\right)^{2}+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+12 x^{2}+36+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
যদি, [math]A=[-1,1][/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{A} \rightarrow \mathrm{A}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তাহলে-

Options:
A. f একটি সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন
B. f একটি সংযোজিত ফাংশন
C. f একটি ধ্রুব ফাংশন

Question #441 (ID: 474277)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\mathrm{A}=\mathrm{R}-\{3\}, \mathrm{B}=\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math] এবং [math]f: A \rightarrow B[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x-3 y=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-1)=3 y-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{3 y-2}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #442 (ID: 474278)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-8[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(y+8)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(y-8)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]

Solution:
যদি, [math]f(x)=a x+b[/math]
 হয়, [math]f^{-1}(x)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{x-b}{a}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #443 (ID: 474279)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-2}[/math] ফাংশনটির চারণ স্থল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x=2[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]x<2[/math]
ঘ. [math]x<-2[/math]
ঙ. Answer : B & D


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \geq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #444 (ID: 474280)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. $-2
খ. [math]-2 \leq x<2[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. $-2
ঙ. [math]-\infty \leq x \leq \infty[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: x এর যেসব value এর জন্য y অর্থাৎ f(x) এর মান পাওয়া সম্ভব - সেগুলোই f(x) এর ডোমেন ।Solve: [math]y=f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটির y এর value তখনই পাওয় যাবে, যখন [math]\sqrt{}[/math]
 এর ভিতরের মান অঋণাত্নক হবে। অর্থাৎ [math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 4 \geq x^{2} \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0 \\\Rightarrow(x+2)(x-2) \leq 0\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math](x + 2) ≤ 0[/math]
 এবং [math](x – 2 ) ≤ 0[/math]
 [math]⇒ x > - 2[/math]
 এবং [math]x ≤ 2[/math]
দেখা যাচ্ছে f(x) কে সজ্ঞায়িত হতে হলে x এর মান – 2 থেকে বড় এবং 2থেকে ছোট হতে হবে ।অর্থাৎ ডোমেন [math]=-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=(-\infty, 0) \therefore f(x)<0 \text {, for all } x[/math]

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে g(f(x)) এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]
খ. [math]7 x^{2}+2[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+2 x-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2}-2 x+3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:

Question #447 (ID: 474283)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #449 (ID: 474285)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x+4}[/math] ফাংশনটির Domain Range কত?

Options:
A. [math]R[/math]
B. [math]x>4[/math]
C. [math]x<4[/math]
D. [math]x \geq-4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x \geq-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-4[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ x = -4 হলে,[math]f(x) = 0 \ যখন, x > -4, f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(a+1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a}+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} \Rightarrow f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1}=e[/math]

Question #455 (ID: 474136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\text { gof }(-2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]65[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]25[/math]
ঙ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f(-2)=g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left\{(-2)^{2}-2|-2|\right\}^{2}[/math]
 [math]+1=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #456 (ID: 474137)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1} \Rightarrow x=1+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=1+\mathrm{y}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=1+2^{2}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #457 (ID: 474138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]

Question #459 (ID: 474140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math](x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}}{1+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{2}}}=\frac{3-1}{1+2}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #460 (ID: 474141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুতে [math]60°[/math] কোণে ক্রিয়ারত দুইটি সমান বলকে একই বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত [math]15N[/math] বলের সাহায্যে ভারসাম্যে রাখলে সমান বলের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
গ. [math]5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
ঙ. [math]6 \mathrm{~N}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{R}^{2}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{P}^{2}+2 \mathrm{P}^{2} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(15)^{2}=2 \mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\cos 60^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{P}[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\cot x a^{\operatorname{In}(\cos x)}[/math]
খ. [math]-\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)} I n a[/math]
গ. [math]\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\operatorname{cotx} a^{I n(\cos x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)} I n a[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=a^{\ln (\cos x)} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \ln a \cdot \tan x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #463 (ID: 474144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{1+x \ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)\right]^{\frac{1}{x}}=2 b \sin ^{2} \theta, b>0[/math] এবং [math]\theta \in(-\pi, \pi)[/math] হয় তবে [math]\theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left[1+x \ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)\right]^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=e^{\ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=1+b^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1+b^{2}=2 b \sin ^{2} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{2} \theta=\frac{1+b^{2}}{2 b}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #464 (ID: 474145)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x-2)=x^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-2=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=z+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(z)[/math]
 [math]=(z+2)^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(0)[/math]
 [math]=(2)^{3}-3=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

ক. [math][0,3][/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,4][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=[-4,4] \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=[0,2][/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{a} \sqrt{2}=\frac{1}{6}[/math] হ্লে [math]a[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{a} \sqrt{2}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{\frac{1}{6}}=\sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=(\sqrt{2})^{6}=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #467 (ID: 474148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3+\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 x-1}{2(x+1)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #469 (ID: 474150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}-2}{\mathrm{x}-3} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{3 \mathrm{x}-2}{\mathrm{x}-1} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #470 (ID: 474151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+6[/math] হলে, [math](\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(2)=2 \times 2-5[/math]
 [math]=-1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathrm{gof})(2)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(2))[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{2}+6=7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #471 (ID: 474152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]f(f(x))[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{x}}=x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #472 (ID: 474153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(\cos 2 \theta)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]
B. [math]\cot ^{2} \theta[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{2} \theta[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{2} \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(\cos 2 \theta)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\cos 2 \theta}{1+\cos 2 \theta}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \theta}{2 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]


Explanation:

Question #473 (ID: 474154)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] তাহলে [math]f(x)=3 x^{2}[/math] কোন প্রকারের ফাংশন?

Options:
A. এক-এক
B. এক-এক এবং সার্বিক
C. সার্বিক
D. সার্বিক নয়


Correct Answer: D.সার্বিক নয়

Solution:
[math]x=1, - 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f (x) = 3[/math]
 হবে যা [math]f (x)[/math]
 এক এক নয়, ডোমনের সকল মান রেঞ্জের সকল মানের প্রতিচ্ছবি নয় তাই সার্বিক নয়।

Explanation:

Question #474 (ID: 474155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(1+x)[/math] এর মান হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(x+1)}{x+2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x+2}{x(x+1)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x+1}{x(x+2)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(1+x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{1+x}}{1+\frac{1}{1+x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+x-1}{1+x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #475 (ID: 474156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{2 x-1}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\frac{f(x)+1}{f(x)-1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x[/math]
খ. [math]2x[/math]
গ. [math]3 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})-1}=\frac{\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1}{2 \mathrm{x}-1}+1}{\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1}{2 \mathrm{x}-1}-1}=\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1+2 \mathrm{x}-1}{2 \mathrm{x}+1-2 \mathrm{x}+1}=\frac{4 \mathrm{x}}{2}=2 \mathrm{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #476 (ID: 474157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x[/math] 2x হলে f(x + 3)-f(x - 1) =?

Options:
A. [math]f(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(4)[/math]
D. [math]f(6)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x+3)-f(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=2(x+3)-2(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=2 x+6-2 x+2=8[/math]
 [math]=f(4)[/math]
 [math]\because f(4)=2 \times 4=8[/math]


Explanation:

A. [math]-6[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:

 [math]f(2)=|(1-4)|-3=|-3|-3=3-3=0[/math]

Question #478 (ID: 474159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R}^{\#} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}^{\#}[/math] দ্বারা [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}3 x-1 \text { if } x>3 \\x^{2}-2 \text { if }-2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 \text { if } x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math] সূচিত হলে, [math]f(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(-3)[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=2(-3)+3[/math]
 [math]=-6+3[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=2(-3)+3[/math]
 [math]=-6+3[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]


Explanation:

[math]f(x)=5 x-3,(x \in R)[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{6}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]-12[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]5 x-3=3 \Rightarrow x=\frac{6}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(3)=\frac{6}{5}[/math]

Question #480 (ID: 474161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #481 (ID: 474162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #482 (ID: 474163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-9}{x-3}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-3) \cup(3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\{0, \infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{3\}[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x-3 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=R-\{3\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R - {6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #483 (ID: 474164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{3 x-2}[/math] এর ডোমেন -

Options:
A. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
B. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
C. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-2 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #484 (ID: 474165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{-2,0,1,2,3\}, B=\{0,1,2,4,6,9\}[/math] সেট দুইটির [math]f: A→B[/math] এবং [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{1,2,6,9\}[/math]
খ. [math]{0, 3, 4, 6}[/math]
গ. [math]{0,1,4,9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]{-1,..., 9}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]{0,1,4,9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x^{2} \\f(-2)=(-2)^{2}=4 \\f(0)=0^{2}=0 \\f(1)=1^{2}=1 \\f(2)=2^{2}=4 \\f(3)=3^{2}=9\end{array}[/math]
ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ [math]= {0, 1, 4, 9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #485 (ID: 474166)

Question:
কোন লেখচিত্রটি মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় না?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\sin x[/math]
খ. [math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]y=\tan x[/math]
ঘ. সব কয়টিই


Correct Answer: B.[math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math] লেখচিত্রটি মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় না।

Question #486 (ID: 474167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{\sqrt{x^{5}-32}}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][0, \infty),(0,1][/math]
খ. [math][2, \infty),(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math][0, \infty),(0, \infty][/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
এবং [math]x^{5}-32 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{5} \geq 2^{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math][2, \infty)[/math]
 [math]x = 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x>2[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #487 (ID: 474168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে [math]|f(\mathbf{x})+\mathbf{g}(\mathbf{x})|[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে:

Options:
A. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
B. [math](0,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
D. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]|f(x)+g(x)|=\left|x+\frac{1}{x}\right|, x 
eq 0[/math]
 হলে, সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য ফাংশন সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #488 (ID: 474169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\mathbf{a x}+\mathbf{b}[/math] হলে, [math]f'[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]R,R[/math]
খ. [math]R,\{a\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,\{x \in R: x \geq a\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in R: x>a\}, R[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]R,\{a\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=a x+b \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=a[/math]
 [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল মানের জন্য [math]f' (x) = a[/math]
 প্রযোজ্য,[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]R[/math]
 এবং [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল মানের জন্য [math]\mathbf{f}^{\prime}(\mathbf{x})=\mathbf{a} \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= {a}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #489 (ID: 474170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-4}[/math] এর ডোমেন সেট-

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\{2,-2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
f(x) সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x^{2}-4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \geq 4 \Rightarrow|x| \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 অথবা [math]x \leq-2 \quad \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=\{y \in R: y \geq 0\}=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #490 (ID: 474171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 x-3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x+3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x}{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{3}{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}+3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}+3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #491 (ID: 474172)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=\frac{2+3 x}{3-2 x} \text { then the value of } f^{-1}(x) \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2-3 x}{2 x-3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 x+2}{3-2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x-3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2+3 x}{3-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 y-2 x y[/math]
 [math]=2+3 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 y-2}{3+2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #492 (ID: 474173)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x \in R: 2 x^{2}-7 x+3 \leq 0\right\}[/math] - হলে লঘিষ্ঠ উর্ধ্বসীমা ( Sup S ) কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 x^{2}-7 x+3 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(2 x-1) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 লঘিষ্ঠ উর্ধ্বসীমা [math]3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]R-\left\{\frac{(2 n+1) \pi}{2} ; n \in z\right\}[/math]

Question #494 (ID: 474175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
পাশের বাস্তব ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ কত? [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
ক. [math][-3,3],[0,3][/math]
খ. [math][0,3],[3,-3][/math]
গ. [math][3,-3],[0,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0],[3,0][/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-3,3],[0,3][/math]

Solution:
[math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9 \\\Rightarrow|x|^{2} \leq 9 \\\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3 \\\mathrm{D}_{\mathrm{f}}=[-3,3] \\\mathrm{R}_{\max }=[0,3]\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #496 (ID: 474178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{2}+6}[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt[6]{x+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6 \Rightarrow y=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

ঘ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:

 ডোমেন [math](1, \infty)[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][1, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x \geq 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]exist[/math]
 করে। [math]\text { 27. } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math]
 দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে,সংযোজিত ফাংশন [math]gof[/math]
 এর ডোমেন কত?

Question #500 (ID: 474182)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4,4][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,4][/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math] ও [math][0,1][/math]
ঘ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}} \therefore|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #501 (ID: 474183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #502 (ID: 474184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #503 (ID: 474185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #504 (ID: 474186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4,4][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,4][/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math] ও [math][0,1][/math]
ঘ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}} \therefore|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ [math]f = B[/math]
খ. রেঞ্জ [math]\mathrm{f} \subset \mathrm{B}[/math]
গ. রেঞ্জ [math]f = A[/math]
ঘ. রেঞ্জ [math]f⊆ B[/math]


Correct Answer: D.রেঞ্জ [math]f⊆ B[/math]

Question #506 (ID: 474188)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)=\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=32[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{3}+5=32 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{3}=27[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #507 (ID: 474189)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(5)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pm 1[/math]
B. [math]\pm 2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pm 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1 ;[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{f}^{-1}(5)=\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}+1=5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #508 (ID: 474190)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}\{0\}=\{\mathrm{i},-\mathrm{i}\}[/math]
B. [math]f^{-1}(0)=\{\emptyset\}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x^{2}+1 \\y=x^{2}+1 \\x^{2}=y-1 \\x=\pm \sqrt{y-1}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}-1} \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}-1} \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\pm \sqrt{0-1}=\pm \mathrm{i}\end{array}[/math]
কিন্তু [math]\pm \mathrm{i} 
otin \mathrm{R} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]18[/math]
C. [math]-4[/math]
D. [math]14[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x| ; g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math]

Question #510 (ID: 474192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](x + y, 1)[/math] এবং [math](3, x - y)[/math] ক্রমজোড় দুইটি সমান হলে, x ও y এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math](2,1)[/math]
খ. [math](0,2)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math](2,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+y=3[/math]
 [math]\frac{x-y=1}{(+) 2 x=4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 \quad \therefore y=\frac{3-2}{2}=1 ; \quad(x, y)=(2,1)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #511 (ID: 474193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,4,5\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{2,3,5,6,7\}[/math] হলে, [math](A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]
B. [math]\{1,3,6,7\}[/math]
C. [math]\{2,4,6,7\}[/math]
D. [math]\{1,3,4,6\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,4,5\},[/math]
 [math]B=\{2,3,5,6,7\} ;[/math]
 [math]A / B=\{1,4\} ;[/math]
 [math]B / A=\{6,7\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math]
 [math]=\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনের [math]x = c[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান হলে নিম্নের কোন শর্তটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c})<\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c}+\mathrm{h})[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c})+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c}+\mathrm{h})>0[/math]
গ. [math]f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(c)-f(c+h)<0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(c)>f(c+h) \Rightarrow f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]

Question #513 (ID: 474195)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\left|1-x^{3}\right|+1[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\left|1-x^{3}\right|+1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(2)=\left|1-2^{3}\right|+1[/math]
 [math]=|1-8|+1=|-7|+1[/math]
 [math]=7+1=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #514 (ID: 474196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math] হলে, [math]f(\pi+x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{3} x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
C. [math]f(x)[/math]
D. [math]f(x)+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(\pi+x)=\cos ^{3}(\pi+x) \sin (\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=(-\cos x)^{3}(-\sin x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:
