Question #515 (ID: 474197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=x^{3}+1, x \in R[/math] এর জন্য [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]x^{1 / 3}-1[/math]
গ. [math]\left(x^{3}+1\right)^{-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+1=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x^{3}+1 \Rightarrow x^{3}=y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\sqrt[3]{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #516 (ID: 474198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x[/math]
B. [math]\cos x[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{1+\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(2 \times \frac{x}{2}\right)=\cos x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #517 (ID: 474199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] যা [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত, ফাংশনটি-

Options:
A. ওয়ান-ওয়ান
B. অনটু
C. ধ্রুবক
D. ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়


Correct Answer: D.ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x},-1 \in R[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]f(-1)=\sqrt{-1}[/math]
, অবাস্তব [math]
otin \mathrm{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়।

Question #518 (ID: 474200)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিম্নের কোনটি এক-এক ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]f x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=\sin x+3[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=\cos x-5[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=x^{3}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(x)=x^{3}-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Option } D[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=x^{3}-1=(x-1)\left(x^{2}+x+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \in R[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \in \mathrm{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\dot{\mathrm{x}}^{3}-1[/math]
 এক-এক ফাংশন

Explanation:

Question:
[math]\text { Suppose } f(x)=\sqrt{x}+1 \text {, then } f(x+h)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{x}+h+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{h}}+1[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{x+h+1}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+\sqrt{\mathrm{h}+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{h}}+1[/math]

Solution:

Question #520 (ID: 474202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\pi+\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{3} x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
C. [math]f(x)[/math]
D. [math]f(x)+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{3}(\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]\sin (\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=(-\cos x)^{3}(-\sin x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{3} x \sin x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #521 (ID: 474203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] $এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]secx[/math]
B. [math]Bcosx[/math]
C. [math]tan2x[/math]
D. [math]cos2x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]Bcosx[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}} \Rightarrow f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{1+\tan 2 \frac{x}{2}}=\cos x[/math]

Question #522 (ID: 474204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(32)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+5=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}=y-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sqrt[3]{y-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{x}-5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{32-5}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #523 (ID: 474205)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathbf{f : R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}\{0\}=\{\mathrm{i},-\mathrm{i}\}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\{\varnothing\}[/math]
C. [math]f^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]f^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{y-1}[/math]
 [math]f^{-1}(y)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{y-1} \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{0-1}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{-1}= \pm \mathrm{i}[/math]
 [অবাস্তব][math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #524 (ID: 474206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: R \rightarrow R, g(x)=3-5 x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\left(f^{-1} 0 g\right)(x)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3 x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3 x}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{5 x}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(f^{-1}og\right) x=f^{-1}(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f^{-1}(3-5 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3-5 x-3}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #525 (ID: 474207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}-2 x,-1 \leq x<6[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ বের কর।

Options:
ক. [math]-1
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=3[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}-2 x,-1 \leq x \leq 6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+2[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(6)=\frac{36}{2}-12=18-12=6[/math]
 [math]0 \in-1 \leq x<6 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(0)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \in-1 \leq x \leq 6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(2)=2-4=-2[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #526 (ID: 474208)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 x-3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x+3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x}{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{3}{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}+3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}+3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][1, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x \geq 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]exist[/math]
 করে। [math]\text { 27. } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math]
 দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে,সংযোজিত ফাংশন [math]gof[/math]
 এর ডোমেন কত?

Question #528 (ID: 474210)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x},(x[/math] বাস্তব) এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} \in \Re[/math]
 যখন [math]1-2 x 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]y=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y-2 x y=x+3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-3=x(1+2 y)[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{y-3}{1+2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \in \mathfrak{\Re} \text { if } 1+2 y 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y 
eq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom } f=\Re-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\text {. Range } f=\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=x^{3}+3 x^{2}-45 x+10[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]-5[/math]
গ. [math]-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}+6 x-45[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=3,-5[/math]
এখন, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x+6 ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(3)[/math]
 [math]=14>0 ; f^{\prime \prime}(-5)[/math]
 [math]=-24<0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #532 (ID: 474214)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #533 (ID: 474215)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #535 (ID: 474217)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (x)[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{a}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-f(a)[/math]
B. [math]f(a)[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(a)=\ln a \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{1}{a}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{1}{a}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(a^{-1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\ln a=-f(a)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #536 (ID: 474218)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নীচের কোনটি ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[y \geq 0][/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[x \geq 0][/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4 a x[/math]
ঙ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[x \leq 0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[y \geq 0][/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1 \Rightarrow y^{2}=1-x^{2} \Rightarrow y=\pm \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]

Question #537 (ID: 474219)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(0)=-1, f(1)=2[/math] এবং [math]f(n+1)=f(n)-f(n-1)[/math] হলে, [math]f(4)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(4)=f(3)-f(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(2)[/math]
 [math]-f(1)-f(1)+f(0)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)-f(0)-f(1)[/math]
 [math]-f(1)+f(0)[/math]
 [math]=-f(1)=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #538 (ID: 474220)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x-|x|}[/math] হলে, ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]|x \in R:-\infty
খ. [math]|x \in I R: x \neq 1|[/math]
গ. [math]|x \in I R: x>0|[/math]
ঘ. [math]|x \in I R: x \neq 0|[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]|x \in R:-\infty

Solution:
যদি [math]x > 0[/math]
 হয় তাহলে [math](x-|x|)=0 \text { and } \frac{x}{x-|x|} \text { undefine }[/math]
 হয় তাই, [math]x[/math]
 সবসময় [math]\text { negative } \therefore \mathrm{x}<0 \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #539 (ID: 474221)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right) + f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{p}{q}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{q}{p}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{q}{p+q}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\mathrm{p}}{\mathrm{p}+\mathrm{q}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{p}{q}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p}{p+q} ;[/math]
 [math]f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q}{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right)+f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p}{q}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #540 (ID: 474222)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\left(x^{3}+8\right)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. (-2, \infty),[0, \infty)$
খ. [math][0, \infty],(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](8,-\infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]–2[/math]
 থেকে [math]\infty[/math]
 পর্যন্ত [math]f(x)=\sqrt{\left(x^{3}+8\right)}[/math]
 এর বাস্তব মান থাকে। তখন [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর মান [math]0[/math]
 থেকে [math]\infty[/math]
 পর্যন্ত হয়।অন্যভাবে, [math]y=\sqrt{x^{3}+8} \text { Or, } y^{2}-8=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } x=\sqrt[3]{y^{2}-8}[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]y^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]-2[/math]
 এবং সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]\propto[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[-2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

যদি [math]A={x|x+4=4}[/math] এবং [math]B=\left\{x \mid x^{2}=16\right.[/math] এবং [math]2x=6[/math] হয়, তবে [math]A- B[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\phi[/math]
খ. [math]\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\{0\} ; B=\{\pm 4,3\} \therefore A-B=\{0\}[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1, h(x)=x+2[/math] হলে [math]\text { hogof(-3) =? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]730[/math]
B. [math]731[/math]
C. [math]732[/math]
D. [math]733[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]732[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{hog}(-3)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \operatorname{hog}(9)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow h\left(9^{3}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow h(730)=730+2=732[/math]

Question #544 (ID: 474226)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]\mathbf{f : R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math][-4,4][/math]
গ. [math](-4,4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4,4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(16)=x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm 4 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(16)=[-4,4\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #546 (ID: 474228)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math] দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে সংযোজিত ফাংশন g of এর ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. (-1, 1)
খ. (2,∞)
গ. (-∞, ∞)
ঘ. (∞, 2)
ঙ. (−1, 1)


Correct Answer: E. (−1, 1)

Solution:
Hints: [math]\text { gof }=g(f(x)) ; x[/math]
 x এর যেসব মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত তার সেটকে ঐ ফাংশনের ডোমেইন বলে ।Solve: [math]\operatorname{gof}=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
এখন, [math]g\left(x^{2}+1\right)=\sqrt{2-\left(x^{2}+1\right)}=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
এখন, [math]g\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 সঙ্গায়িত হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]
 :: ডোমেন: [math]f=[-1,1][/math]


Explanation:
ডোমেন মানে হচ্ছে x এর যে সকল মানের জন্য ফাংশনটির y থেকে মান পাওয়া যায়।এখানে, [math]\operatorname{gof}(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি থেকে value পেতে হলে [math]\sqrt{ }[/math]
 এর - ভিতরের মান 0 কিংবা 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে।[math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-1 \leq 0 \Rightarrow(x+1)(x-1) \leq 0[/math]
 এখানে দুটি সংখ্যা (x+1) ও (x-1) এর গুণফল তখনই ঋণাত্নক হবে যখন সংখ্যা দুটির একটি ধনাত্নক ও একটি ঋণাত্নক হবে। কিন্তু এখানে (x+1) যেহেতু (x-1) এর চেয়ে বৃহত্তর, সেহেতু (x+1)-ই ধনাত্নক আর বাকীটা ঋণাত্মক ।· x + 1 > 0 ⇒ x > -1 এবং x-1<0 ⇒ x < 1অসমতাদ্বয়কে একত্রিত করে পাই, − 1 ≤ x ≤ 1অর্থাৎ ফাংশনটি থেকে Value পাইতে হলে x এর মান – 1 থেকে বড় বা - সমান কিন্তু 1 থেকে ছোট বা সমান হতে হবে। ইহাই ফাংশনটির ডোমেন।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #547 (ID: 474229)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
What is the range of [math]y = |x-2|+3[/math]

Options:
A. [math][3, \infty)[/math]
B. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
D. [math][-3, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][3, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x[/math]
 এর মান 2 হলে, [math]y = 3[/math]
সুতরাং রেঞ্জ 3 থেকে শুরু হয়ে অসীম পর্যন্ত হবে। [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ, [math]R_{y}=[3, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #548 (ID: 474230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{3}+8}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math](8,-\infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0, \infty],(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty),[1, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
ঙ. [math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+8 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x+2)\left(x^{2}-2 x+4\right) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore D_{f}=[-2, \infty)[/math]
এবং [math]R_{f}=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #549 (ID: 474231)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math] দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে সংযোজিত ফাংশন gof এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,1)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f=\sqrt{2-\left(x^{2}+1\right)}=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1 \Rightarrow|x| \leq 1 \Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 gof এর ডোমেন = [-1, 1]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} (x[/math] বাস্তব) এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}}, \frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}, \frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]D_{f}=R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\},[/math]
 ও [math]\text { Range, } R_{f}=R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Question #551 (ID: 474233)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Question #552 (ID: 474234)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #553 (ID: 474235)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #554 (ID: 474236)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math] হলে, [math]f(-4)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]
ঙ. [math]32[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]16[/math]

Solution:
Hints: [math]f(x+p)=a x^{2}+b x+c[/math]
 হলে [math]f(q)[/math]
 এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]x + p = q[/math]
 ধরে [math]x[/math]
 এর মান বের করে সেই মান প্রদত্ত ফাংশনে বসাতে হয়।Solve : [math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math]
 [math]f(-4)[/math]
 এর ক্ষেত্রে, [math]x-2=-4 \Rightarrow x=-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-4)=(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+8=4+4+8=16[/math]


Explanation:
এধরনের ফাংশনে x এর পরিবর্তে প্রদত্ত মান (এখানে – 4 ) বসিয়ে অঙ্ক - করলে হবে না। কারণ এ ধরনের ফাংশন f(x) আকারে না থেকে [math]f(x \pm a)[/math] আকারে থাকে। তাই প্রথমে f এর ভেতরের অংশে x এর মান বের করে নিতে হয় । তারপর সেই মান (এ অঙ্কে – 2 ) বসিয়ে সমাধান করতে হয় ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #555 (ID: 474237)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=(1 / x)+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}-1[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
B. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
D. [math](1, \infty)[/math]
E. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}+\sqrt{x}-1[/math]
 এক্ষেত্রে [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
 থাকার দরুন অবশ্যই [math]x \geq 0[/math]
আবার, [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 থাকার জন্য [math]x 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]=(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:
ডোমেন কোনো [math]x = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x > 0[/math]
?ডোমেন মানে হচ্ছে x এর যেসব মান ফাংশনটিতে বসানো সম্ভব। খেয়াল করে দেখো, ফাংশনটি হচ্ছে [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}+\sqrt{x}-1[/math]
ফাংশনটির একটি পদ [math]\frac{1}{x} ; x[/math]
 এর মান যদি 0 হয় তবে এ পদ থেকে কোনো X মান পাওয়া সম্ভব না।ফাংশনটির আরেকটি পদ [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
 যদি x এর মান ঋণাত্নক হয় তবে এ পদ থেকেও Xমান পাওয়া সম্ভব না। কারণ [math]Normally[/math]
 ঋণাত্নক সংখ্যার বর্গমূল সম্ভব নয় ।আর তাই ডোমেন হয়েছে 0 এর চেয়ে বড় যেকোনো সংখ্যা। এ বিষয়টাকেই প্রকাশ করা হয় (0, ∞ ) দ্বারা।লক্ষণীয় (0, ∞ ) এ প্রথম বন্ধনী ব্যবহৃত হয়েছে। এর অর্থ এটা খোলা ব্যবধি । (0 এর অর্থ 0 বাদে তার পরের মান। ) যেহেতু ডোমেন না তাই একে বাদ দেওয়া হয়েছে। মনে রাখা দরকার, আবদ্ধ ব্যবধি বুঝানোর জন্য তৃতীয় বন্ধনী ব্যবহৃত হয়। আবার x > 0 বলতে ধনাত্মক যেকোন মান (পূর্ণসংখ্যার স্কেলে) সজ্ঞায়িত। সংখ্যা খেলে তাকে + ∞ পর্যন্ত প্রকাশ করা হয় বিধায় এক্ষেত্রে ডোমেন ∞ পর্যন্ত প্রকাশ করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #556 (ID: 474238)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+2 x-3[/math] হলে [math]g(f(-1))[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]f(-1)=(-1)^{2}+3|-1|-5[/math]
 [math]=1+3-5=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-1))[/math]
 [math]=g(-1)=(-1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]+2(-1)-3[/math]
 [math]=1-2-3=-4[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x-4[/math] হলে, [math]\text { gof (2) }[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]11[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]11[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { gof }[/math]
 [math]=3\left(x^{2}+2 x-3\right)-4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \operatorname{gof}(2)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(2^{2}+2.2-3\right)-4=11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #559 (ID: 474242)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathrm{R}-\{1\} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}-\{2\}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+3}{x-1}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে, [math]f^{-1}(-1)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2 / 3[/math]
B. [math]2 / 3[/math]
C. [math]3 / 4[/math]
D. [math]2 / 5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=f^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2 x+3}{x-1}=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-2 / 3[/math]


Explanation:

খ. [math]\operatorname{IR}-\{2\}[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]

Question #561 (ID: 474244)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর সমান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+4)[/math]
খ. [math](x+4)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(4-x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4 ; y=3 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #562 (ID: 474245)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(2 x)=\ln (1+x)[/math] তবে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x>-1[/math]
খ. [math]0
গ. [math]x>-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]1


Correct Answer: C.[math]x>-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } 2 \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(1+\frac{\mathrm{y}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\ln \left(1+\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1+\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}>-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

গ. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f(c) = d[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f(c) = d, f(c) = a[/math]

Question #564 (ID: 474058)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x-\tan x[/math] হচ্ছে একটি-

Options:
ক. [math]Odd function[/math]
খ. [math]Even function[/math]
গ. [math]Imaginary function[/math]
ঘ. [math]Complex function[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]Odd function[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) = x - tanx[/math]
 [math]→ f(-x)=-x-tan (-x) = x + tan x = -(x-tanx) = f(x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি [math]odd function[/math]
 (বা অযুগ্ম বা বিজোড়) ফাংশন

Explanation:

Question #565 (ID: 474059)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] হলে [math]f(x y)=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]f(x)+f(y)[/math]
B. [math]f(x)f(y)[/math]
C. [math]f(x) f(y)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{f(x)}{f(y)}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]f(x)+f(y)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f(y)=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{xy})=\ln (\mathrm{xy})=\ln \mathrm{x}+\ln \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #566 (ID: 474060)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Question #567 (ID: 474061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(2 x-1)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4x-7[/math]
খ. [math]2x-5[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7-4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4x-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math]
ধরি, [math]x+2=2 y-1 \Rightarrow x=2 y-3[/math]
(ii) নং এ বসিয়ে, [math]f(2(2 y-3)-1)=2 y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(4 \mathrm{y}-7)=2 \mathrm{y}-1 \Rightarrow 4 \mathrm{y}-7=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1)[/math]
 [math]y[/math]
 এর পরিবর্তে [math]x[/math]
 বসিয়ে পাই, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)=4 \mathrm{x}-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #568 (ID: 474062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\infty[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y-2 y=3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-3)=2 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{2 y}{y-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\frac{2 y}{y-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(3)=\frac{2 \times 3}{3-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3}{0}=\infty[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #569 (ID: 474064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #570 (ID: 474065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #571 (ID: 474066)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 x+3, x<0[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]3+9 x[/math]
D. [math]x+3, x>0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x+3, x>0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f(\sqrt{x})=(\sqrt{x})^{2}+3=x+3[/math]

Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Question #573 (ID: 474068)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #574 (ID: 474069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2} ; f(x)[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 \sin x \cos x-8 \sin x \cos x=-2 \sin x \cos x=-\sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2 \cos 2 x\end{array}[/math]
লঘু-গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin 2 x=0 \Rightarrow 2 x=0, \pi \quad \therefore x=0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(0)=-20 \text {, }[/math]
 লঘুমান বা সর্ব নিম্নমান হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান = [math]3 \sin ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}+4 \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #575 (ID: 474070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:

Question #576 (ID: 474071)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #577 (ID: 474072)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(6)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x-2)=x^{3}-3[/math]
উভয় পক্ষে , [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f^{-1}(1-2)=1^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=1-3=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #578 (ID: 474073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|x|}}[/math] এর ডোমেন-

Options:
A. [math][0,+\infty)[/math]
B. [math](0,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
D. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=R-\{0\}=(-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math](0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #579 (ID: 474074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{7 x-3}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\infty, \frac{7}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(0, \frac{7}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(0, \frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]7 x-3 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{3}{7}[/math]
এবং [math]7 x-3>0 \therefore x>\frac{3}{7} \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #580 (ID: 474075)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math](fog)(x)[/math] ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
B. [math]R[/math]
C. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{-1,1\}[/math]
D. [math][-1,1][/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math](fog)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
ফাংশনটি [math]x ≠ ()[/math]
 হলে সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন: [math]R - {0}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #581 (ID: 474076)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-9}{x-3}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-3) \cup(3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\{0, \infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{3\}[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x-3 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=R-\{3\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R - {6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #582 (ID: 474077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=\frac{\sqrt{2 x-1}}{x-2}[/math] দ্বারা প্রকাশিত ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x-2 
eq 0[/math]
 অথবা [math]2 x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 হয় অর্থাৎ [math]x ≠ 2[/math]
 অথবা [math]2 x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]=\left[\frac{1}{2}, 2\right) \cup(2, \infty)[/math]
 অথবা [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #583 (ID: 474078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math] হলে, [math]g[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-1, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][1, \infty), \mathrm{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R,[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x+1 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[-1, \infty) x=-1[/math]
 হলে, [math]g(x)=0 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math][0,8)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #584 (ID: 474079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math] এর ডোমেন হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math](2,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন, [math]x(2-x) ≥ 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-0)(2-x) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-0)(x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [0, 2][/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:

Question #585 (ID: 474080)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{3 x-2}[/math] এর ডোমেন -

Options:
A. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
B. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
C. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-2 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]

Question #586 (ID: 474081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির ব্রেজ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-8 \leq f(x) \leq-5[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)>0[/math]
গ. [math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6 \leq f(x) \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3 \\f(0)=-0^{2}-2(0)+3=3 \\f(-1)=-(-1)^{2}-2(-1)+3=4 \\f(-2)=-(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+3=3 \\f(-3)=-(-3)^{2}-2(-3)+3=0 \\f(-4)=-(-4)^{2}-2(-4)+3=-5\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
 এর মধ্যে [math]-5 ≤ f(x) ≤ 4[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #587 (ID: 474082)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin \frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{0\}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}^{+}, \mathrm{R}-\{0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{0\},[-1,1][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{0\},[-1,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R -{0}[/math]
আবার, [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য = [math]-1 \leq \sin \frac{1}{x} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [-1,1] [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R- {0}, রেঞ্জ = [-1,1]

Explanation:

Question #588 (ID: 474083)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math](fog) (1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(1)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(1))=f(2)[/math]
 [math]=2^{2}-2|2|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #589 (ID: 474084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]x>-1[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঙ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math]
তাহলে [math]x+1 
eq 1[/math]
 এবং [math]x+1>0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0, x>-1[/math]
 এবং [math](2 x+1)>0 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2} \therefore x \in\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #590 (ID: 474085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x}|x|[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন [math]D[/math] এর জন্য কোন শর্ত সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{D} \subset \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in Z\}[/math]
গ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in N\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{a}{z} \sin z \\=a \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z}=a \cdot 1=a\end{array}[/math]
ধরি,[math]\frac{a}{2^{x}}=z \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{a}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty, z \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #591 (ID: 474086)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R → R[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\{-2 \sqrt{2}, 2 \sqrt{2}\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{1+f(x)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\pm \sqrt{1+y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{1+\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(8)[/math]
 [math]=\{3,-3\}\left[\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)\right.[/math]
 অসংজ্ঞায়িত]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #592 (ID: 474087)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 f(x)+3 f(-x)=x^{2}-x+1[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{13} x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{13}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x-\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 f(x)+3 f(-x)=x^{2}-x+1[/math]
 [math].....(i)[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})+3 \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{x}+1[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \ldots(ii)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (i) }[/math]
 [math]\times 2-\text { (ii) } \times 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-5 f(x)[/math]
 [math]=-x^{2}-5 x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} x^{2}[/math]
 [math]+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\frac{1-x}{x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]; \frac{1-x}{x} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0 ; 1-x \leq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 1 \therefore D_{f}=[0,1][/math]

Question #595 (ID: 474090)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Question #596 (ID: 474091)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x}|x|[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন D এর জন্য কোন শর্ত সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{D} \subset \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in Z\}[/math]
গ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in N\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{a}{z} \sin z[/math]
 [math]=a \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z}=a \cdot 1=a[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{a}{2^{x}}=z \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{a}{z}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x} \rightarrow \infty, \mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #597 (ID: 474092)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
B. [math]x>-1[/math]
C. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
E. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
Hints: x এর যে মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত, সেগুলোই ডোমেন ।Solve:এক্ষেত্রে, [math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math]
ভিত্তি: (x+1) > 0বা, x > -1[math]\\[/math]
এবং x+1 + 1বা, x = 0সাথের রাশি: [math](2 x+1)>0 \Rightarrow x>\frac{-1}{2}[/math]
অর্থাৎ x এর মান 1/2 থেকে বড় হতে হবে কিন্তু 0 এর সমান হওয়াযাবে না। এই শর্ত সম্বলিত option টি হচ্ছে (A)।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #598 (ID: 474093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math](fog)(1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]
ঙ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Hints: } fog(x)=f(g(x))\\\text { Solve: } fog(1)=f(g(1)) \\\text { } g(x)=x^{2}+1 \\\therefore g(1)=1^{2}+1=2 \text { }, f(g(1))=f(2) \\f(x)=x^{2}-2|x| \text { } f(2)=2^{2}-2|2|=4-4=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #600 (ID: 474095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন ফাংশনটি এক-এক এবং সার্বিক?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=|x|[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+2}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+2}{5}[/math]

Solution:

Question #601 (ID: 474096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math] হলে, [math]f(-4)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]
ঙ. [math]32[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]16[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=x-2 \therefore x=y+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}-2)=\mathrm{x}^{2}-2 \mathrm{x}+8[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=(\mathrm{y}+2)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-2(\mathrm{y}+2)+8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-4)=16[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #602 (ID: 474097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]p=f(q)=\frac{\sqrt{q}+1}{\sqrt{q}-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f(4)[/math] এবং [math]f(2)[/math] যথাক্রমে কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{5}, \sqrt{2}-1[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt{3}, \frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
undefined. No correct answer


Correct Answer: .No correct answer

Solution:
[math]f(4)=\frac{\sqrt{4}+1}{\sqrt{4}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2+1}{2-1}=3 ;[/math]
 [math]f(2)=\frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]=3+2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #603 (ID: 474098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}[/math] হলে [math]x[/math] এর মাধ্যমে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কি হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1+x[/math]
ঙ. No Correct Answer


Correct Answer: E.No Correct Answer

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 y+1}{4 y-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}+1}{4 \frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1} 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25 x+5+4 x-1}{20 x+4-4 x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{29 x+4}{16 x+5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #604 (ID: 474099)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x+2}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq 2\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in R\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq-2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in \mathbf{R}: x \neq 0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq-2\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+2 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x 
eq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\{x: x \in R, x 
eq-2\}[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](x \in \mathbb{R} : x \geq 4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}:-4
গ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R} :-4 \leq x \leq 4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \leq-4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{x \in \mathbb{R} :-4 \leq x \leq 4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]16-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-4 \leq x \leq 4[/math]

Question #614 (ID: 474109)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
X ও Y শান্ত সেট (non-empty) দ্বয়ের কোন সাধারণ সদস্য না থাকলে [math]X-Y \cap Y[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]x[/math]
খ. [math]\varnothing[/math]
গ. [math]y[/math]
ঘ. [math](\varnothing)[/math]
ঙ. [math]x-y[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]X-Y[/math]
 [math]\cap Y=X-Y=X-X[/math]
 [math]\cap Y=X-\varphi=x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #615 (ID: 474110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-9}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]|x|>3[/math]
খ. [math]|x| \geq 3[/math]
গ. [math]|x| \leq 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]|x|<3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]|x| \geq 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-9 \geq 0 ;(x+3)(x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3 \text { or } x \leq-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \geq 3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #617 (ID: 474112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনটি অভেদ?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}=4 x e^{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}+4 x e^{x}=0[/math]
গ. [math]\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}-\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}+4 x e^{x}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(e^{x}+x\right)^{2}-\left(x-e^{x}\right)^{2}-2 x e^{x}=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}=4 x e^{x}[/math]

Solution:
Option (A) হতে পাই,[math]\text { L.H.S }=x^{2}+e^{2 x}+2 x^{2} e^{x}-e^{2 x}-x^{2}+2 x^{2} e^{x}=4 x^{2} e^{x}=\text { R.H.S }[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 Option (A) অভেদ গানচীচী

Explanation:

Question #618 (ID: 474113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি যুগ্ম ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=\sin 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=\tan x[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]

Solution:
Option C হতে পাই, [math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}+\cos (-x)=x^{2}+\cos x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #619 (ID: 474114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #620 (ID: 474115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #621 (ID: 474116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #622 (ID: 474117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #623 (ID: 474118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=0 \Leftrightarrow h(x)=1[/math] হলে, [math]g(h(0))[/math] ও [math]h(g(0))[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. 1 ও 0
B. 0 ও 1
C. 0 ও 0
D. 1 ও 1


Correct Answer: B.0 ও 1

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{h}(0)=\mathrm{g}(1)=0[/math]
 আবার, [math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{g}(0)=\mathrm{h}(0)=1[/math]


Explanation:
