Question #624 (ID: 474119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে [math](gof)(x)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}+2 x^{3}+1[/math]
C. [math]x^{6}+1[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-6 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{6}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(x)=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}\right)=\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1=x^{6}+1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #625 (ID: 474120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:

ঘ. [math]\{1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]

Question #627 (ID: 474122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #628 (ID: 474123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][3,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-3,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-3,3][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-9 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-3,3][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-3, 3][/math]
এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\{y \in R: 0 \leq y \leq 3\}=[0,3][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #629 (ID: 474124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]R, f(x) \leq 1[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{3\}, R-\{6\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 ফাংশনটি x এর সকল মানের জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত বলে ডোমেন = [math]= R[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #630 (ID: 474125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1\right)[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(1)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #631 (ID: 474126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+2[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] হলে (fof) (x) এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3x+2[/math]
খ. [math]9x+8[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই


Correct Answer: B.[math]9x+8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore(\mathrm{fof})(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(3 \mathrm{x}+2)[/math]
 [math]=3(3 \mathrm{x}+2)+2[/math]
 [math]=9 \mathrm{x}+8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #632 (ID: 474127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math] ফাংশনের রেজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math][R-\{0,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন R- {1}এই ডোমেনের মধ্যে f(x) এর মান সর্বদা ঋণাত্মক কারণ [math]x[/math]
 এর [math](x ≠ 1[/math]
 ছাড়া) যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]|1 – x > 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]=(-\infty, 0)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #633 (ID: 474128)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X=\{-3,-2,0,1\}, \mathrm{f}: X \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] এবং [math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-1[/math] যারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, [math]f[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\{0,1\}[/math]
B. [math]\varnothing[/math]
C. [math]-3[/math]
D. [math]{-1,2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]{-1,2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=9-6-1=2,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}(-2)=4-4-1[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]
 [math]f(0)=0+0-1=-1,[/math]
 [math]f(1)=1+2-1[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]{-1,2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #634 (ID: 474129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math] এর ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,f(x) ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]2 x+1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow 2 x 
eq-1 \Rightarrow x 
eq-\frac{1}{2} \therefore[/math]
 আবার [math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}=\frac{1}{2} \Rightarrow 2 x-6=2 x+1 \Rightarrow-6=1[/math]
 অসম্ভব [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #635 (ID: 474130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x^{2}-4}[/math] হলে, [math]f(x + 1)[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]R-\{2\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{-2,2\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1,3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x^{2}-4} \therefore f(x+1)=\frac{1}{(x+1)^{2}-4}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math](x+1)^{2}-4 
eq 0 \Rightarrow(x+1)^{2} 
eq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1 
eq \pm 2 \Rightarrow x 
eq 1,-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}-\{1,-3\}=\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #636 (ID: 474131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]x>-1[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]2 x+1>0 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এবং [math]x+1>0 \Rightarrow x>-1[/math]
 এবং [math]2 x+1 
eq 1 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0 \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]=\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

গ. [math]13[/math]
ঘ. [math]15[/math]

Solution:

Question #638 (ID: 474133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R}^{+} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}^{+}[/math] [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{llc}3 x-1 & \text { if } & x>.3 \\x^{2}-2 & \text { if } & -2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 & \text { if } & x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math] সূচিত হলে [math]f(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]
E. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{cc}3 x-1 & \text { if } x>3 \\x^{2}-2 & \text { if }-2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 & x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math]
এখানে [math]-3<-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(-3)=2[/math]
 [math]\times(-3)+3=-3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #643 (ID: 474041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+2 x^{2}+3 x+6[/math] ফাংশনটির একটি উৎপাদক নীচের কোনটি হতে পারে?

Options:
ক. [math]x-1[/math]
খ. [math]x+1[/math]
গ. [math]x+2[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x+2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+2 x^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]x+6=x^{2}(x+2)+3(x+2)[/math]
 [math]=(x+2)\left(x^{2}+3\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore(x+2)[/math]
 একটি উৎপাদক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #644 (ID: 474042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R[/math] বাস্তব সংখ্যার সেট এবং [math]A=\{-1,1,0,2\} ; f: A \rightarrow R[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+x-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,2,5)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1,5)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2,3)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,-2,3)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1,1,5)[/math]

Solution:
[math]Set[/math]
 প্রকাশের জন্য [math]Second bracket[/math]
 ব্যবহার হবে। যেমন: [math]\{ -1, 1, 5\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #645 (ID: 474043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math] এর ডোমেইন হচ্ছে -

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x(2-x) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x \leq 2[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math]x=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\frac{x+5}{2 x-5}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{5\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 x-5 
eq 0 \therefore x 
eq \frac{5}{2} \therefore[/math]
 ডোম [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]

Question #647 (ID: 474045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-9[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(7)=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-3,4)[/math]
খ. [math][-4,4][/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math][-4,0][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(7)=x \Rightarrow f(x)=7[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x^{2}-9=7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=16 \\\therefore x= \pm 4 \therefore x=\{-4,4\}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #648 (ID: 474046)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math] হয়,তবে [math]f^{-1}(2 x-1)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 x-7[/math]
খ. [math]2 x-5[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7-4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 x-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}+2 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{x}-1[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x}+2)[/math]
ধরি, [math]x+2=2 y-1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 y-3[/math]
এখন, [math]2(2 \mathrm{y}-3)-1[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \mathrm{y}-7[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1) \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{x}-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #650 (ID: 474048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=x^{2}+2[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=(x-1)^{2}[/math] হলে [math]gof (x)[/math] হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math]x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]
খ. [math]x^{4}-2 x^{2}+1[/math]
গ. [math]x^{4}-x^{2}+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{4}-2 x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math]gof(x)=\left(x^{2}+2-1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #651 (ID: 474049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\text { fog }(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-4[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(g(0))=f\left(g(0)^2\right)=f(1-0)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)=(1)^2+3|1|=1+3=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math](gof) (x)-[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]2 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]
B. [math]4 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]
D. [math]3 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g \circ f(x)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+3 x+1\right)-3[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]

Question #655 (ID: 474054)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
প্রথম বর্ষের বিজ্ঞানের মোট [math]120[/math] জন ছাত্রের মধ্যে [math]85[/math] জন গণিত, [math]90[/math] জন পদার্থবিজ্ঞান ও [math]62[/math] জন গণিত ও পদার্থবিজ্ঞানের উভয় বিষয়ই নিয়েছে। কতজন ছাত্র গণিত অথবা পদার্থবিজ্ঞান বিষয় দুটির কোনোটিই নেয়নি?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]7[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]13[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M} \cup \mathrm{P})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{P})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M} \cap \mathrm{P})[/math]
 [math]=85+90-62=113[/math]
গণিত অথবা পদার্থবিদ্যার কোনটিই নেয়নি [math]= 120-1137[/math]
 জন

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #656 (ID: 474055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]n(A)=17, n(B)=28[/math] এবং [math]n(A \cap B)=14[/math] হয়, তবে [math]n(AUB)[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]30[/math]
B. [math]29[/math]
C. [math]31[/math]
D. [math]35[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]31[/math]

Solution:
[math]n(A \cup B) =n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]=17+28-14=31[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #657 (ID: 474056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি সেট [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]n(A)+n(B)=n(A \cup B)[/math] হবে যদি-

Options:
ক. নিচ্ছেদ সেট হয়
খ. [math]n(A)=n(B)[/math] থাকে
গ. [math]A \cap B \neq \varnothing[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.নিচ্ছেদ সেট হয়

Solution:
[math]n(A)+n(B)=n(A \cup B)[/math]
 দেওয়া আছেআবার পাই, [math]n(A \cup B)=n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow n(A \cup B)=n(A \cup B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})=0 \therefore(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})=\phi[/math]
 অর্থাৎ, [math]A[/math]
 ও [math]B[/math]
 নিশ্চেদ সেট।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #658 (ID: 473993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{(2-x)}(2 x+1)(3-x)>2[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]
খ. [math](-1 / 2,2)[/math]
গ. [math](-1 / 2,1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1 / 2,3)[/math]
ঙ. [math](-1 / 2,1) \cup(1,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1 / 2,2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{(2-x)}(2 x+1)(3-x)>2 \ldots \text { (i) }[/math]
এর [math]\text { base }(2-x)>0 \therefore x(2-x) \Rightarrow \frac{(2 x+1)(3-x)}{(2-x)^{2}}>0 \ldots \text { (iii) }[/math]
(ii) সত্য হবে যদি [math](2x + 1 )[/math]
 ও [math]( 3 – x)[/math]
 যদি উভয়ে ধনাত্মক বা উভয়ে ঋণাত্মক ।[math]\therefore\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 3\right)[/math]
 হলে (iii) সত্য হবে । কিন্তু (ii) হতে [math]x<2 \therefore[/math]
 সঠিক উত্তর [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 2\right)[/math]


Explanation:
log এর ভিত্তির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত:i) ভিত্তি > 0 হতে হবেii) ভিত্তি [math]\neq[/math]
 হতে হবেlog এর সাথের রাশির ক্ষেত্রে শর্তঃlog এর সাথের রাশিটিকেও 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে।[math]\\ \ \\[/math]
এ প্রশ্নের Solve এ প্রথমে ভিত্তি (2 - x ) কে ধনাত্মক ধরে পাওয়া গেছে x -\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এবং x -\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এ এবং x 
[বিগত কয়েক বছর ধরে SUST এর ভর্তি পরীক্ষায় ফাংশন অধ্যায় থেকে শুধুমাত্র Logarithmic Function এর ডোমেন নির্ণয় অংশ থেকেই প্রশ্ন আসতেছে]

Sub-Questions:

Question #659 (ID: 473994)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
A. [math](-1,0)[/math]
B. [math][-1,0][/math]
C. [math](-0.5,0)[/math]
D. [math][0,1][/math]
E. [math][-0.5,0][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)\\\therefore 2 \cos x \geq 0[/math]
আবার, [math]y=\cos \left(\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{1-2 \cos 2 x}\right)=\sqrt{1-2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1-2 \cos 2 x \geq 0 \\\Rightarrow 2 \cos 2 x \leq 1[/math]
 যখন [math]2 \cos 2 x=1, \\y_{\min }=0 \\2 \cos 2 x=0,\\ y_{\max }=1[/math]


Explanation:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)[/math]
 ফাংশনটিতে [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান কখনো ঋণাত্মক হওয়া সম্ভব না। তাই [math]\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান পেতে হলে [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হতে পারবে 1 এবং সর্বনিম্ন হতে পারবে 0।যদি [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান 1 হয়, তবে [math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} 1\right)=\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\\ \Rightarrow y_{\min }=0[/math]
আবার যদি [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান 0 হয়, তবে y এর মান হবে সর্বোচ্চ।[math]\therefore y_{\max }=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} 0\right)=\cos 0=1[/math]
.:. y এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হতে পারবে 1 এবং সর্বনিম্ন 0ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ হবে 0 থেকে শুরু করে 1 পর্যন্ত সকল মান অর্থাৎ [0, 1]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #660 (ID: 473995)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}+1=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(2)=5[/math]

C. [math]-3 / 2[/math]
D. [math]5 / 2[/math]

Question #663 (ID: 473998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [0, 3] এবং [0,3]
খ. [−3,3] এবং [0, 3]
গ. (3,3) এবং (0,3)
ঘ. (-3, 3] এবং [ 0 – 3 )


Correct Answer: B.[−3,3] এবং [0, 3]

Solution:
[math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore D_{f}=[-3,3] R_{f}=[0,3][/math]

Question #664 (ID: 473999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হ্য,তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x ; f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}-x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয় ,তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)+4}{\frac{1}{3} 5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Question #666 (ID: 474001)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq-4[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
[math]4-x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 4[/math]

Question #667 (ID: 474002)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \cos \mathrm{x}[/math] রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1 \leq f(x) \leq 1[/math]
B. [math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
C. [math]0 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
D. [math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
 হলে, রেঞ্জ [math]\rightarrow-1 \leq f(x) \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 হলে, রেঞ্জ [math]\rightarrow-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]; 1-\mathrm{x}^{2} \geq 0 \therefore \mathrm{x}^{2} \leq 1 \quad \therefore-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3,-5[/math]
B. [math]3,5[/math]
C. [math]-3,-5[/math]
D. [math]-3,5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3,-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=3 x-5 \therefore c=3, d=-5[/math]

Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R} ; f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog(4) }[/math] এবং [math]\text { gof }(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4225,720[/math]
B. [math]4020,725[/math]
C. [math]4120,730[/math]
D. [math]4225,730[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4225,730[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { fog }(4)=\left(4^{3}+1\right)^{2}=4225 ;[/math]
 [math]\text { gof }(-3)=(-3)^{6}+1=730[/math]

Question #671 (ID: 474006)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ফাংশন [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{4}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, ফাংশনটি কি হবে?

Options:
ক. এক-এক
খ. এক-এক ও সার্বিক
গ. এক-এক নয়
ঘ. ধ্রুব


Correct Answer: C.এক-এক নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{4}+1 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[4]{x-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 হয়, x এর যে কোনো একটি মানের জন্য 4টি ভিন্ন মান পাওয়া যায়।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #672 (ID: 474007)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]1-\mathrm{x}^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}^{2} \leq 1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]

C. [math]113[/math]

Correct Answer: D.[math]67[/math]

যদি, [math]f: x \rightarrow x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হয়, তবে [math]g f(2)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]44[/math]
B. [math]22[/math]
C. [math]55[/math]
D. [math]66[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]44[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(2))=g(2+3)=g(5)=5^{2}+3.5+4=44[/math]

Question #676 (ID: 474011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{4} 3 y-2 \log _{4} x=1[/math] হলে [math]y[/math] কে [math]x[/math] এর আকারে প্রকাশ কোনটি হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{3 x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3 x^{2}}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3} x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{4} 3 y[/math]
 [math]=1+2 \log _{4} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4^{1+2 \log _{4} x}[/math]
 [math]=3 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{44^{\log _{4} x^{2}}}{3}[/math]
 [math]=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore y[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}}[/math] হলে [math]f(a+1)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]e^{a+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} ; f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1^{32}}=e[/math]

Question #680 (ID: 474015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ফাংশন [math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{4}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, ফাংশন কী হবে?

Options:
ক. এক-এক
খ. এক-এক ও সার্বিক
গ. ধ্রুব
ঘ. ধ্রুব


Correct Answer: C.ধ্রুব

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{4}+1 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[4]{x-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 এর যেকোনো একটি মানের জন্য [math]4[/math]
টি ভিন্ন মান পাওয়া যায়। [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #681 (ID: 474016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #682 (ID: 474017)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #683 (ID: 474018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #684 (ID: 474019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5} \Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3 \times \frac{1}{3}+4}{\frac{1}{3}-5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #685 (ID: 474020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]


Explanation:

Question #686 (ID: 474021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math](x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}}{1+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{2}}}=\frac{3-1}{1+2}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #687 (ID: 474022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=|2 x-6|[/math] ফাংশনটিতে নিম্নোক্ত কোন শর্ত [math]f(x)> 2x[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x<3[/math]
খ. [math]x>3[/math]
গ. [math]x<1.5[/math]
ঘ. [math]x>1.5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x<1.5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)>2 x \Rightarrow|2 x-6|>2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-(2 x-6)>2 x \Rightarrow 4 x2 x \Rightarrow-6>0[/math]
 যা অসম্ভব।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #688 (ID: 474023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(a+1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a}+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} \Rightarrow f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1}=e[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #689 (ID: 474024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+5}{3}[/math] এবং [math](x)=c x+d[/math] হলে, cওd এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3,-5[/math]
খ. [math]3, 5[/math]
গ. [math]-3, -5[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3, 6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3,-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+5}{3} \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=3 x-5[/math]
দেওয়া আছে, [math]f^{-1}(x)=c x+d \Rightarrow c=3, d=-5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #690 (ID: 474025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(6)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x+6}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(6)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6+6}{3}=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #691 (ID: 474026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #692 (ID: 474027)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][3,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-3,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-3,3][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-9 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-3,3][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-3, 3][/math]
এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\{y \in R: 0 \leq y \leq 3\}=[0,3][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #693 (ID: 474028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq-4[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]4-x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x-4 \leq 0 \therefore x \leq 4[/math]

Explanation:

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, \infty)-\{-1\}[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, \infty)-\{1\}[/math]
গ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-\infty, \infty)-\{1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]=R-\{1\}=\{-\infty, \infty\}-\{1\}[/math]

Question #696 (ID: 474031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]R, f(x) \leq 1[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{3\}, R-\{6\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 ফাংশনটি x এর সকল মানের জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত বলে ডোমেন = [math]= R[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #697 (ID: 474032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R} ;[/math] [math]g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R},[/math] [math]h: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R},[/math] [math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1} x, g(y)=\sin y[/math] এবং [math]h(z)=\frac{1-z}{1+z}[/math] হলে [math]g\left[\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right][/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1-\sqrt{3}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1+\sqrt{3}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(h\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}}{1+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{\sqrt{3}+1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=15^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{g}\left[\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}\left(15^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sin 15^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \tan x[/math] ফাংশনটির পর্যায় কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pi[/math]
গ. [math]2 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
f(x) = 2tan(x) ফাংশনের পর্যায় π, কারণ এটি মূলত গুণফলকৃত ট্যাঙ্গেন্ট ফাংশন এবং গুণফল ফাংশনের পর্যায় মূল ফাংশনের পর্যায়ের সমান।

Question #700 (ID: 474035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]e^{y}=x^{x}[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]y[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{x: x \leq 0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x: x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\{x: x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\{x: x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
কোন একটি ফাংশনে x এর value হিসেবে যা যা input দেওয়া সম্ভব, তা-ই ডোমেন ।Solve: [math]e^{y}=x^{x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\ln e^{y}=\ln x^{x} \\y \ln e=x \ln x \\y=x \ln x\end{array}[/math]
এখানে, X কে ধনাত্মক হতে হবে।অর্থাৎ, ডোমেন = [math]\{x \in R: x>0\}[/math]


Explanation:
log এর ভিত্তির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত :i) ভিত্তি > 0 হতে হবেii) ভিত্তি = 1log বা In এর সাথের রাশির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত:log এর সাথের রাশিটিকেও 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে। log এর ভিত্তি e হলে তাকে In দ্বারা প্রকাশ করা হয়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #701 (ID: 474036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{100-x^{2}}+\log _{(2-x)} \sqrt{x+12}[/math]- কোন সেটে সংজ্ঞায়িত?

Options:
A. (0,3)
B. (-12,0)
C. (0,10)
D. (-10,10)
E. (-10,2)


Correct Answer: E. (-10,2)

Solution:
এখানে, [math]100-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow-10 \leq x \leq 10[/math]
 এবং [math]2-x>0 \Rightarrow x0 \Rightarrow x>-12[/math]
 সুতরাং ডোমেন: [math][-10,10] \cap(-\infty, 2) \cap(-12, \infty) \equiv[-10,2][/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ f(x) ফাংশনটি কোন সেটে সংজ্ঞায়িত কথাটি দ্বারা বুঝাচ্ছে, ফাংশনটিতে x এর কোন কোন value ইনপুট দেয়া সম্ভব। অর্থাৎ ফাংশনটির ডোমেন যা, তা-ই হচ্ছে প্রদত্ত প্রশ্নটির সমাধান ।[math]\sqrt{ }[/math] চিহ্নের ভিতরের মানকে সবসময় ধনাত্মক বা শূণ্যের সমান হতে হয়, যদি কোনো ফাংশনকে সংজ্ঞায়িত হতে হয়। আবার log এর ভিত্তিকেও সবসময় ধনাত্মক হতে হয় এবং একইসাথে ভিত্তি কখনো 1 এর সমান হতে পারে না। এই শর্তগুলো ব্যবহার করেই প্রশ্নটি সমাধান করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #702 (ID: 473971)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #703 (ID: 473972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=3^{x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{f(x+3)}{f(x-1)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(3)[/math]
D. [math]f(4)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{f(x+3)}{f(x-1)}=\frac{3^{x+3}}{3^{x-1}}=3^{x+3-x+1}=3^{4}[/math]
আবার, [math]f(4)=3^{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #704 (ID: 473973)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] নিম্নের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3x+2[/math]
খ. [math]3x-2[/math]
গ. [math]2x+2[/math]
ঘ. [math]2x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2x-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2} \therefore f^{-1}(x)=2 x-3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #705 (ID: 473974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math](3,-3)[/math]
ঘ. [math](3, -3)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](3,-3)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=x^{2}-7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=y+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{2+7}= \pm \sqrt{9}= \pm 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=\{3,-3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #706 (ID: 473975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]f(f(x))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-1}{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x+1}{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x}{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{f(x)+1}{f(x)-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x+1}{x-1}+1}{\frac{x+1}{x-1}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+1+x-1}{x+1-x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #707 (ID: 473976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{n}[/math] হলে [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln f(x)[/math]
B. [math]n f(x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{n} \ln x[/math]
D. [math]x^{n}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]n f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f\left(x^{n}\right)=\ln x^{n}=n \ln x=n f(x)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #708 (ID: 473977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] এবং [math]h(x)=x+2[/math] হলে [math]hogof=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{6}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}-3[/math]
C. [math]x^{8}+3[/math]
D. [math]x^{8}-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{6}+3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { (ho go } f(x)=h(g(f(x)))[/math]
 [math]=h\left(g\left(x^{2}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]=h\left\{\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1\right\}[/math]
 [math]=h\left(x^{6}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=x^{6}+1+2=x^{6}+3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #709 (ID: 473978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]: R \rightarrow R, g: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=x^{2}+3 x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x+3[/math] হলে, [math]gof (1)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]20[/math]
B. [math]11[/math]
C. [math]40[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]11[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(1)=g(f(1))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(1^{2}+3 \times 1\right)[/math]
 [math]=g(4)=2 \times 4+3[/math]
 [math]=11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #710 (ID: 473979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #711 (ID: 473980)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-3 x ;-6 \leq x \leq 6[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
খ. [math]-18 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
গ. [math]18 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4 \leq y \leq 28[/math]
ঙ. [math]-2


Correct Answer: E.[math]-2

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-3 x[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]-6≤x≤6[/math]
 এর মধ্যে, [math]x = 0[/math]
 বসালে,[math]\begin{array}{l}f(0)=0-0=0, f(-6)=36+18=54 \\f(6)=36-18=18, f(2)=4-6=-2 \\f(1)=1-3=-2 \\\therefore-2

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{4 x-13}{x-5}[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R-{5}[/math]
গ. [math]R-{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R − {6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R-{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{4 x-13}{x-5}=4 \Rightarrow-13=-20[/math]
 যা সম্ভব নয়[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R - {5}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R-{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #713 (ID: 473982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x+4}[/math] ফাংশনটির Domain Range কত?

Options:
A. [math]R[/math]
B. [math]x>4[/math]
C. [math]x<4[/math]
D. [math]x \geq-4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x \geq-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-4[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ x = -4 হলে,[math]f(x) = 0 \ যখন, x > -4, f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #714 (ID: 473983)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x} \text {}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)+g(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
B. [math][1,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](0,1][/math]
D. [math][0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x ≥ 0[/math]
 অথবা[math]1-x \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-1 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 1)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]1-x \geq 1 \Rightarrow-x \geq 1-1 \Rightarrow-x \geq 0 \therefore x \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(-\infty, 0][/math]


Explanation:

Question #717 (ID: 473986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-|x+1|+2[/math] ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. সর্বোচ্চ মান 1
খ. সর্বনিম্ন মান 1
গ. সর্বোচ্চ মান 2
ঘ. সর্বনিম্ন মান


Correct Answer: C.সর্বোচ্চ মান 2

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-|x+1|+2[/math]
 যখন [math]x=-1[/math]
 [math]f(x)=-t-1+1 \mid+2=2[/math]
এছাড়া x-এর অন্য মানের জন্য [math]f(x) <2[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:

Question #718 (ID: 473987)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1
গ. [math]0 \leq x<1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x<0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]1-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0 \Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|<1 \Rightarrow-1[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটির ডোমেন [math]=-1 [math]=[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #719 (ID: 473988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+5}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন-

Options:
ক. [math][0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+5}=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+1+4}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+4}[/math]
 যা [math]x[/math]
 এর যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 ধনাত্মক হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}=(-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #720 (ID: 473989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]=\mathrm{R}=(-\infty, \infty)[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. [math][-1,1][/math]
B. [math](-1.1)[/math]
C. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
D. [math]R[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-1,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1, x<0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ [math]=\{-1,1\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #721 (ID: 473990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } A=R-\{3\}, B=R-\{1\}[/math] [math]\text { and a function } f:[/math] [math]A \rightarrow B \text { is defined by } f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3} \text {. What is the value of }[/math] [math]f^{-1}(0) ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\mathrm{z},[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{z})=0[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } f(\mathrm{z})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{z}-2}{\mathrm{z}+3}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{z}=2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #722 (ID: 473991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(-x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(x+1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #723 (ID: 473992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If three roots of } f(x)=0[/math] [math]\text { are } 1,-1,2[/math] [math]\text { the roots of } f(2 x)[/math] [math]=0 \text { are- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{2},-1[/math]
C. [math]2,-2,4[/math]
D. [math]0,1,-2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=(x-1)[/math]
 [math](x+1)(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(2 x)=(2 x-1)[/math]
 [math](2 x+1)(2 x-2)[/math]
 [math]f(2 x)=0 ;(2 x-1)[/math]
 [math](2 x+1)(2 x-2)[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #724 (ID: 473967)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=e^{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(e)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x-3} \Rightarrow x-3=\ln y \Rightarrow x=\ln y+3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x+3 \\\therefore f^{-1}(e)=\ln e+3=1+3=4 .\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #725 (ID: 473968)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = (x-2) (1-x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(f(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]1 / 2[/math]
খ. [math]-12[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(3)[/math]
 [math]=(3-2)(1-3)[/math]
 [math]=1(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]
 [math]f(f(3))[/math]
 [math]=(-2-2)\{1-(-2)\}[/math]
 [math]=-4(1+2)=-12[/math]


Explanation:

Question #726 (ID: 473969)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #727 (ID: 473970)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #728 (ID: 401557)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = sinx|[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math][0,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ = [math]=[-1,1][/math]

Explanation:

Question #729 (ID: 401558)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math] হলে [math]f(x-2)[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 1, x \geq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x≥1[/math]
গ. [math]x≤3[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \geq 1, x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি [math]x^{2}-4 x+3 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-1)(x-3) \geq 0 \Rightarrow x-3 \geq 0[/math]
 অথবা [math]x-1 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 অথবা [math]x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]x \geq 3, x \leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #730 (ID: 401559)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2} ; f(x)[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 \sin x \cos x-8 \sin x \cos x=-2 \sin x \cos x=-\sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2 \cos 2 x\end{array}[/math]
লঘু-গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin 2 x=0 \Rightarrow 2 x=0, \pi \quad \therefore x=0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(0)=-20 \text {, }[/math]
 লঘুমান বা সর্ব নিম্নমান হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান = [math]3 \sin ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}+4 \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #731 (ID: 401560)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x: x^{2}-5 x+6=0\right\}[/math] এবং [math]T=\left\{x: x^{2}-11 x+24=0\right\}[/math] হলে, [math]s \cap T[/math] এবং [math]T - S[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]\{2,3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
B. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{2\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
D. [math]\{8\}[/math] এবং [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
S এর জন্য , [math]x^{2}-5 x+6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,3[/math]
 [math]\therefore S=\{2,3\}[/math]
আবার T এর জন্য, [math]x^{2}-11 x+24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-8)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=3,8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{S} \cap \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{2,3\} \cap\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3\}[/math]
এবং [math]\mathrm{T}-\mathrm{S}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}-\{2,3\}[/math]
 [math]=\{8\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #732 (ID: 401561)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\cot ^{-1} \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}\left(\cot ^{-} \frac{3}{4}\right) =\cos \left(\cot ^{-1} \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos \cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{5}=\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #733 (ID: 401562)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)-f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}+x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})-\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}+\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}-\mathrm{x}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #734 (ID: 401492)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,5,9\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{1,2,9,10)[/math] হলে [math](A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math] এর সমান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]\{3,5\}[/math]
B. [math]\{1,2,9\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3,5,10\}[/math]
D. [math]\{1,2,3,5,9,10\}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{A} \backslash \mathrm{B}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5\} ; \mathrm{B} \backslash \mathrm{A}[/math]
 [math]=\{10\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5\} \cup\{10\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,5,10\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #735 (ID: 401493)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { (fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\text { fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\mathrm{f}\left[\mathrm{g}\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\sin \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:

Question:

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]4-x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x<4[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\infty [math]; 0
