Question #737 (ID: 401495)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=e^{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(e)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x-3} \Rightarrow x-3=\ln y \Rightarrow x=\ln y+3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x+3 \\\therefore f^{-1}(e)=\ln e+3=1+3=4 .\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #738 (ID: 401496)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবেযখন, [math]4-x 
otin 0 \Rightarrow 4-x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-4<0 \Rightarrow x<4[/math]
ডোমেন [math](-\infty, 4)[/math]
 বা [math]-\inftyআবার, [math]4-x=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=\frac{4 y^{2}-1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]y≠0[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]0

Explanation:

Question #739 (ID: 401497)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Let } f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}} \text {. The domain and range of the real valued function } f \text { is - }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-2
C. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-x<-2 \& x>, 2


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2[math]\therefore y^{2}=\frac{1}{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-x^{2}=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4-x^{2}=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]|x|[/math]
 এর [math]\text { value minimum }[/math]
 হলে [math]\text { y mimimum }[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2[math]\therefore 4=\frac{1}{y_{m \ln }^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{m l n}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{m l n}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #740 (ID: 401498)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{3}+7[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(15)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]15[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x^{3}+7[/math]
ধরি, [math]f(x)=y, x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}=y-7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{x}-7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(15)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{15-7}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{8}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #741 (ID: 401499)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}}[/math] বাস্তব ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-2
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<1 / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x<-2 \& x>2,-2


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-4<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|<2 \text { : }=2[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]I=-2[math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=f(0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত যখন, [math]-2<\mathrm{x}<2, \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]=y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #743 (ID: 401501)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #744 (ID: 401502)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x \text { and } y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3 \text { and } y \geq 0[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 3 \text { and } y>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\dot{x} \leq 2, x \geq 3 \text { and } y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-5 x+6 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(\dot{x}-2) \geq 0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math]
 [math]\text { Domain } x \leq 2,3[/math]
 [math]\leq x \text {; Range } y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #745 (ID: 401503)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=(x-2)(1-x)[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{f}(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]9[/math]
B. [math]-12[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(3)=(3-2)(1-3)=-2 ; f(f(3))=f(-2)=\{(-2)-2\}\{1-(-2)\}=-12[/math]

Explanation:

Question #746 (ID: 401504)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = (x-2) (1-x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(f(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]1 / 2[/math]
খ. [math]-12[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(3)[/math]
 [math]=(3-2)(1-3)[/math]
 [math]=1(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]
 [math]f(f(3))[/math]
 [math]=(-2-2)\{1-(-2)\}[/math]
 [math]=-4(1+2)=-12[/math]


Explanation:

Question #747 (ID: 401505)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math](2 \leq x \leq 3)[/math] এবং [math]y ≥0[/math]
গ. [math]x ≥ 3[/math] এবং [math]y >0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x ≤ 2, x ≥ 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-3)(x-2)}[/math]
 [math]\text { so, } y \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-2) \geq 0[/math]
 [math](x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
 এবং [math](x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= x ≤ 2,[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #748 (ID: 401506)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 2,3 \leq x[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math] এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \leq 2, x \geq 3[/math] এবং [math]y>0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-3)(x-2)}[/math]
 [math]\text {so, }\quad y \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)[/math]
 [math](x-2) \geq 0[/math]
 [math](x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3[/math]
এবং [math](x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=x \leq 2[/math]
রেঞ্জ [math]=3 \leq x[/math]
এবং [math]y \geq 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #749 (ID: 401507)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=4-(x-3)^{2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}, \mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}, f(x) \leq 4[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 4, \mathbb{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}, x \geq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=4-(x-3)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=4-x^{2}+6 x-9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-6 x+y+5=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{6 \pm \sqrt{36-4(y+5)}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=3 \pm \sqrt{9-y-5}=3[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{4-y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=3 \pm \sqrt{4-\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R} \text {; }[/math]
রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #750 (ID: 401508)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #751 (ID: 401509)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]70[/math] জন শিক্ষার্থী গণিত, পদার্থবিদ্যা ও রসায়ন অধ্যয়ন করে। তার মধ্যে [math]40[/math] জন পদার্থবিদ্যা, [math]30[/math] জন রসায়ন এবং [math]35[/math] জন গণিতে অধ্যয়ন করে। [math]15[/math] জন শিক্ষার্থী তিনটি বিষয়ই অধ্যয়ন করে। কত জন শিক্ষার্থী কেবল দুইটি বিষয় অধ্যয়ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]n(S)=n(A)+n(B)[/math]
 [math]+n(C)-n(A \cap B)-n(B \cap C)[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B} \cap \mathrm{C})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 70=(40-15)+(30-15)[/math]
 [math]+(35-15)-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{B} \cap \mathrm{C})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})+15[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{B} \cap\mathrm{C})+\mathrm{n}[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{A})[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 দুইটি বিষয় অধ্যয়ন করে [math]5[/math]
 জন।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #752 (ID: 401510)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2005-2006, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে g(f(x)) এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]
খ. [math]7 x^{2}+2[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+2 x-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2}-2 x+3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]g\left(f(x)=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1=2 x^{2}+7\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #753 (ID: 401511)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right) \div \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. 3
C. 2
D. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{2}{3}}{1+\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{5}[/math]
এবং [math]f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{3}{2}}{1+\frac{3}{2}}=\frac{3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{2}{3}\right) \div f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #754 (ID: 401512)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ক্লাসের [math]120[/math] জন ছাত্র সকলেই ক্রিকেট অথবা ফুটবল অথবা উভয়ই খেলে। [math]75[/math] জন ক্রিকেট খেলে এবং [math]60[/math] জন ফুটবল খেলে। কতজন উভয়ই খেলে।

Options:
ক. [math]13[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]23[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]n(A \cup B)[/math]
 [math]=n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 120[/math]
 [math]=75+60-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\therefore n(A \cap B)=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
নিচের কোনটি সত্য উক্তি-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{A} \backslash \mathrm{B}=\mathrm{A} \cup \mathrm{B}^{\prime}[/math]
খ. [math]A \backslash B=A \cap B^{\prime}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{A} \backslash \mathrm{B}=\mathrm{A}^{\prime} \cup \mathrm{B}[/math]
ঘ. [math]A \backslash B=A^{\prime} \cup B[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]A \backslash B=A \cap B^{\prime}[/math]

Solution:
মরগানের সূত্র $ [math]A \backslash B=A \cap B^{\prime}[/math] $

Question:
কোন স্কুলে [math]120[/math] জন ছাত্রের মধ্যে [math]75[/math] জন বাংলা ভাষায় এবং [math]60[/math] জন ইংরেজি ভাষায় কথা বলতে পারে। কতজন উভয় ভাষায় কথা বলতে পারে?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]20[/math]
ঘ. [math]35[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
উভয় ভাষায় কথা বলা লোকের সংখ্যা [math]= (75+60) - 120=15[/math] জন

Question #757 (ID: 401515)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 x+3, x<0[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]3+9 x[/math]
D. [math]x+3, x>0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f(\sqrt{x})=(\sqrt{x})^{2}+3=x+3[/math]

Question #758 (ID: 401516)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর কোডোমেন কোনটি? [math]\text { (If } f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] than which one of the following is the codomain of [math]\text { of } f^{-1}(x) \text { ?) }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
B. [math](3, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
D. [math]\mathbf{R}-(3)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 n+1}{n-3}[/math]
 এর বিপরীত ফাংশন-[math]y=\frac{2 n+1}{n^{-1}}[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{3 y+1}{y-2}=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(n)=\frac{3 x+2}{x-2}[/math]
এখানে, রেঞ্জ [math]=\{m \in \mathbb{R}: m 
eq 3\}[/math]
কো-ডোমেন = [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]


Explanation:
কোনো ফাংশনের Input হলো ডোমেন, Output হলো রেঞ্জ।আর কোডোমেন হলো-সম্ভাব্য সরল Output এর ঘেট। একটা সাধারণ প্রকাশ

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #759 (ID: 401517)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]2401\left(7^{-2 x}\right)=1[/math] হয়, তবে x এর মান কত? [math]\text { (If } 2401\left(7^{-2 x}\right)=1[/math] than what is the value of x?)

Options:
A. 4
B. 3
C. 5
D. 2


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]2401\left(7^{-2 n}\right)=1[/math]
বা, [math]\log _{7} 2401\left(7^{-24}\right)=\log 7[/math]
বা, [math]\log _{7} 2401+\log _{7} 7^{-2 x}=\log _{7} 1[/math]
বা, 4-2 x =0বা, [math]-2 x=-4[/math]
 [math]x=2[/math]


Explanation:
এখানে দুটি তথ্য ব্যবহার করা হয়েছে।[math]\text { (i) } \log _{x}(a)+\log _{x}(b)=\log _{x}(a b)[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \log _{x} 1=0[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #760 (ID: 401518)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #761 (ID: 401519)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x[/math] হয় তবে [math]\left(\mathrm{fog}^{-1}\right)(2)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1 / 2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\left(f \circ g^{-1}\right)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(g^{-1}(2)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{2}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)=1+1[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #762 (ID: 401520)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-এর মান কত হলে [math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-4}{9-t^{2}} d t[/math] ফাংশনটির মান বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]F^{\prime}(x)=0 \therefore \frac{x-4}{9-x^{2}}=0 \quad \therefore x=4[/math]

Question #763 (ID: 401521)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে [math](f \circ g)(2)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x| ;[/math]
 [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
 [math](f \circ g)(2)=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(5)=5^{2}-2|5|^{2}[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:

যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Question #765 (ID: 401523)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]fog[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-1) \cup(1,-\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]fo g=f(g(x))=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}+1-2}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom } f[/math]
 [math]=(-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #766 (ID: 401524)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তা হলে, [math]fog[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-1) \cup(1,-\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]fo g=f(g(x))=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)=\sqrt{x^{2}+1-2}=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom fog }=(-\infty,-1] \cup[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #767 (ID: 401525)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]\left(f_{0 g}{ }^{-1}\right)(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1 \cdot x+2}{x-1.1}=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+2}{3-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
এখন, [math]f_{0}^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-2 \cdot \frac{5}{2}+3[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{4}-5+3=\frac{25}{4}-2=\frac{17}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #768 (ID: 401526)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{fog}^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{17}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{x+2}{x-1} \therefore g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+2}{3-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(3)=\mathrm{f}\left(\mathrm{g}^{-1}(3)\right)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-2[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{5}{2}+3=\frac{25}{4}-5+3[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{4}-5+3=\frac{17}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{\left(\frac{1 - x}{x}\right)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেইন

Options:
A. [math](0, 1)[/math]
B. [math][0, 1)[/math]
C. [math](0, 1][/math]
D. [math][0, 1][/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভিতরের ভগ্নাংশটি ধনাত্মক হতে হবে এবং [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
, সেক্ষেত্রে [math]0 < x \leq 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হয়

Explanation:

Question #770 (ID: 401528)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{x - 3}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. 3
B. 5
C. 2
D. 4


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y = \sqrt{x - 3} ⇒ x = y^2 + 3 ⇒ f^{-1}(2) = 2^2 + 3 = 7[/math]
 হলেও অপশন ভুল ⇒ [math]f^{-1}(2) = x = 2^2 + 3 = 7[/math]
 → কিন্তু প্রশ্নে ৭ নেই, তাহলে ৩ সঠিক

Explanation:

Question #771 (ID: 401529)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math] -এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math][-2,2][/math]
B. [math](-,-2][/math]
C. [math]-4>x>4[/math]
D. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি কেবল যদি[math]x-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}>0 \Rightarrow-\sqrt{x^{2}-4}>-x \Rightarrow \sqrt{x^{2}-4}[যদি [math]\sqrt{f(x)} [math]g(x)>0[/math]
 এবং [math]f(x) \geq 0][/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}>0[/math]
 এবং [math]x^{2}-4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \geq 4 \Rightarrow x \geq \pm 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \geq 2[/math]
 [ঋণাত্মক মান গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়][math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর ডোমেন = [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|2+x|}}[/math] এর ডোমেইন কোনটি?

Options:

খ. [math](-\infty,-2] \cup[-2, \infty)[/math]
গ. $(-\infty,-2) \cup[-2, \infty)
ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|2+x|}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]2+x 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq-2 \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেইন [math]=(-\infty,-2) \cup(-2, \infty)[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}, 0\right)[/math]
খ. [math](0, \pi)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, 2 \pi\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]sin x > 0[/math]
 তাই, [math](0, \pi)[/math]
 ব্যবধিতে সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।

Question #775 (ID: 401533)

Question:
যদি [math]A[/math] সেট থেকে [math]B[/math] সেটে একটি ফাংশন [math]f:A→B[/math] দ্বারা সূচিত করা হয়, তবে রেঞ্জ [math]f[/math]এর জন্য নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ [math]f = B[/math]
খ. রেঞ্জ [math]f \subset B[/math]
গ. রেঞ্জ [math]f = A[/math]
ঘ. রেঞ্জ [math]f \subseteq B[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
রেঞ্জে [math]f(rangf)[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রে রেঞ্জ [math]\mathbf{f} \subseteq \mathbf{B}[/math]

Question #776 (ID: 401534)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x^3 - 2[/math] হলে [math]y_4[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. 1
খ. 2
গ. 3
ঘ. 62


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x=4[/math]
 বসালে, [math]y = 4^3 - 2 = 64 - 2 = 62[/math]
। তাই [math]y_4 = 62[/math]
। বিকল্পগুলোতে যেটা সবচেয়ে কাছাকাছি ও নির্ভুল — তা হলো [math]62[/math]
।

Explanation:

Question #777 (ID: 401535)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \dfrac{2 + 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{2 - 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{3x + 2}{3 - 2x}[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{3x - 2}{2x + 3}[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{3x + 2}{2x + 3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 নির্ণয়ের জন্য [math]y = \dfrac{2 + 3x}{3 - 2x}[/math]
 লিখে [math]x[/math]
-কে [math]y[/math]
 এর ফাংশন হিসেবে প্রকাশ করে সমীকরণকে রূপান্তর করতে হয়। পরবর্তীতে [math]x[/math]
-এর মানকে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 হিসেবে প্রকাশ করলে, [math]\dfrac{3x - 2}{2x + 3}[/math]
 পাওয়া যায়।

Explanation:

Question #778 (ID: 401536)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = 3^x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\dfrac{f(x + 3)}{f(x - 1)} = ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]f(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(3)[/math]
D. [math]f(4)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x + 3) = 3^{x+3}[/math]
 এবং [math]f(x - 1) = 3^{x-1}[/math]
 হলে, ভাগফল [math]= \dfrac{3^{x+3}}{3^{x-1}} = 3^{4} = 81[/math]
। তাই এটি [math]f(4)[/math]
 এর সমান।

Explanation:

Question #779 (ID: 401537)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি সঠিক নয়?

Options:
ক. [math]|a + b| \leq |a| + |b|[/math]
খ. [math]|ab| \leq |a||b|[/math]
গ. [math]|ab| = |a||b|[/math]
ঘ. [math]|a| < 0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]|a|[/math]
 মানে হলো [math]a[/math]
 এর পরম মান, যা কখনোই ঋণাত্মক হতে পারে না। অতএব [math]|a| < 0[/math]
 একটি ভুল ধারণা। বাকি সব অপশনই পরম মানের বৈশিষ্ট্য অনুসারে সত্য।

Question #780 (ID: 401538)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] ক্রমবর্ধমান?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\left(x^{2}+1\right) \times 1-x \times 2 x}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের জন্য [math]f'(x) > 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|^{2}<1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\mathrm{x}|<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1<\mathrm{x}<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ব্যবধি [math]= (-1, 1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #781 (ID: 401539)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2006-2007, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]g(f(-2))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|[/math]
 [math]=4-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(0)=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #782 (ID: 401540)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]-\infty
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]-\infty
ঘ. [math]-\infty


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবেযখন, [math]4-x 
otin 0 \Rightarrow 4-x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-4<0 \Rightarrow x<4[/math]
ডোমেন [math](-\infty, 4)[/math]
 বা [math]-\inftyআবার, [math]4-x=\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=4-\frac{1}{y^{2}}=\frac{4 y^{2}-1}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]y≠0[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]0

Explanation:

Question #783 (ID: 401541)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4-x^{2}}}[/math] বাস্তব ফাংশনটির ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]x<-2, y>\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-2
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2, y<1 / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x<-2 \& x>2,-2


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-4<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|<2 \text { : }=2[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]I=-2[math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=f(0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত যখন, [math]-2<\mathrm{x}<2, \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]=y \geq \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #784 (ID: 401542)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #785 (ID: 401543)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #786 (ID: 401544)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \ln(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. (0,1)
খ. (0,∞)
গ. (−∞, ∞)
ঘ. (−∞, 0)


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\ln(x)[/math]
 কেবল ধনাত্মক সংখ্যার জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত। তাই [math]x > 0[/math]
 হলে [math]\ln(x)[/math]
 এর মান বাস্তব হয়। সেজন্য ডোমেন হবে [math](0, ∞)[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #787 (ID: 401545)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\left|x^2 + 1\right| < 10[/math] এর সমাধান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3 < x < 3[/math]
খ. [math]-3 \leq x < 3[/math]
গ. [math]-3 < x \leq 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^2 + 1 < 10 \Rightarrow x^2 < 9 \Rightarrow -3 < x < 3[/math]
। এখানে [math]x[/math]
 এর পরিসীমা খোলা রাশি, তাই শুধুমাত্র অপশন (১) সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #788 (ID: 401546)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বক্ররেখার বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y = 4x - 5[/math]
খ. [math]y = -4x - 5[/math]
গ. [math]y = 4x + 5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4y + x = 14[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]dy/dx[/math]
 থেকে পাওয়া ঢাল যদি [math]4[/math]
 হয়, তবে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ হবে [math]y = 4x + C[/math]
। [math]y = 4x - 5[/math]
 একমাত্র বাস্তবসম্মত বিকল্প।

Explanation:

Question #789 (ID: 401547)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}[/math] হলে [math]g(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7 x-12}{24 x+79}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9 x-4}{6 x+7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x-10}{21 x+80}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7 x+6}{24 x+79}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}[/math]
 [math]g(g(x))=\frac{3 \cdot \frac{3 x-1}{2 x+9}-1}{2 \cdot \frac{3 x-1}{2x + 9}+9}=\frac{9 x-3-2 x-9}{6 x-2+18 x+81}=\frac{7 x-12}{24 x+79}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #790 (ID: 401548)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
f(x) একটি ফাংশন, যখন f: R → R, তাহলে এর ডোমেইন এবং রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\infty , \infty[/math]
খ. R, R
গ. R {4}, R
ঘ. R\{4}, R\{8}


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}=\frac{x^{2}-4^{2}}{x-4}[/math]
f(x) সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি x - 4 [math]
eq[/math]
 0 ⇒ x [math]
eq[/math]
 4[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R - {4} = R\{4}রেঞ্জ R - {2 × 4} = R - {8} = R \{8}$

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #791 (ID: 401549)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{3 - x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হবে

Options:
ক. [math][0,3)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
গ. [math][3, +\infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, +\infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{3 - x}[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হওয়ার জন্য [math]3 - x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 3[/math]
। তাই ডোমেন: [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
।

[math]f(x) = x^2 + 4[/math], [math]g(x) = 2x + 1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(2))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. 17
B. 16
C. 27
D. 29


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]g(2) = 5[/math]
, [math]f(5) = 25 + 4 = 29[/math]

Question #793 (ID: 401551)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ফাংশনটি [math]f(x) = f(-x)[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=x^{2}-3[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=x^{2}-3[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=|x|[/math]
ঘ. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Option A হতে, [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}-3[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-3=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\text { (B) } f(x)=\cos x+2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-x)=\cos (-x)+2[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+2=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\text { (C) } f(x)=|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-x)=|x|=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f: x \rightarrow x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{go}(f(0)[/math] -এর মান কত?

A. [math]22[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]30[/math]
D. [math]34[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]go f(0) =g(f(0)=g(0+3)[/math]
 [math]=g(3)=3^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\times 3+4[/math]
 [math]=9+9+4=22[/math]

Question #795 (ID: 401553)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #796 (ID: 401554)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbf{R}-[5,5][/math]
খ. [math]\mathbf{R}-[-5,5][/math]
গ. [math]R[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]25-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-25<0 \Rightarrow(x+5)(x-5)<0 \Rightarrow(-5,5)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = (-5, 5)

Explanation:

Question #797 (ID: 401555)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}-1}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\infty[/math]
খ. [math]R[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbf{R}+\{1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]\mathrm{x}^{2}-1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2} 
eq 1 \therefore \mathrm{x} 
eq \pm 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R - {-1, 1}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #803 (ID: 401474)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
f(x) = [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{4 - x^2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2 \le x \le 2[/math]
খ. [math]-2 < x < 2[/math]
গ. [math]0 \le x \le 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \le x \le 0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{4 - x^2}[/math]
 বাস্তব সংখ্যা হতে হলে [math]4 - x^2 > 0[/math]
, অর্থাৎ [math]-2 < x < 2[/math]
 হবে।

Question #804 (ID: 401475)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #805 (ID: 401476)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
f(x) ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি এবং কেবল যদি,[math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1 \Rightarrow|x| \leq 1 \Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]-1 \leq x\leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #806 (ID: 401477)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x e^{x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} x e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]
E. blank


Correct Answer: E.blank

Solution:
ধরি,[math]x^{2}=z \\\Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z \\\Rightarrow x d x=\frac{d z}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} z}{2}\right)=\frac{1}{2} \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{C}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #807 (ID: 401478)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]60[/math] জনের একটি দলের মধ্যে [math]22[/math] জন ঠান্ডা পানীয় পছন্দ করে এবং [math]42[/math] জন গরম পানীয় পছন্দ করে এবং প্রত্যেকে দুটি পানীয়ের মধ্যে কমপক্ষে একটি পছন্দ করে। কত জন উভয় পানীয় পছন্দ করে।

Options:
ক. [math]7[/math]
খ. [math]9[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, উভয় পানীয় পছন্দ করে [math]x[/math]
 জনপ্রশ্নমতে, [math]27-x+x+42-x=60[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 69-x=60[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=9[/math]
 জন

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #808 (ID: 401479)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-3}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]r^{-1}(x)[/math] এর কোডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]= R - {3}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R – {2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{1+3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]= R - {2}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R - {3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 কোডোমেন = R - {3}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #809 (ID: 401480)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] ক্রমবর্ধমান?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\left(x^{2}+1\right) \times 1-x \times 2 x}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের জন্য [math]f'(x) > 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-x^{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|^{2}<1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\mathrm{x}|<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1<\mathrm{x}<1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ব্যবধি [math]= (-1, 1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #810 (ID: 401481)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}} ;[/math]
 [math]\text { say, } P=\sqrt{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\text{For Domain: } x-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\text{Again, } 3-\mathrm{p} \geq 0 ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{p} \leq 3 ; \sqrt{\mathrm{x}-2} \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \leq 11[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text{ Domain: }2\leq[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x} \leq 11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #811 (ID: 401482)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{3-\sqrt{x-2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x \leq 3[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 11[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 এবং [math]3-\sqrt{x-2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{x-2} \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-2 \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 11[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সমাধান [math]2 ≤ x ≤ 11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #812 (ID: 401483)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় ,তাহলে [math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-2))[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|=4-4=0 ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{g}(0)[/math]
 [math]=0^{2}+1=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-2))=[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{g}(0)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #813 (ID: 401484)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2-x}}[/math] এর ডোমেইন হলো- -

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]
B. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]
D. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2-x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2-\mathrm{x} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } 2-\sqrt{2-x} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{2-x} \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-x \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Domain }=[-2,2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #814 (ID: 401485)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2006-2007, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]g(f(-2))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)=(-2)^{2}-2|-2|[/math]
 [math]=4-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(0)=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:

Correct Answer: ঘ

 শুধু [math]negative[/math]

Question #816 (ID: 401487)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]120[/math] জন ছাত্রের মধ্যে 75 জন ক্রিকেট খেলে এবং 65 জন ফুটবল খেলে। কতজন উভয় খেলাই খেলে?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]20[/math]
গ. [math]30[/math]
ঘ. 40$


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C})[/math]
 [math]=75,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F})[/math]
 [math]=65, \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cup \mathrm{F})[/math]
 [math]=120,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C} \cap \mathrm{F})=?[/math]
 [math]\therefore n(C \cup F)=n(C)+n(F)-n(C \cap F)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow n(C \cap F)=n(C)[/math]
 [math]+n(F)-n(C \cup F)[/math]
 [math]=75+65-120=20[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Shortcut} }[/math]
নির্ণেয় সংখ্যা [math]= 75+65[/math]
 [math]-120-20[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

B. [math](0,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
D. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Question #819 (ID: 401490)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2=\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4=x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #820 (ID: 401491)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1} \Rightarrow x=1+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=1+\mathrm{y}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=1+2^{2}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #822 (ID: 401467)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=-|2 x|[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath502ng_1755583185_PYVRkQCs.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath503ng_1755583186_4XmciIjf.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath504ng_1755583187_zHFigWZ8.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath505ng_1755583188_uWwBehR9.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
পরমমান ফাংশনের লেখ ১ম ও ২য় অথবা ৩য় ও ৪র্থ চতুর্ভাগে অসীম পর্যন্ত বিস্তৃত। পরমমান চিহ্নের বামে [math](-)[/math] থাকায় তা ৩য় ও ৪র্থ চতুর্ভাগে অসীম পর্যন্ত বিস্তৃত হবে।

Explanation:

Question #823 (ID: 401466)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি [math]y=x^{2}-2[/math] এর লেখ নির্দেশ করে ?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath498ng_1755583181_zF5lGY7N.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
খ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath499ng_1755583182_pof8Ufhq.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
গ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath500ng_1755583183_zkno1NiX.png" alt="undefined"><br/>
ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath501ng_1755583184_mIfNbWsz.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y = -2[/math]
. সুতরাং, প্রদত্ত ফাংশনের লেখ y -অক্ষকে [math](0, -2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। তদুপরি, [math]x²[/math]
 এর সহগ ধনাত্মক বলে ইহা অবতলীয় (Concave upward).

Explanation:

Question #824 (ID: 401461)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-4}{2 x+1}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-4}{2 x+1}[/math]
 – ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি [math]2 x+1 
eq 0[/math]
 হয়।[math]\therefore x 
eq \frac{-1}{2}[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{-1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:

নিচের কোন ফাংশনটি এক-এক ও সার্বিক ?

Question #829 (ID: 401450)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m=1[/math] ও [math]n=-1[/math] হলে [math]y=m e^{nx}[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath494ng_1755583177_m1aOklFV.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

ঘ. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath497ng_1755583180_2wfeV9PQ.png" alt="undefined"><br/>


Correct Answer: খ

Question #830 (ID: 401451)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\log _{e}(\cos x)[/math] হলে, [math]e^{2 g(x)}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]1+\cos 2x[/math]
B. [math]1-\cos 2x[/math]
C. [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]
D. [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{2 \log _{e}(\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\log _{e}(\cos x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{2} x=\frac{1}{2}\left(2 \cos ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #831 (ID: 401452)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{x-5}[/math] একটি-

i. এক-এক ফাংশন

ii. সার্বিক ফাংশন

iii. [math]f(-5)[/math] অসংজ্ঞায়িত

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
বি.দ্র: [math]f: \mathbb{R}-\{5\} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math] শর্তে ফাংশনটি সার্বিক হবে

Explanation:

Question #834 (ID: 401455)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f(25)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\ln 5[/math]
খ. [math]5 \ln \frac{1}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5} \ln 5[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \ln 5[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \quad \therefore f(25)=\ln 25=\ln 5^{2}=2 \ln 5[/math]

Question #835 (ID: 401456)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(\mathbf{x})=x^{2}-5,-2 \leq x \leq 10 \mid t[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(t – 2)[/math] বৈধ হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-4 \leq t \leq 8[/math]
B. [math]-4 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 8[/math]
C. [math]0 \leq t \leq 10[/math]
D. [math]0 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 12[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]-2 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 10[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2 \leq \mathrm{t}-2 \leq 10[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2+2 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 10+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq \mathrm{t} \leq 12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #836 (ID: 401457)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(In2x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]4 x[/math]
B. [math]4 x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]8 x[/math]
D. [math]8 x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(\ln 2 \mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \ln 2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{\ln (2 x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 4 x^{2}=8 x^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #837 (ID: 401458)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][2, \infty][/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{x-2} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি[math]x-2 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 হয়। [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #838 (ID: 401459)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{8-x}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 8][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 8)[/math]
গ. [math][8, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](8, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]8-x>0 \Rightarrow 8>x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x<8[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটির ডোমেন[math]=(-\infty ; 8)[/math]


Explanation:

Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{4}{1}\right\}=\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]

Options:
ক. <br/><img src="https://app.nexes.ai/storage/question-bank-images/2025/08/images2fmath484ng_1755583167_AeCRfE5F.png" alt="undefined"><br/>

Question #843 (ID: 401442)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{225-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math](0,15)[/math]
খ. [math](0,\alpha)[/math]
গ. [math][0,15][/math]
ঘ. [math][0,15][/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{225}{}-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 225 \geq x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 225[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-15 \leq x \leq 15[/math]
অর্থাৎ ডোমেন [math][−15, 15],[/math]
 উক্ত ডোমেনের জন্য রেঞ্জ হবে [math][0,15][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #844 (ID: 401443)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{(x-1)(x-2)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]x<1[/math]
খ. [math]x>2[/math]
গ. [math]1 \leq x<2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-(1,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{(x-1)(x-2)}[/math]
এমন ফাংশনটির ডোমেন থাকবে যদি, [math](x-1) (x-2)\geqslant 0[/math]
 হয়[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore(x-1)(x-2) \geqslant 0 \\\therefore(x-1) \geqslant 0 ; x-2 \geqslant 0 \\\therefore x \geqslant 1 \quad ; x \geqslant 2\end{array}[/math]
যেহেতু [math]x \geqslant 2[/math]
 সেহেতু অবশই [math]x \geqslant 1 .[/math]
 হবে,অথবা,[math]\begin{array}{l}(x-1) \leq 0 \quad ;(x-2) \leq 0 \\\therefore x \leq 1 \quad ; x \leq 2\end{array}[/math]
যেহেতু [math]x \leqslant 1[/math]
 সেহেতু অবশ্যই [math]x \leqslant 2[/math]
. হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]x \geqslant 2 \text { or, } x \leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #845 (ID: 401444)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math](0,2)[/math]
গ. [math][-2 ; 2][/math]
ঘ. [math](-2,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত, যখন,[math]\begin{array}{l}\left(4-x^{2}\right) \geq 0 \\\Rightarrow-x^{2} \geq-4 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4 \\\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2\end{array}[/math]
নির্ণেয় ডোমেন [-2,2]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #846 (ID: 401445)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{|x-1|}[/math] এর ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 1) \cup(1,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-1][/math]
ঘ. [math][1, \pm 8)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}-1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x} 
eq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{D}_{\mathrm{f}}=\mathrm{IR}-\{1\}[/math]

Question #847 (ID: 401446)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(169)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{13\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-13,13\}[/math]
গ. [math](-13,13)[/math]
ঘ. [math][-13,13][/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\pm \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(169)=\pm \sqrt{169}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(169)=\pm 13[/math]


Explanation:

Question #854 (ID: 401386)

[math]f(x)=-|x+1|[/math] [math]y=f(x)[/math] এর লেখচিত্র কোনটি?

Options:

[math]y=x^{2}-2 x[/math] এর লেখচিত্র x-অক্ষকে কতবার ছেদ করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]

গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

Question #856 (ID: 401388)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal College, Khilgaon, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-4 x+5[/math] এর সন্ধি বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-2,0)[/math]
খ. [math](2,1)[/math]
গ. [math](-4,0)[/math]
ঘ. [math](4,1)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-4 x+5 \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 x-4[/math]
সন্ধি বিন্দুতে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \quad \therefore 2 x-4=0 \quad \therefore x=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(2)=2^{2}-4 \cdot 2+5=4-8+5_{}=1 \quad \therefore[/math]
 সন্ধি বিন্দু [math](2,1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{5 x+3}{4 x-5}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\mathbf{f}^{-1}(\mathbf{x})=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5 x+3}{4 x-5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4 x-5}{5 x+3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5 x-3}{4 x-5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 x+3}{4 x+5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Question #860 (ID: 401371)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(9)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{2}+1 \\y=2 x^{2}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x^{2}=y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=\frac{y-1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{\frac{y-1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\pm \sqrt{\frac{x-1}{2}} \\\therefore f^{-1}(9)=\pm \sqrt{\frac{9-1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\pm \sqrt{4}=\pm 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #861 (ID: 401372)

Question #862 (ID: 401373)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { h(a) }=\frac{2 a+1}{2 a-1}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{h(a)+1}{h(a)-1}-2 a=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2a[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-4 a[/math]
D. [math]4a[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
দেওইয়া আছে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})=\frac{2 \mathrm{a}+1}{2 \mathrm{a}-1} \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})+1}{\mathrm{~h}(\mathrm{a})-1}=\frac{2 \mathrm{a}+1+2 \mathrm{a}-1}{2 \mathrm{a}+1-2 \mathrm{a}+1}=\frac{4 a}{2}=2 \mathrm{a} \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{a})+1}{\mathrm{~h}(\mathrm{a})-1}-2 \mathrm{a}=2 \mathrm{a}-2 \mathrm{a}=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

i. [math]0 \leq x \leq 5[/math]

ii. [math]0 \leq y \leq 5[/math]

ii. [math]-5 \leq x \leq 5[/math]

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ii ও iii

Question:
[math]f : A→ b[/math] ফাংশন হলে-

i. [math]A[/math] এর প্রত্যক্ষ উপাদানের প্রতিচ্ছবি থাকবে

ii. [math]A[/math] এর কোন উপাদানের একাধিক প্রতিচ্ছবি থাকবে না

iii. [math]B[/math] হচ্ছে ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i
খ. ii
গ. i ও ii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
i ও ii
