Question #1027 (ID: 401211)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})=\ln x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=e^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog }(1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]e[/math]
D. [math]\log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\circ g(x) =f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \{g(x)\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \mathrm{e}^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \ln e=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f o g(1)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1028 (ID: 401212)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{4}-x^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog }(x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\left(x+\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
C. [math](2 x+1)^{2}[/math]
D. [math](2 x-1)^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left(x+\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]fog(x) =f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\{g(x)\}^{4}-\{g(x)\}^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (x+1)^{2}-x-1+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 \cdot x \frac{1}{2}+\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(x+\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1029 (ID: 401213)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=2^{x}[/math] এবং [math]f(x)=e^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\operatorname{gof}(\ln x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]g(x)[/math]
B. [math]f(x)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{g(x)}{f(x)}[/math]
D. [math]g(x)^{f(x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]g(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g \circ f(x)=g(f(x))=g\left(e^{x}\right)=2^{e^{x}} \\g \circ f(\ln x)=2^{e^{\ln x}}=2^{x}=g(x)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1031 (ID: 401206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(35)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-6,6)[/math]
খ. [math][-6,6][/math]
গ. [math]\{-6,6\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-6,6\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 হলে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{} y=f(x)\\\Rightarrow 35=x^{2}-1\\\Rightarrow x^{2}=36\\\Rightarrow x= \pm 6\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1032 (ID: 401207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\text { f: } \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(0)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{i,-i\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\{\}[/math]
ঘ. অসংজ্ঞায়িত


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{\}[/math]

Solution:
সংজ্ঞানুযায়ী,[math]\begin{aligned}\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0) & =\{\mathrm{x} \in \mathbb{R}: \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=0\} \\\quad= & \left\{\mathrm{x} \in \mathbb{R}: \mathrm{x}^{2}+1=0\right\} \\\quad= & \{\mathrm{x} \in \mathbb{R}: \mathrm{x}= \pm \mathrm{i}\} \\& \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\{\}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1034 (ID: 401183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math] হলে [math]f(\ell n \sin x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1+\cos 2 x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{2} x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1+\sin 2 x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)= e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(\ell n \sin x) =e^{2 \ln \sin x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{\ell n \sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1035 (ID: 401184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)=x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}+3[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+5[/math]
C. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
D. [math]x^{2}+9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x^{2}+5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f\left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)=\left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}+2 \cdot x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+3 \\\Rightarrow f\left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)=\left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}+5 \\\therefore f(x)=x^{2}+5\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{3}+2,|\mathrm{x}|<5[/math] হলে [math]m[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(m+2)[/math] বৈধ হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-3
B. [math]7
C. [math]-7
D. [math]3


Correct Answer: C.[math]-7

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}|x|<5 \\\Rightarrow |m+2|<5 \\\Rightarrow -5

Question #1037 (ID: 401186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math][-1,1][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)= y=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{2}-1 \geqslant 0[/math]
 [math](x+1)(x-1) \geqslant 0[/math]
রেঞ্জ [math]R_{f}=-[/math]
 [math]0 \quad[0, \infty)\rightarrow {\infty}[/math]
 [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1038 (ID: 401187)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{(x+3)(x-2)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
খ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-[-3,2][/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-[-3,-2][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-[-3,2][/math]

Solution:
[math](x+3)(x-2) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]x \leq-3[/math]
 অথবা, [math]x \geq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1039 (ID: 401188)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ell \pi \frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(36)=\text{?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \ln 6[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln (\frac{1}{6})[/math]
C. [math]-2 \ln 6[/math]
D. [math]-2 \ln (\frac{1}{6})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-2 \ln 6[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) =\ln \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]f(36) =\ln \left(\frac{1}{36}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(6^{-2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \ln 6[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1040 (ID: 401189)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{49-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math][-7,0][/math]
খ. [math][0,-7][/math]
গ. [math][-7,7][/math]
ঘ. [math](-7,7)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][-7,7][/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}49-x^{2} \geq 0 \\\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 49 \\\Rightarrow |x| \leq 7 \\\therefore-7 \leq x \leq 7\end{array}[/math]

খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-2\}[/math]
গ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \leq 2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{-2\}[/math]

eq 0 \\\quad \therefore x 
eq-2\end{array}[/math]

Question:

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}1-x^{2}>0\\\Rightarrow 1>x^{2}\\\Rightarrow |x|<1\\\therefore-1

খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{0\}[/math]

 এর ডোমেন [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{d}{c}\right\}[/math]

Question #1044 (ID: 401193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]p(x)=\frac{4 x+5}{x-3}[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-4\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-[-4,4][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=p(x)=\frac{4 x+5}{x-3}\\\Rightarrow x y-3 y=4 x+5\\\Rightarrow x y-4 x=3 y+5\\\Rightarrow x(y-4)=3 y+5\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \dot{x}=\frac{3 y+5}{y-4} \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
 হবে, যদি ও কেবল যদি [math]y-4 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y 
eq 4[/math]
 হয়[math]\therefore \text { Range }=\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1045 (ID: 401194)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{-1}(x+3)[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-4)[/math]
খ. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][-4,-2][/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-[-4,-2][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][-4,-2][/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}-1 \leq x+3 \leq 1 \\\Rightarrow -1-3 \leq x+3-3 \leq 1-3 \\\Rightarrow -4 \leq x \leq-2 \\\underline{1}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1047 (ID: 401196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{4}-81}{x-3}[/math] এর রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{3\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{81\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{108\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{324\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{108\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{4}-81}{x-3}[/math]
ডোমেন [math]\mathbf{f}=\mathbb{R}-\{3\}[/math]
এখন, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{4}-81}{x-3}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{4}-3^{4}}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4.3^{4-1}=108[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]\text { f }=\mathbb{R}-\{108\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1048 (ID: 401197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-3 x^{2}+12 x-1[/math] এর রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math][11, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{11\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 11][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 11][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) =-3 x^{2}+12 x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow12-1-3\left(x^{2}-4 x+4\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 11-3(x-2)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]= 11[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]f=(-\infty, 11][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1049 (ID: 401198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{5 x}{4+x^{2}}[/math] এর রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left[-\frac{5}{4}, \frac{5}{4}\right][/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left(-\frac{5}{4}, \frac{5}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left[-\frac{4}{5}, \frac{4}{5}\right][/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left(-\frac{4}{4}, \frac{4}{5}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left[-\frac{5}{4}, \frac{5}{4}\right][/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=\frac{5 x}{4+x^{2}}=y \\\Rightarrow 5 x=4 y+y x^{2} \\\therefore y x^{2}-5 x+4 y=0\end{array}[/math]
সমীকরণটির নিশ্চায়ক: [math]25-4 \cdot y(4 y) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 25-16 y^{2} \geq 0\\\Rightarrow 25 \geq 16 \mathrm{y}^{2}\\\Rightarrow 16 y^{2} \leq 25\\\therefore-\frac{5}{4} \leq y \leq \frac{5}{4}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1050 (ID: 401199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x^{2}-4\right)[/math] এর ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-2) \cup(2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math]
ঘ. [math](-2,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-\infty,-2) \cup(2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log \left(x^{2}-4\right)[/math]
এখন, [math]x^{2}-4>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x+2)(x-2)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]f=(-\infty,-2) \cup(2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

ক. [math](1, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][1, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](e, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math][e, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log _{10}\left(\log _{e} x\right)[/math]
এখন [math]\log _{e} x>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x>1[/math]

Question #1052 (ID: 401201)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{e}\left(\log _{10}\left(\log _{100} x\right)\right)[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math](10, \infty)[/math]
B. [math](100, \infty)[/math]
C. [math][10, \infty)[/math]
D. [math][100, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](100, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log _{e}\left(\log _{10}\left(\log _{100} x\right)\right)[/math]
এখন [math]\log _{10}\left(\log _{100} x\right)>0[/math]
অর্থাৎ, [math]\log _{100} x>1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x>100[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1053 (ID: 401202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2+3 \sin x[/math] এর রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,5][/math]
খ. [math](-1,5)[/math]
গ. [math][-3 ; 3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-1,3][/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,5][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2+3 \sin x[/math]
Sink এর সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]+1[/math]
স র্বো নিম্ন [math]-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad 2+3=5, \quad 2-3=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Pange, }[-1,5][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1054 (ID: 401203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=7 \sin x+24 \cos x[/math] এর রেঞ্জ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][-31,31][/math]
খ. [math][-25,25][/math]
গ. [math][-17,17][/math]
ঘ. [math][-7,7][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-25,25][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=7 \sin x+24 \cos x[/math]
ধরি, [math]7=r \sin \theta[/math]
 এবং [math]24=r \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}r^{2}=7^{2}+24^{2} \therefore r=25 \\\theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{7}{24}\right) \\\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=25 \sin \theta \sin \mathrm{x}+25 \cos \theta \cos \mathrm{x} \\\Rightarrow 25 \cos (x-\theta) \\\Rightarrow 25 \cos \left(x-\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{7}{24}\right)\right) \\\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]f=[-25,25][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1055 (ID: 401204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন ফাংশনটি এক-এক ও সার্বিক?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=|x|+1[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=x^{3}+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)=x^{3}+1[/math]

Solution:
সাধারণত দ্বিঘাত, পরমমান ও ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন এক-এক ও সার্বিক নয়। তবে রৈখিক ফাংশন এক-এক ও সার্বিক।

Question #1057 (ID: 401181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ell n 4 x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}\right)[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 x[/math]
B. [math]4 x[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\ln 4 \mathrm{x}^{2}=\ln (2 \mathrm{x})^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2 \ln 2 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\right)=2[/math]
 [math]\ln \left(2 \cdot \frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\right)=2 \ln \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1058 (ID: 401168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1059 (ID: 401169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math] ফাংশনের রেজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math][R-\{0,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন R- {1}এই ডোমেনের মধ্যে f(x) এর মান সর্বদা ঋণাত্মক কারণ [math]x[/math]
 এর [math](x ≠ 1[/math]
 ছাড়া) যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]|1 – x > 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]=(-\infty, 0)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1060 (ID: 401170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হয়, তবে f একটি-

Options:
ক. এক-এক ফাংশন
খ. জোড় ফাংশন
গ. বিজোড় ফাংশন
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.বিজোড় ফাংশন

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x \quad \therefore f(-x)=\sin (-x)=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})=-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \therefore[/math]
 এটি একটি বিজোড় ফাংশন।

Explanation:

Question #1061 (ID: 401171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1+x+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1+x+x^{2}}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{3}}{x^{4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=\frac{1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x^{4}}}{\frac{1}{x^{2}}}=\frac{x^{4}+x^{2}+1}{x^{2}}=\frac{1+x^{2}+x^{4}}{x^{2}}=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1065 (ID: 401178)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]p(P)=p, n(Q)=q[/math] হলে, [math]n(P \times Q)[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]p[/math]
B. [math]q[/math]
C. [math]p+q[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{pq}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\mathrm{pq}[/math]

Solution:
দুইটি সেট [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর উপাদান সংখ্যা যথাক্রমে [math]p[/math]
 ও [math]q[/math]
 হলে, [math]n(p \times Q)=p \times q[/math]
 হবে ।

Explanation:

Question #1066 (ID: 401179)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{cc}-2 x, & x0\end{array}\right.[/math] হলে, [math]f(-2)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-4[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l} f(x)=-2 x, x<0 \\\therefore f(-2)=-2(-2)=4\end{array}[/math]

Question #1068 (ID: 401150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির ব্রেজ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-8 \leq f(x) \leq-5[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)>0[/math]
গ. [math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6 \leq f(x) \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3 \\f(0)=-0^{2}-2(0)+3=3 \\f(-1)=-(-1)^{2}-2(-1)+3=4 \\f(-2)=-(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+3=3 \\f(-3)=-(-3)^{2}-2(-3)+3=0 \\f(-4)=-(-4)^{2}-2(-4)+3=-5\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
 এর মধ্যে [math]-5 ≤ f(x) ≤ 4[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]y=\sqrt{\frac{1-x}{x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]; \frac{1-x}{x} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0 ; 1-x \leq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 1 \therefore D_{f}=[0,1][/math]

Question #1071 (ID: 401153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4,4][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,4][/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math] ও [math][0,1][/math]
ঘ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}} \therefore|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1072 (ID: 401154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x^{2}-3 x, & x \geq 2 \\x+2, & x<2\end{array}\right.[/math] তবে [math]f(2)+f(-2)[/math] এর মান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(2)=2^{2}-[/math]
 [math]3.2=4-6=-2[/math]
 [math]; f(-2)=-2+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(2)+\mathrm{f}(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2+0=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1073 (ID: 401155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=e^{x},[/math] [math]g(x)=\sin ^{-1} x,[/math] [math]h(x)=f(g(x)) \text {, then } \frac{h^{\prime}(x)}{h(x)}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{\sin ^{-1} x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]h(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{-1} x} ;[/math]
 [math]h^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{\sin ^{-1} x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{h^{\prime}(x)}{h(x)}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1074 (ID: 401156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Which of the following function is even function? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]f(x)=\frac{a^{x}+1}{a^{x}-1}[/math]
B. [math]f(x)=x \frac{a^{x}-1}{a^{x}+1}[/math]
C. [math]f(x)=\frac{a^{x}-a^{-x}}{a^{x}+a^{-x}}[/math]
D. [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(x)=x \frac{a^{x}-1}{a^{x}+1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { For an even function, } F(x)=F(-x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1075 (ID: 401157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলো। এটি কোন ধরনের ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. ধ্রুব ফাংশন
খ. বিপরীত ফাংশন
গ. অভেদ ফাংশন
ঘ. সংযোজিত ফাংশন


Correct Answer: C.অভেদ ফাংশন

Solution:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R ; f(x)=x[/math] একটি অভেদ ফাংশন ।

Explanation:

Question #1076 (ID: 401158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ { [math]a, b, c, d[/math]} হলে কোনটি এক-এক ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f (c) = d, f(d) = a[/math]
খ. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f (c) = b, f(d) = a[/math]
গ. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f (c) = d[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f (c) = d, f (c) = a[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]f(a) = b, f(b) = c, f (c) = d, f(d) = a[/math]

Solution:
Hints: ফাংশন f: A B কে এক-এক ফাংশন বলা হবে যদি A এর ভিন্ন ভিন্ন উপাদানের প্রতিচ্ছবি B তে ভিন্ন ভিন্ন হয়।Solve : Option (A) এর ক্ষেত্রে A এর প্রত্যেকটা ভিন্ন ভিন্ন উপাদানের প্রতিচ্ছবি B তে ভিন্ন। ফলে এটিই এক-এক ফাংশন ।
[Image]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: Opltion (B) এর জন্য ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়, কারণ f(a) = f(c) = b অর্থাৎ একাধিক ফাংশনের প্রতিচ্ছবি একটি। Option (C) অসম্পূর্ণ, কারণ f(d) এর বিষয়ে কিছুই বলা হয় নি। Option (D) ফাংশন নয়, কেবলমাত্র অন্বয়। কারন ডোমেনের একটি উপাদানের জন্য একাধিক প্রতিচ্ছবি আছে, যা ফাংশন হবার শর্তবিরোধী।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1077 (ID: 401159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x বাস্তব সংখ্যা হলে [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেনঃ

Options:
ক. - 4 ছাড়া সকল বাস্তব সংখ্যা
খ. -4 এবং +4 ছাড়া সকল বাস্তব সংখ্যা
গ. সকল বাস্তব সংখ্যা
ঘ. 0 ছাড়া সকল বাস্তব সংখ্যা
ঙ. Blank


Correct Answer: E.Blank

Solution:
Hints: ডোমেন হল x এর সে সমস্ত মান, যার জন্য f(x) সঙ্গায়িত।Solve : [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}} ; 16-x^{2} 
eq 0[/math]
 এর জন্য এবং[math]16-x^{2}>0[/math]
 এর জন্য f(x) সঙ্গায়িতএখানে [math]16-x^{2} 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} 
eq 16 \Rightarrow x 
eq \pm 4[/math]
এবং [math]16-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-4[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ এখানে প্রশ্নের B Option এ সকল বাস্তব সংখ্যা কথাটা পুরোটা যৌক্তিক নয়। কারণ root এর ভেতরের অংশ অবশ্যই > (0) হবে। তা না হলে বাস্তব সংখ্যা পাওয়া যাবে না। এখন [math]16-x^2 > 0[/math] হওয়ার কারণে সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য f(x) সঙ্গায়িত নয়। অর্থাৎ কোনো Option ই সঠিক নয়।

Sub-Questions:

Question #1079 (ID: 401161)

Question:
[math]\text { Find the value of } f[g(3)] \text { if } f(x)=\log _{3} x \text { and } g(x)=x^{2} \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f[g(3)]=f(9)=\log _{3} 9=2[/math]

Question #1080 (ID: 401162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x+1)=\frac{x^{2}+1}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f(0)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}+1)=\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}+1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}+1=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(0)=\frac{(-1)^{2}+1}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1081 (ID: 401163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একই বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত দুটি বলের ক্রিয়ারেখার মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\alpha[/math] এর কোন মানটির জন্য বলদ্বয়ের লব্ধির মান বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. α = 90°
খ. α = 180°
গ. α = 0°
ঘ. α = কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: দুটি বলের লন্দি তখনই সর্বোচ্চ হবে যখন বলদ্বয় একই দিকে ক্রিয়া করবে।Solve : যদি কোনো বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত P ও Q বলের ক্রিয়ারেখার লব্ধির মান W এবং মধ্যবর্তী কোণ α হয় তবে সামান্তরিকের সূত্রানুসারে,[math]\mathrm{W}=\sqrt{\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ \operatorname {cos } \alpha}}[/math]
এখন লব্ধি বৃহত্তম হলে, [math]W= P + Q[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathrm{P}+\mathrm{Q}=\sqrt{\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha} \\\Rightarrow\left(\mathrm{P}+\mathrm{Q)}^{2}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha\right. \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{Q}^{2}+2 \mathrm{PQ} \cos \alpha \\\Rightarrow \cos \alpha=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos \alpha=\cos 0^{\circ} \\\therefore \alpha=0^{\circ}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1082 (ID: 401164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন, রেঞ্জ এবং বিপরীত ফাংশন নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]R-2, R-\{0\}, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-2}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{2\}, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
গ. [math]R, R, f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-2}{2 x+2}[/math]
ঘ. কোনটির নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
 এখানে, x = 2 হলে ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত নয়।তাই এর ডোমেইন , f = R- (2)ধরি, [math]y=f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2} \Rightarrow x y-2 y=2 x-1 \\\Rightarrow x y-2 x=2 y-1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x(y-2)=2 y-1 \\\Rightarrow x=\frac{2 y-1}{y-2} \\\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\frac{2 y-1}{y-2} \\\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math]
এর ডোমেইন, f = R -{2}f (x) এর রেঞ্জ = R -{2}

Explanation:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-1}{x-2}[/math]
 ফাংশনটির হরে x 2 বিদ্যমান। যদি x-2 এর মান 0 হয়, তবে ফাংশনটি থেকে কোনো মান পাওয়া সম্ভব নয়। কারণ কোনো ভগ্নাংশের হর কখনো 0 হতে পারে না। সহজ কথায় কোনো কিছুকে ০ দ্বারা ভাগ করা সম্ভব নয়। অর্থাৎ, [math]x-2≠0⇒x=2[/math]
যে কারণে ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হয়েছে, R-(2)ডোমেনঃ x এর যেসম মানের জন্য f(x) থেকে Value পাওয়া সম্ভব, সেগুলোই হচ্ছে ফাংশনটির ডোমেন। কিংবা অন্যভাবে বলা যায়, x এর সেসব মানের জন্য f(x) এর মান পাওয়া যায় না, সেগুলো বাস্তব সংখ্যার সেট (R) থেকে বাদ দিলে যা পড়ে থাকে সেগুলোই ডোমেন।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1083 (ID: 401165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\text { (fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\text { fog) }\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)=\mathrm{f}\left[\mathrm{g}\left(\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\right)\right]=\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\sin \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

একটি ফাংশন [math]f(x)[/math] যেখানে [math]f(x)=\frac{|x|}{x}[/math] উহার ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R \cup\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R \cap\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R-\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]D_{f}=R-\{0\}[/math]

Question #1085 (ID: 401167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1087 (ID: 401093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1088 (ID: 401094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1089 (ID: 401095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math] হলে, [math]f(-4)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]
ঙ. [math]32[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]16[/math]

Solution:
Hints: [math]f(x+p)=a x^{2}+b x+c[/math]
 হলে [math]f(q)[/math]
 এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]x + p = q[/math]
 ধরে [math]x[/math]
 এর মান বের করে সেই মান প্রদত্ত ফাংশনে বসাতে হয়।Solve : [math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math]
 [math]f(-4)[/math]
 এর ক্ষেত্রে, [math]x-2=-4 \Rightarrow x=-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-4)=(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+8=4+4+8=16[/math]


Explanation:
এধরনের ফাংশনে x এর পরিবর্তে প্রদত্ত মান (এখানে – 4 ) বসিয়ে অঙ্ক - করলে হবে না। কারণ এ ধরনের ফাংশন f(x) আকারে না থেকে [math]f(x \pm a)[/math] আকারে থাকে। তাই প্রথমে f এর ভেতরের অংশে x এর মান বের করে নিতে হয় । তারপর সেই মান (এ অঙ্কে – 2 ) বসিয়ে সমাধান করতে হয় ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1090 (ID: 401096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=(1 / x)+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}-1[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
B. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
D. [math](1, \infty)[/math]
E. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}+\sqrt{x}-1[/math]
 এক্ষেত্রে [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
 থাকার দরুন অবশ্যই [math]x \geq 0[/math]
আবার, [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 থাকার জন্য [math]x 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর ডোমেন [math]=(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:
ডোমেন কোনো [math]x = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x > 0[/math]
?ডোমেন মানে হচ্ছে x এর যেসব মান ফাংশনটিতে বসানো সম্ভব। খেয়াল করে দেখো, ফাংশনটি হচ্ছে [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}+\sqrt{x}-1[/math]
ফাংশনটির একটি পদ [math]\frac{1}{x} ; x[/math]
 এর মান যদি 0 হয় তবে এ পদ থেকে কোনো X মান পাওয়া সম্ভব না।ফাংশনটির আরেকটি পদ [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
 যদি x এর মান ঋণাত্নক হয় তবে এ পদ থেকেও Xমান পাওয়া সম্ভব না। কারণ [math]Normally[/math]
 ঋণাত্নক সংখ্যার বর্গমূল সম্ভব নয় ।আর তাই ডোমেন হয়েছে 0 এর চেয়ে বড় যেকোনো সংখ্যা। এ বিষয়টাকেই প্রকাশ করা হয় (0, ∞ ) দ্বারা।লক্ষণীয় (0, ∞ ) এ প্রথম বন্ধনী ব্যবহৃত হয়েছে। এর অর্থ এটা খোলা ব্যবধি । (0 এর অর্থ 0 বাদে তার পরের মান। ) যেহেতু ডোমেন না তাই একে বাদ দেওয়া হয়েছে। মনে রাখা দরকার, আবদ্ধ ব্যবধি বুঝানোর জন্য তৃতীয় বন্ধনী ব্যবহৃত হয়। আবার x > 0 বলতে ধনাত্মক যেকোন মান (পূর্ণসংখ্যার স্কেলে) সজ্ঞায়িত। সংখ্যা খেলে তাকে + ∞ পর্যন্ত প্রকাশ করা হয় বিধায় এক্ষেত্রে ডোমেন ∞ পর্যন্ত প্রকাশ করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #1091 (ID: 401097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+2 x-3[/math] হলে [math]g(f(-1))[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]f(-1)=(-1)^{2}+3|-1|-5[/math]
 [math]=1+3-5=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(f(-1))[/math]
 [math]=g(-1)=(-1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]+2(-1)-3[/math]
 [math]=1-2-3=-4[/math]


Explanation:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x-4[/math] হলে, [math]\text { gof (2) }[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]11[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]11[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { gof }[/math]
 [math]=3\left(x^{2}+2 x-3\right)-4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \operatorname{gof}(2)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(2^{2}+2.2-3\right)-4=11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1094 (ID: 401101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathrm{R}-\{1\} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}-\{2\}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+3}{x-1}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে, [math]f^{-1}(-1)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2 / 3[/math]
B. [math]2 / 3[/math]
C. [math]3 / 4[/math]
D. [math]2 / 5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=f^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2 x+3}{x-1}=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-2 / 3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1096 (ID: 401103)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর সমান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+4)[/math]
খ. [math](x+4)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(4-x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4 ; y=3 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1097 (ID: 401104)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(2 x)=\ln (1+x)[/math] তবে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x>-1[/math]
খ. [math]0
গ. [math]x>-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]1


Correct Answer: C.[math]x>-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } 2 \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(1+\frac{\mathrm{y}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\ln \left(1+\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1+\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}>-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1100 (ID: 401107)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R → R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-5,4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)=\pm \sqrt{16}=\pm 4=\{-4,4\}[/math]

Explanation:

 এর পর্যায় [math]=\frac{2 \pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Question #1102 (ID: 401109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+5, g(x)=x^{2}-2 x+2, h(x)=x^{2}+4 x-21[/math] তিনটি real valued ফাংশন হয় তবে [math]\left(\frac{f+g}{h}\right)[/math] এর [math]\text { domain }[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
B. [math]\mathbb{R}-(4,21\}[/math]
C. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+4 \mathrm{x}-21 ; \mathrm{x}^{2}+4 \mathrm{x}-21=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=(3,-7)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { domain }=\mathbb{R}-\{-7,3\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1103 (ID: 401110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f=\{(x, y): x \in X, y \in Y[/math] এবং [math]\left.x^{2}+y^{2}=4\right\}[/math] অন্বয়টি কি?

Options:
A. ফাংশন
B. ফাংশন নয়
C. অন্বয়
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.ফাংশন নয়

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4 \Rightarrow y=\pm \sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশন নয় ।

Explanation:

Question #1104 (ID: 401111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{7}+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1105 (ID: 401112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math] এবং [math]x 
eq-\frac{1}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(-2)[/math] এর মান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1} \Rightarrow x-3=2 x y+y \Rightarrow x(1-2 y)=3+y \Rightarrow x=\frac{y+3}{1-2 y} \therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} \therefore f^{-1}(-2) =\frac{-2+3}{1+4}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1106 (ID: 401113)

Options:
A. [math]\tan 2 x[/math]
B. [math]\sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} x}{1+\tan ^{2} x}=\cos 2 x[/math]

Question:
[math]A→B[/math] এর বিপরীত ফাংশন বিদ্যমান থাকার শর্তসমূহ হলো-

খ. [math]A = B[/math] এবং এক-এক ফাংশন
গ. [math]B = A[/math] এবং সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{A} \subset \mathrm{B},[/math] এক-এক এবং সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন


Correct Answer: A.এক-এক এবং সর্বগ্রাহী উভয় ধরনের ফাংশন

Question #1108 (ID: 401115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হয়, তবে f একটি-

Options:
ক. এক-এক ফাংশন
খ. জোড় ফাংশন
গ. বিজোড় ফাংশন
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.বিজোড় ফাংশন

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x \quad \therefore f(-x)=\sin (-x)=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})=-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \therefore[/math]
 এটি একটি বিজোড় ফাংশন।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1109 (ID: 401116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{2}+6}[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt[6]{x+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6 \Rightarrow y=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1110 (ID: 401117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1111 (ID: 401118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1112 (ID: 401119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর সমান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+4)[/math]
খ. [math](x+4)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(4-x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x-4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x+4 ; y=3 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1113 (ID: 401120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R → R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,3\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-5,4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(16)=\pm \sqrt{16}=\pm 4=\{-4,4\}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1114 (ID: 401121)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=-|x|[/math] তাহলে [math]f[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-1, \infty),(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in R: x \geq 0\},\{x \in R: x \leq 0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R,(-\infty, 0][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R,(-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশন [math]y = f(x) = -|x|[/math] হল একটি স্বপ্নজাদা ফাংশন, যা একটি সমতলের উপর সিমেট্রিক।এটি সমতলের উপর সিমেট্রিক হওয়া মানে হল ফাংশনের মান যখনই x এর মান নেগেটিভ, তখন তা পজিটিভ হয় এবং যখন x এর মান পজিটিভ, তখন তা নেগেটিভ হয়। এরপরেও, আমরা ফাংশনটি একটি স্বপ্নজাদা ফাংশন বলে কথা বলেছি, যা এর মান ক্ষুদ্রতম মানে হয়। তাই, আমরা বলতে পারি যে এই ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ হল [0, নেগেটিভ অসীম] এবং ডোমেন হল সমস্ত রশিমযুক্ত সংখ্যাগুলি।অর্থাৎ,ডোমেইন: সমস্ত রশিমযুক্ত সংখ্যাগুলি।রেঞ্জ: [0, নেগেটিভ অসীম]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]-4 \leq x \leq 4[/math]
খ. [math]-4
গ. [math]-4>x>4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4 \geq x \geq 4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-4

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটি বাস্তব [math]16-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}4 \therefore-4

Question #1117 (ID: 401124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{-4,4\}, B=\{0,4\}[/math] এবং [math]x^{2}+4 y^{2}=16[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত [math]\mathbf{R}: \mathbf{A} \rightarrow \mathbf{B}[/math] অন্বয়টি কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]
B. [math]\{(4,0)\}[/math]
C. [math]\{(0,4)\}[/math]
D. [math]\{(-4,0),(4,4)\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=-4[/math]
 হলে, [math]y^{2}=\frac{16-(-4)^{2}}{4}=0 \Rightarrow y=0[/math]
 [math]x = + 4[/math]
 হলে, [math]y^{2}=\frac{16-4^{2}}{4}=0 \Rightarrow y=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অন্বয়টি = [math]\{(-4,0),(4,0)\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1118 (ID: 401125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A=R-\{3\}, B=R-\{1\}, f: A \rightarrow B, f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] তবে [math]f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)+f^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 / 3[/math]
B. [math]4 / 3[/math]
C. [math]1 / 3[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of thesc }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]+f^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{3}{2}-2}{\frac{3}{2}-3}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{3 \times \frac{2}{3}-2}{\frac{2}{3}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{-1}{2}}{\frac{-3}{2}}+0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2} \times \frac{2}{-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1119 (ID: 401126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=2 x^{4}-4 \text { and } g(x)=\sqrt{\frac{x-2}{\sqrt{2}}} \text {, then what is the value of }(f \circ g)(5) ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt[2]{2}[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[2]{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(5)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(5))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt{\frac{5-2}{\sqrt{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(\sqrt{\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}}\right)^{4}-4[/math]
 [math]=9-4=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1120 (ID: 401127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x+x^{-1}[/math] হয়,তাহলে [math]\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\}^{2}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
ক. [math]3+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]2-f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]2+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]4+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2+f\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+x^{-1}[/math]
 [math];\{f(x)\}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}+2[/math]
 [math]\cdot x \cdot \frac{1}{x}=x^{2}+x^{-2}+2[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}\right)+2[/math]


Explanation:

খ. [math]5 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]3 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4 \pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos (a \theta+b)[/math]
 এর পর্যায় হবে [math]\frac{2 \pi}{a}[/math]

Question #1126 (ID: 401133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\sin x)[/math] এবং [math]\phi(x)=\ln (\cos x)[/math] হলে [math]e^{2 f(x)}+e^{2 \phi(x)}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos ^{2} x-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin 2 x}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]e^{2 f(x)}+e^{2 g(x)}[/math]
 [math]=e^{2 \ln \sin x}[/math]
 [math]+e^{2 \ln \cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]+\cos ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1127 (ID: 401134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] এবং [math]g: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে যথাক্রমে [math](f(x)=2 x-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+6[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]g(g(x))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]
B. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]4 x^{2}-20 x+31[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-20 x+30[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(g(x))=\left(x^{2}+6\right)^{2}+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+12 x^{2}+36+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+12 x^{2}+42[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1128 (ID: 401135)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]A=[-1,1][/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{A} \rightarrow \mathrm{A}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তাহলে-

Options:
A. f একটি সর্বগ্রাহী ফাংশন
B. f একটি সংযোজিত ফাংশন

Question #1129 (ID: 401136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\mathrm{A}=\mathrm{R}-\{3\}, \mathrm{B}=\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math] এবং [math]f: A \rightarrow B[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x-3 y=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-1)=3 y-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{3 y-2}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1130 (ID: 401137)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-8[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(y+8)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(y-8)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]

Solution:
যদি, [math]f(x)=a x+b[/math]
 হয়, [math]f^{-1}(x)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{x-b}{a}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}(x+8)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1131 (ID: 401138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-2}[/math] ফাংশনটির চারণ স্থল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x=2[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq 2[/math]
গ. [math]x<2[/math]
ঘ. [math]x<-2[/math]
ঙ. Answer : B & D


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \geq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1132 (ID: 401139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. $-2
খ. [math]-2 \leq x<2[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. $-2
ঙ. [math]-\infty \leq x \leq \infty[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: x এর যেসব value এর জন্য y অর্থাৎ f(x) এর মান পাওয়া সম্ভব - সেগুলোই f(x) এর ডোমেন ।Solve: [math]y=f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটির y এর value তখনই পাওয় যাবে, যখন [math]\sqrt{}[/math]
 এর ভিতরের মান অঋণাত্নক হবে। অর্থাৎ [math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 4 \geq x^{2} \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0 \\\Rightarrow(x+2)(x-2) \leq 0\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math](x + 2) ≤ 0[/math]
 এবং [math](x – 2 ) ≤ 0[/math]
 [math]⇒ x > - 2[/math]
 এবং [math]x ≤ 2[/math]
দেখা যাচ্ছে f(x) কে সজ্ঞায়িত হতে হলে x এর মান – 2 থেকে বড় এবং 2থেকে ছোট হতে হবে ।অর্থাৎ ডোমেন [math]=-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=(-\infty, 0) \therefore f(x)<0 \text {, for all } x[/math]

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে g(f(x)) এর মান-

Question #1135 (ID: 401142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1137 (ID: 401144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x+4}[/math] ফাংশনটির Domain Range কত?

Options:
A. [math]R[/math]
B. [math]x>4[/math]
C. [math]x<4[/math]
D. [math]x \geq-4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x \geq-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-4[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ x = -4 হলে,[math]f(x) = 0 \ যখন, x > -4, f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]

খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a}+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} \Rightarrow f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1}=e[/math]

Question #1141 (ID: 400989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x^{2}-4}[/math] হলে, [math]f(x + 1)[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]R-\{2\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{-2,2\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1,3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x^{2}-4} \therefore f(x+1)=\frac{1}{(x+1)^{2}-4}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math](x+1)^{2}-4 
eq 0 \Rightarrow(x+1)^{2} 
eq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1 
eq \pm 2 \Rightarrow x 
eq 1,-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}-\{1,-3\}=\mathrm{R}-\{-3,1\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1142 (ID: 400990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]x>-1[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]2 x+1>0 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এবং [math]x+1>0 \Rightarrow x>-1[/math]
 এবং [math]2 x+1 
eq 1 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0 \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]=\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1144 (ID: 400992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R}^{+} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}^{+}[/math] [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{llc}3 x-1 & \text { if } & x>.3 \\x^{2}-2 & \text { if } & -2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 & \text { if } & x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math] সূচিত হলে [math]f(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]
E. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{cc}3 x-1 & \text { if } x>3 \\x^{2}-2 & \text { if }-2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 & x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math]
এখানে [math]-3<-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(-3)=2[/math]
 [math]\times(-3)+3=-3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1147 (ID: 400995)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\text { gof }(-2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]65[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]25[/math]
ঙ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f(-2)=g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left\{(-2)^{2}-2|-2|\right\}^{2}[/math]
 [math]+1=0^{2}+1=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1148 (ID: 400996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{x-1} \Rightarrow x=1+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=1+\mathrm{y}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=1+2^{2}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1149 (ID: 400997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]

Question #1151 (ID: 400999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math](x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}}{1+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{2}}}=\frac{3-1}{1+2}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1152 (ID: 401000)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুতে [math]60°[/math] কোণে ক্রিয়ারত দুইটি সমান বলকে একই বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়ারত [math]15N[/math] বলের সাহায্যে ভারসাম্যে রাখলে সমান বলের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
গ. [math]5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]
ঙ. [math]6 \mathrm{~N}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{R}^{2}=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{P}^{2}+2 \mathrm{P}^{2} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(15)^{2}=2 \mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\cos 60^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{P}[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3} \mathrm{~N}[/math]


Explanation:
