--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\cot x a^{\operatorname{In}(\cos x)}[/math]
খ. [math]-\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)} I n a[/math]
গ. [math]\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\operatorname{cotx} a^{I n(\cos x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\tan x a^{I n(\cos x)} I n a[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=a^{\ln (\cos x)} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \ln a \cdot \tan x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1155 (ID: 401003)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{1+x \ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)\right]^{\frac{1}{x}}=2 b \sin ^{2} \theta, b>0[/math] এবং [math]\theta \in(-\pi, \pi)[/math] হয় তবে [math]\theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left[1+x \ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)\right]^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=e^{\ln \left(1+b^{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=1+b^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1+b^{2}=2 b \sin ^{2} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{2} \theta=\frac{1+b^{2}}{2 b}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \pm \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1156 (ID: 401004)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x-2)=x^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-2=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=z+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(z)[/math]
 [math]=(z+2)^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(0)[/math]
 [math]=(2)^{3}-3=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] হলে এর রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math][0,3][/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,4][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=[-4,4] \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=[0,2][/math]

Question #1158 (ID: 401006)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{a} \sqrt{2}=\frac{1}{6}[/math] হ্লে [math]a[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{a} \sqrt{2}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{\frac{1}{6}}=\sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=(\sqrt{2})^{6}=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1159 (ID: 401007)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3+\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 x-1}{2(x+1)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1161 (ID: 401009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}-2}{\mathrm{x}-3} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{3 \mathrm{x}-2}{\mathrm{x}-1} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1162 (ID: 401010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-5[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+6[/math] হলে, [math](\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(2)=2 \times 2-5[/math]
 [math]=-1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathrm{gof})(2)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(2))[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{2}+6=7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1163 (ID: 401011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]f(f(x))[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{x}}=x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1164 (ID: 401012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(\cos 2 \theta)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]
B. [math]\cot ^{2} \theta[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{2} \theta[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{2} \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(\cos 2 \theta)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\cos 2 \theta}{1+\cos 2 \theta}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \theta}{2 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{2} \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1165 (ID: 401013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] তাহলে [math]f(x)=3 x^{2}[/math] কোন প্রকারের ফাংশন?

Options:
A. এক-এক
B. এক-এক এবং সার্বিক
C. সার্বিক
D. সার্বিক নয়


Correct Answer: D.সার্বিক নয়

Solution:
[math]x=1, - 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f (x) = 3[/math]
 হবে যা [math]f (x)[/math]
 এক এক নয়, ডোমনের সকল মান রেঞ্জের সকল মানের প্রতিচ্ছবি নয় তাই সার্বিক নয়।

Explanation:

Question #1166 (ID: 401014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(1+x)[/math] এর মান হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(x+1)}{x+2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x+2}{x(x+1)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x+1}{x(x+2)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(1+x)=\frac{1-\frac{1}{1+x}}{1+\frac{1}{1+x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+x-1}{1+x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{x+2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1167 (ID: 401015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{2 x-1}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\frac{f(x)+1}{f(x)-1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]x[/math]
খ. [math]2x[/math]
গ. [math]3 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})-1}=\frac{\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1}{2 \mathrm{x}-1}+1}{\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1}{2 \mathrm{x}-1}-1}=\frac{2 \mathrm{x}+1+2 \mathrm{x}-1}{2 \mathrm{x}+1-2 \mathrm{x}+1}=\frac{4 \mathrm{x}}{2}=2 \mathrm{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1168 (ID: 401016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x[/math] 2x হলে f(x + 3)-f(x - 1) =?

Options:
A. [math]f(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(4)[/math]
D. [math]f(6)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x+3)-f(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=2(x+3)-2(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=2 x+6-2 x+2=8[/math]
 [math]=f(4)[/math]
 [math]\because f(4)=2 \times 4=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\left|\left(1-x^{2}\right)\right|-3[/math] হলে, f(2) এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-6[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\left|\left(1-x^{2}\right)\right|-3[/math]
 [math]f(2)=|(1-4)|-3=|-3|-3=3-3=0[/math]

Question #1170 (ID: 401018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R}^{\#} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}^{\#}[/math] দ্বারা [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}3 x-1 \text { if } x>3 \\x^{2}-2 \text { if }-2 \leq x \leq 3 \\2 x+3 \text { if } x<-2\end{array}\right.[/math] সূচিত হলে, [math]f(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]-4[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(-3)[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=2(-3)+3[/math]
 [math]=-6+3[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=2(-3)+3[/math]
 [math]=-6+3[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1171 (ID: 401019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)

Question:
[math]f(x)=5 x-3,(x \in R)[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{6}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]-12[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]5 x-3=3 \Rightarrow x=\frac{6}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(3)=\frac{6}{5}[/math]

Question #1172 (ID: 401020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1173 (ID: 401021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1174 (ID: 401022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-9}{x-3}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-3) \cup(3, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\{0, \infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{3\}[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x-3 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=R-\{3\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R - {6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1175 (ID: 401023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{3 x-2}[/math] এর ডোমেন -

Options:
A. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
B. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
C. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-2 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]

Question #1176 (ID: 401024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{-2,0,1,2,3\}, B=\{0,1,2,4,6,9\}[/math] সেট দুইটির [math]f: A→B[/math] এবং [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{1,2,6,9\}[/math]
খ. [math]{0, 3, 4, 6}[/math]
গ. [math]{0,1,4,9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]{-1,..., 9}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]{0,1,4,9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x^{2} \\f(-2)=(-2)^{2}=4 \\f(0)=0^{2}=0 \\f(1)=1^{2}=1 \\f(2)=2^{2}=4 \\f(3)=3^{2}=9\end{array}[/math]
ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ [math]= {0, 1, 4, 9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
কোন লেখচিত্রটি মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় না?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\sin x[/math]
খ. [math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]y=\tan x[/math]
ঘ. সব কয়টিই


Correct Answer: B.[math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin \left(x+45^{\circ}\right)[/math] লেখচিত্রটি মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় না।

Question #1178 (ID: 401026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{\sqrt{x^{5}-32}}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][0, \infty),(0,1][/math]
খ. [math][2, \infty),(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math][0, \infty),(0, \infty][/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
এবং [math]x^{5}-32 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{5} \geq 2^{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math][2, \infty)[/math]
 [math]x = 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x>2[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1179 (ID: 401027)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে [math]|f(\mathbf{x})+\mathbf{g}(\mathbf{x})|[/math] এর ডোমেন হবে:

Options:
A. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
B. [math](0,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
D. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]|f(x)+g(x)|=\left|x+\frac{1}{x}\right|, x 
eq 0[/math]
 হলে, সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য ফাংশন সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1180 (ID: 401028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\mathbf{a x}+\mathbf{b}[/math] হলে, [math]f'[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]R,R[/math]
খ. [math]R,\{a\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,\{x \in R: x \geq a\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in R: x>a\}, R[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]R,\{a\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=a x+b \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=a[/math]
 [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল মানের জন্য [math]f' (x) = a[/math]
 প্রযোজ্য,[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]R[/math]
 এবং [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল মানের জন্য [math]\mathbf{f}^{\prime}(\mathbf{x})=\mathbf{a} \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= {a}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1181 (ID: 401029)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-4}[/math] এর ডোমেন সেট-

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math]\{2,-2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math][-2,2][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
f(x) সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x^{2}-4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \geq 4 \Rightarrow|x| \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 2[/math]
 অথবা [math]x \leq-2 \quad \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(-\infty,-2] \cup[2, \infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=\{y \in R: y \geq 0\}=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1182 (ID: 401030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 x-3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x+3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x}{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{3}{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}+3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}+3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1183 (ID: 401031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=\frac{2+3 x}{3-2 x} \text { then the value of } f^{-1}(x) \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2-3 x}{2 x-3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 x+2}{3-2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x-3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2+3 x}{3-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 y-2 x y[/math]
 [math]=2+3 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 y-2}{3+2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x-2}{2 x+3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1184 (ID: 401032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x \in R: 2 x^{2}-7 x+3 \leq 0\right\}[/math] - হলে লঘিষ্ঠ উর্ধ্বসীমা ( Sup S ) কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 x^{2}-7 x+3 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(2 x-1) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 লঘিষ্ঠ উর্ধ্বসীমা [math]3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1186 (ID: 401034)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
পাশের বাস্তব ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ কত? [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
ক. [math][-3,3],[0,3][/math]
খ. [math][0,3],[3,-3][/math]
গ. [math][3,-3],[0,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0],[3,0][/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-3,3],[0,3][/math]

Solution:
[math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9 \\\Rightarrow|x|^{2} \leq 9 \\\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3 \\\mathrm{D}_{\mathrm{f}}=[-3,3] \\\mathrm{R}_{\max }=[0,3]\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1188 (ID: 401037)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{2}+6}[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt[6]{x+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6 \Rightarrow y=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

 ডোমেন [math](1, \infty)[/math]

 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]exist[/math]
 করে। [math]\text { 27. } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math]
 দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে,সংযোজিত ফাংশন [math]gof[/math]

Question #1192 (ID: 401041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4,4][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,4][/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math] ও [math][0,1][/math]
ঘ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}} \therefore|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1193 (ID: 401042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1194 (ID: 401043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1195 (ID: 401044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1196 (ID: 401045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4,4][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]
খ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,4][/math]
গ. [math][-2,2][/math] ও [math][0,1][/math]
ঘ. [math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][−2,2][/math] ও [math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}} \therefore|x| \leq 2 \Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

যদি [math]A[/math] সেট থেকে [math]B[/math] সেটে একটি ফাংশন: [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{A} \rightarrow \mathrm{B}[/math] দ্বারা সূচিত করা হয়, তবে রেঞ্জ [math]f(range f)[/math] এর জন্য নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ [math]f = B[/math]
খ. রেঞ্জ [math]\mathrm{f} \subset \mathrm{B}[/math]
গ. রেঞ্জ [math]f = A[/math]
ঘ. রেঞ্জ [math]f⊆ B[/math]


Correct Answer: D.রেঞ্জ [math]f⊆ B[/math]

Question #1198 (ID: 401047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)=\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=32[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{3}+5=32 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{3}=27[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1199 (ID: 401048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(5)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pm 1[/math]
B. [math]\pm 2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pm 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1 ;[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{f}^{-1}(5)=\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}+1=5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\pm 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1200 (ID: 401049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}\{0\}=\{\mathrm{i},-\mathrm{i}\}[/math]
B. [math]f^{-1}(0)=\{\emptyset\}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x^{2}+1 \\y=x^{2}+1 \\x^{2}=y-1 \\x=\pm \sqrt{y-1}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}-1} \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}-1} \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\pm \sqrt{0-1}=\pm \mathrm{i}\end{array}[/math]
কিন্তু [math]\pm \mathrm{i} 
otin \mathrm{R} \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\emptyset[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]18[/math]
C. [math]-4[/math]
D. [math]14[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x| ; g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math]

Question #1202 (ID: 401051)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](x + y, 1)[/math] এবং [math](3, x - y)[/math] ক্রমজোড় দুইটি সমান হলে, x ও y এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math](2,1)[/math]
খ. [math](0,2)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math](2,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+y=3[/math]
 [math]\frac{x-y=1}{(+) 2 x=4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 \quad \therefore y=\frac{3-2}{2}=1 ; \quad(x, y)=(2,1)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1203 (ID: 401052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,4,5\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{2,3,5,6,7\}[/math] হলে, [math](A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]
B. [math]\{1,3,6,7\}[/math]
C. [math]\{2,4,6,7\}[/math]
D. [math]\{1,3,4,6\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\{1,2,3,4,5\},[/math]
 [math]B=\{2,3,5,6,7\} ;[/math]
 [math]A / B=\{1,4\} ;[/math]
 [math]B / A=\{6,7\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A \backslash B) \cup(B \backslash A)[/math]
 [math]=\{1,4,6,7\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনের [math]x = c[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান হলে নিম্নের কোন শর্তটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c})<\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c}+\mathrm{h})[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c})+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{c}+\mathrm{h})>0[/math]
গ. [math]f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(c)-f(c+h)<0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(c)>f(c+h) \Rightarrow f(c)-f(c+h)>0[/math]

Question #1205 (ID: 401054)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\left|1-x^{3}\right|+1[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\left|1-x^{3}\right|+1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(2)=\left|1-2^{3}\right|+1[/math]
 [math]=|1-8|+1=|-7|+1[/math]
 [math]=7+1=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1206 (ID: 401055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math] হলে, [math]f(\pi+x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{3} x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
C. [math]f(x)[/math]
D. [math]f(x)+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(\pi+x)=\cos ^{3}(\pi+x) \sin (\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=(-\cos x)^{3}(-\sin x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1207 (ID: 401056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=x^{3}+1, x \in R[/math] এর জন্য [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]x^{1 / 3}-1[/math]
গ. [math]\left(x^{3}+1\right)^{-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+1=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x^{3}+1 \Rightarrow x^{3}=y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\sqrt[3]{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[3]{x-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1208 (ID: 401057)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x[/math]
B. [math]\cos x[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{1+\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(2 \times \frac{x}{2}\right)=\cos x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1209 (ID: 401058)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] যা [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত, ফাংশনটি-

Options:
A. ওয়ান-ওয়ান
B. অনটু
C. ধ্রুবক
D. ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়


Correct Answer: D.ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x},-1 \in R[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]f(-1)=\sqrt{-1}[/math]
, অবাস্তব [math]
otin \mathrm{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি ওয়ান-ওয়ান এবং অনটু নয়।

Explanation:

Question #1210 (ID: 401059)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিম্নের কোনটি এক-এক ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]f x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=\sin x+3[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=\cos x-5[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=x^{3}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(x)=x^{3}-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Option } D[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=x^{3}-1=(x-1)\left(x^{2}+x+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \in R[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \in \mathrm{R}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\dot{\mathrm{x}}^{3}-1[/math]
 এক-এক ফাংশন

Explanation:

Question:
[math]\text { Suppose } f(x)=\sqrt{x}+1 \text {, then } f(x+h)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{x}+h+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{h}}+1[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{x+h+1}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+\sqrt{\mathrm{h}+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{h}}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because f(x)=\sqrt{x}+1 \Rightarrow f(x+h)=\sqrt{x+h}+1[/math]

Question #1212 (ID: 401061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\pi+\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{3} x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
C. [math]f(x)[/math]
D. [math]f(x)+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos ^{3} x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{3}(\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]\sin (\pi+x)[/math]
 [math]=(-\cos x)^{3}(-\sin x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{3} x \sin x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1213 (ID: 401062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] $এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]secx[/math]
B. [math]Bcosx[/math]
C. [math]tan2x[/math]
D. [math]cos2x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]Bcosx[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}} \Rightarrow f\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)=\frac{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{1+\tan 2 \frac{x}{2}}=\cos x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1214 (ID: 401063)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(32)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+5=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}=y-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sqrt[3]{y-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{y}-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt[3]{\mathrm{x}-5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(32)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[3]{32-5}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1215 (ID: 401064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathbf{f : R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}\{0\}=\{\mathrm{i},-\mathrm{i}\}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\{\varnothing\}[/math]
C. [math]f^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]f^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{y-1}[/math]
 [math]f^{-1}(y)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{y-1} \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{0-1}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{-1}= \pm \mathrm{i}[/math]
 [অবাস্তব][math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\varnothing[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1216 (ID: 401065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: R \rightarrow R, g(x)=3-5 x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\left(f^{-1} 0 g\right)(x)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3 x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3 x}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{5 x}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(f^{-1}og\right) x=f^{-1}(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f^{-1}(3-5 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3-5 x-3}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-5 x}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1217 (ID: 401066)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}-2 x,-1 \leq x<6[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ বের কর।

Options:
ক. [math]-1
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=3[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}-2 x,-1 \leq x \leq 6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+2[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(6)=\frac{36}{2}-12=18-12=6[/math]
 [math]0 \in-1 \leq x<6 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(0)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \in-1 \leq x \leq 6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(2)=2-4=-2[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq f(x)<6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1218 (ID: 401067)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 x-3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x+3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x}{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{3}{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x+3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{\mathrm{y}+3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{\mathrm{x}+3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]

ঘ. [math](1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][1, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x \geq 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]exist[/math]
 করে। [math]\text { 27. } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+1[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math]
 দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে,সংযোজিত ফাংশন [math]gof[/math]
 এর ডোমেন কত?

Question #1220 (ID: 401069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x},(x[/math] বাস্তব) এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} \in \Re[/math]
 যখন [math]1-2 x 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]y=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y-2 x y=x+3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-3=x(1+2 y)[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{y-3}{1+2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \in \mathfrak{\Re} \text { if } 1+2 y 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y 
eq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Dom } f=\Re-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\text {. Range } f=\mathfrak{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=x^{3}+3 x^{2}-45 x+10[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]-5[/math]
গ. [math]-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}+6 x-45[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=3,-5[/math]
এখন, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x+6 ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(3)[/math]
 [math]=14>0 ; f^{\prime \prime}(-5)[/math]
 [math]=-24<0[/math]

Question #1224 (ID: 401073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math](x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে [math]g(f(x)) =[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1225 (ID: 401074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(g(-2))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]15[/math]
B. [math]20[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}-\left|x^{2}+1\right|[/math]
 [math]f(g(-2))[/math]
 [math]=\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left((-2)^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=(4+1)^{2}-2|4+1|[/math]
 [math]=25-10[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1227 (ID: 401076)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (x)[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{a}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-f(a)[/math]
B. [math]f(a)[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(a)=\ln a \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{1}{a}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{1}{a}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(a^{-1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\ln a=-f(a)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1228 (ID: 401077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নীচের কোনটি ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[y \geq 0][/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[x \geq 0][/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4 a x[/math]
ঙ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[x \leq 0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[y \geq 0][/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1 \Rightarrow y^{2}=1-x^{2} \Rightarrow y=\pm \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]

Question #1229 (ID: 401078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(0)=-1, f(1)=2[/math] এবং [math]f(n+1)=f(n)-f(n-1)[/math] হলে, [math]f(4)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(4)=f(3)-f(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(2)[/math]
 [math]-f(1)-f(1)+f(0)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)-f(0)-f(1)[/math]
 [math]-f(1)+f(0)[/math]
 [math]=-f(1)=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1230 (ID: 401079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x-|x|}[/math] হলে, ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]|x \in R:-\infty
খ. [math]|x \in I R: x \neq 1|[/math]
গ. [math]|x \in I R: x>0|[/math]
ঘ. [math]|x \in I R: x \neq 0|[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]|x \in R:-\infty

Solution:
যদি [math]x > 0[/math]
 হয় তাহলে [math](x-|x|)=0 \text { and } \frac{x}{x-|x|} \text { undefine }[/math]
 হয় তাই, [math]x[/math]
 সবসময় [math]\text { negative } \therefore \mathrm{x}<0 \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1231 (ID: 401080)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right) + f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{p}{q}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{q}{p}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{q}{p+q}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\mathrm{p}}{\mathrm{p}+\mathrm{q}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{p}{q}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p}{p+q} ;[/math]
 [math]f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q}{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f\left(\frac{p}{q}\right)+f\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p}{q}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1232 (ID: 401081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\left(x^{3}+8\right)}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. (-2, \infty),[0, \infty)$
খ. [math][0, \infty],(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](8,-\infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]–2[/math]
 থেকে [math]\infty[/math]
 পর্যন্ত [math]f(x)=\sqrt{\left(x^{3}+8\right)}[/math]
 এর বাস্তব মান থাকে। তখন [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর মান [math]0[/math]
 থেকে [math]\infty[/math]
 পর্যন্ত হয়।অন্যভাবে, [math]y=\sqrt{x^{3}+8} \text { Or, } y^{2}-8=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } x=\sqrt[3]{y^{2}-8}[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]y^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]-2[/math]
 এবং সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]\propto[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[-2, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
যদি [math]A={x|x+4=4}[/math] এবং [math]B=\left\{x \mid x^{2}=16\right.[/math] এবং [math]2x=6[/math] হয়, তবে [math]A- B[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\phi[/math]
খ. [math]\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\{0\} ; B=\{\pm 4,3\} \therefore A-B=\{0\}[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1, h(x)=x+2[/math] হলে [math]\text { hogof(-3) =? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]730[/math]
B. [math]731[/math]
C. [math]732[/math]
D. [math]733[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]732[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{hog}(-3)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \operatorname{hog}(9)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow h\left(9^{3}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow h(730)=730+2=732[/math]

Question #1236 (ID: 401085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]\mathbf{f : R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(16)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math][-4,4][/math]
গ. [math](-4,4)[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4,4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(16)=x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm 4 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(16)=[-4,4\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1237 (ID: 401086)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]R+\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]R-\{1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যদি [math]x 
eq 0[/math]
 হয়। [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}-\{0\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1238 (ID: 401087)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math] দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে সংযোজিত ফাংশন g of এর ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. (-1, 1)
খ. (2,∞)
গ. (-∞, ∞)
ঘ. (∞, 2)
ঙ. (−1, 1)


Correct Answer: E. (−1, 1)

Solution:
Hints: [math]\text { gof }=g(f(x)) ; x[/math]
 x এর যেসব মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত তার সেটকে ঐ ফাংশনের ডোমেইন বলে ।Solve: [math]\operatorname{gof}=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
এখন, [math]g\left(x^{2}+1\right)=\sqrt{2-\left(x^{2}+1\right)}=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
এখন, [math]g\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 সঙ্গায়িত হবে যদি ও কেবল যদি [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]
 :: ডোমেন: [math]f=[-1,1][/math]


Explanation:
ডোমেন মানে হচ্ছে x এর যে সকল মানের জন্য ফাংশনটির y থেকে মান পাওয়া যায়।এখানে, [math]\operatorname{gof}(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি থেকে value পেতে হলে [math]\sqrt{ }[/math]
 এর - ভিতরের মান 0 কিংবা 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে।[math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-1 \leq 0 \Rightarrow(x+1)(x-1) \leq 0[/math]
 এখানে দুটি সংখ্যা (x+1) ও (x-1) এর গুণফল তখনই ঋণাত্নক হবে যখন সংখ্যা দুটির একটি ধনাত্নক ও একটি ঋণাত্নক হবে। কিন্তু এখানে (x+1) যেহেতু (x-1) এর চেয়ে বৃহত্তর, সেহেতু (x+1)-ই ধনাত্নক আর বাকীটা ঋণাত্মক ।· x + 1 > 0 ⇒ x > -1 এবং x-1<0 ⇒ x < 1অসমতাদ্বয়কে একত্রিত করে পাই, − 1 ≤ x ≤ 1অর্থাৎ ফাংশনটি থেকে Value পাইতে হলে x এর মান – 1 থেকে বড় বা - সমান কিন্তু 1 থেকে ছোট বা সমান হতে হবে। ইহাই ফাংশনটির ডোমেন।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1239 (ID: 401088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
What is the range of [math]y = |x-2|+3[/math]

Options:
A. [math][3, \infty)[/math]
B. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty, 3][/math]
D. [math][-3, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][3, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x[/math]
 এর মান 2 হলে, [math]y = 3[/math]
সুতরাং রেঞ্জ 3 থেকে শুরু হয়ে অসীম পর্যন্ত হবে। [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ, [math]R_{y}=[3, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1240 (ID: 401089)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{3}+8}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math](8,-\infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0, \infty],(0, \infty][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty),[1, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
ঙ. [math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math][-2, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+8 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x+2)\left(x^{2}-2 x+4\right) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore D_{f}=[-2, \infty)[/math]
এবং [math]R_{f}=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1241 (ID: 401090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{2-x}[/math] দুইটি বাস্তব ফাংশন হলে সংযোজিত ফাংশন gof এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,1)[/math]
খ. [math][-1,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f=\sqrt{2-\left(x^{2}+1\right)}=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1 \Rightarrow|x| \leq 1 \Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 gof এর ডোমেন = [-1, 1]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+3}{1-2 x} (x[/math] বাস্তব) এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}}, \frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}, \frac{\mathrm{R}}{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}}[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]D_{f}=R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\},[/math]
 ও [math]\text { Range, } R_{f}=R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Question #1245 (ID: 400917)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x-\tan x[/math] হচ্ছে একটি-

Options:
ক. [math]Odd function[/math]
খ. [math]Even function[/math]
গ. [math]Imaginary function[/math]
ঘ. [math]Complex function[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]Odd function[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) = x - tanx[/math]
 [math]→ f(-x)=-x-tan (-x) = x + tan x = -(x-tanx) = f(x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি [math]odd function[/math]
 (বা অযুগ্ম বা বিজোড়) ফাংশন

Explanation:

Question #1246 (ID: 400918)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] হলে [math]f(x y)=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]f(x)+f(y)[/math]
B. [math]f(x)f(y)[/math]
C. [math]f(x) f(y)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{f(x)}{f(y)}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]f(x)+f(y)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f(y)=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{xy})=\ln (\mathrm{xy})=\ln \mathrm{x}+\ln \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1247 (ID: 400919)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Question #1248 (ID: 400920)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f^{-1}(2 x-1)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4x-7[/math]
খ. [math]2x-5[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7-4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4x-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math]
ধরি, [math]x+2=2 y-1 \Rightarrow x=2 y-3[/math]
(ii) নং এ বসিয়ে, [math]f(2(2 y-3)-1)=2 y-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(4 \mathrm{y}-7)=2 \mathrm{y}-1 \Rightarrow 4 \mathrm{y}-7=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1)[/math]
 [math]y[/math]
 এর পরিবর্তে [math]x[/math]
 বসিয়ে পাই, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)=4 \mathrm{x}-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1249 (ID: 400921)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\infty[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{3 x}{x-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y-2 y=3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-3)=2 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{2 y}{y-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\frac{2 y}{y-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{2 x}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(3)=\frac{2 \times 3}{3-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3}{0}=\infty[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1250 (ID: 400923)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1251 (ID: 400924)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1252 (ID: 400925)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 x+3, x<0[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]3+9 x[/math]
D. [math]x+3, x>0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x+3, x>0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f(\sqrt{x})=(\sqrt{x})^{2}+3=x+3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1253 (ID: 400926)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] তবে (fog) (2) এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(2)=2^{2}+1=5 \\\quad(fog)(2)=5^{2}-2|5|=25-10=15\end{array}[/math]

Question #1254 (ID: 400927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1255 (ID: 400928)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2} ; f(x)[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 \sin x \cos x-8 \sin x \cos x=-2 \sin x \cos x=-\sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2 \cos 2 x\end{array}[/math]
লঘু-গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin 2 x=0 \Rightarrow 2 x=0, \pi \quad \therefore x=0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(0)=-20 \text {, }[/math]
 লঘুমান বা সর্ব নিম্নমান হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান = [math]3 \sin ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}+4 \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1256 (ID: 400929)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:
