Question #1257 (ID: 400930)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1258 (ID: 400931)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(6)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(x^{3}-3\right)=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x-2)=x^{3}-3[/math]
উভয় পক্ষে , [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f^{-1}(1-2)=1^{3}-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=1-3=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1259 (ID: 400932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{|x|}}[/math] এর ডোমেন-

Options:
A. [math][0,+\infty)[/math]
B. [math](0,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](-\infty,+\infty)[/math]
D. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=R-\{0\}=(-\infty, 0) \cup(0,+\infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math](0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1260 (ID: 400933)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{7 x-3}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\infty, \frac{7}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(0, \frac{7}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(0, \frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]7 x-3 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{3}{7}[/math]
এবং [math]7 x-3>0 \therefore x>\frac{3}{7} \therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\left(\frac{3}{7}, \infty\right)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1261 (ID: 400934)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math](fog)(x)[/math] ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
B. [math]R[/math]
C. [math]\mathbf{R}-\{-1,1\}[/math]
D. [math][-1,1][/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\{0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math](fog)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
ফাংশনটি [math]x ≠ ()[/math]
 হলে সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন: [math]R - {0}[/math]


Explanation:

eq 3[/math]

Question #1263 (ID: 400936)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=\frac{\sqrt{2 x-1}}{x-2}[/math] দ্বারা প্রকাশিত ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]x-2 
eq 0[/math]
 অথবা [math]2 x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 হয় অর্থাৎ [math]x ≠ 2[/math]
 অথবা [math]2 x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math]=\left[\frac{1}{2}, 2\right) \cup(2, \infty)[/math]
 অথবা [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)-\{2\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1264 (ID: 400937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)

Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math] হলে, [math]g[/math] এর ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-1, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][1, \infty), \mathrm{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R,[1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1, \infty),[0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x+1 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=[-1, \infty) x=-1[/math]
 হলে, [math]g(x)=0 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math][0,8)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1265 (ID: 400938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math] এর ডোমেন হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math](2,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন, [math]x(2-x) ≥ 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-0)(2-x) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-0)(x-2) \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [0, 2][/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:

[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{3 x-2}[/math] এর ডোমেন -

Options:
A. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
B. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}[/math]
C. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-2 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]

Question #1267 (ID: 400940)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির ব্রেজ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-8 \leq f(x) \leq-5[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)>0[/math]
গ. [math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6 \leq f(x) \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-5 \leq f(x) \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+3 \\f(0)=-0^{2}-2(0)+3=3 \\f(-1)=-(-1)^{2}-2(-1)+3=4 \\f(-2)=-(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+3=3 \\f(-3)=-(-3)^{2}-2(-3)+3=0 \\f(-4)=-(-4)^{2}-2(-4)+3=-5\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-4 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
 এর মধ্যে [math]-5 ≤ f(x) ≤ 4[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1268 (ID: 400941)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin \frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{0\}, \mathrm{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}^{+}, \mathrm{R}-\{0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{0\},[-1,1][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\{0\},[-1,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]x=0[/math]
 ব্যতীত সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R -{0}[/math]
আবার, [math]x ≠ 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x[/math]
 এর সকল বাস্তব মানের জন্য = [math]-1 \leq \sin \frac{1}{x} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [-1,1] [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R- {0}, রেঞ্জ = [-1,1]

Explanation:

Question #1269 (ID: 400942)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math](fog) (1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(1)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(1))=f(2)[/math]
 [math]=2^{2}-2|2|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1270 (ID: 400943)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math]x>-1[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
ঙ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math]
তাহলে [math]x+1 
eq 1[/math]
 এবং [math]x+1>0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0, x>-1[/math]
 এবং [math](2 x+1)>0 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2} \therefore x \in\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1271 (ID: 400944)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x}|x|[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন [math]D[/math] এর জন্য কোন শর্ত সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{D} \subset \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in Z\}[/math]
গ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in N\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{a}{z} \sin z \\=a \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z}=a \cdot 1=a\end{array}[/math]
ধরি,[math]\frac{a}{2^{x}}=z \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{a}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty, z \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1272 (ID: 400945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: R → R[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\{-2 \sqrt{2}, 2 \sqrt{2}\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pm \sqrt{1+f(x)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\pm \sqrt{1+y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{1+\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(8)[/math]
 [math]=\{3,-3\}\left[\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)\right.[/math]
 অসংজ্ঞায়িত]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1273 (ID: 400946)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 f(x)+3 f(-x)=x^{2}-x+1[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{13} x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{13}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x-\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{5} x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 f(x)+3 f(-x)=x^{2}-x+1[/math]
 [math].....(i)[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{f}(-\mathrm{x})+3 \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{x}+1[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \ldots(ii)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (i) }[/math]
 [math]\times 2-\text { (ii) } \times 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-5 f(x)[/math]
 [math]=-x^{2}-5 x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} x^{2}[/math]
 [math]+x+\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1274 (ID: 400947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\frac{1-x}{x}}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত ?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](0,1][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]; \frac{1-x}{x} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 0 ; 1-x \leq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 1 \therefore D_{f}=[0,1][/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] এর রেঞ্জ [math]\text { (range) }[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
B. [math](-1,1)[/math]
C. [math][-1,1][/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R} \backslash\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-1,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{ \pm x}= \pm 1[/math]

Question #1276 (ID: 400949)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f (x) = Inx[/math] হলে [math]f\left(a^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})}[/math]
B. [math]-f(a)[/math]
C. [math]1-f[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-f(a)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln x \Rightarrow f\left(a^{-1}\right)=\ln a^{-1}=-\ln (a)=-f(a)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1277 (ID: 400950)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x}|x|[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর ডোমেইন D এর জন্য কোন শর্ত সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{D} \subset \mathrm{R}[/math]
খ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in Z\}[/math]
গ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \in N\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]D=\{x \mid x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]D=\{x \mid x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{a}{z} \sin z[/math]
 [math]=a \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z}=a \cdot 1=a[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{a}{2^{x}}=z \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{a}{z}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x} \rightarrow \infty, \mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1278 (ID: 400951)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]
B. [math]x>-1[/math]
C. [math]x \leq-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math](0, \infty)[/math]
E. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-1\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 0\right) \cup(0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
Hints: x এর যে মানের জন্য ফাংশনটি সঙ্গায়িত, সেগুলোই ডোমেন ।Solve:এক্ষেত্রে, [math]f(x)=\log _{x+1}(2 x+1)[/math]
ভিত্তি: (x+1) > 0বা, x > -1[math]\\[/math]
এবং x+1 + 1বা, x = 0সাথের রাশি: [math](2 x+1)>0 \Rightarrow x>\frac{-1}{2}[/math]
অর্থাৎ x এর মান 1/2 থেকে বড় হতে হবে কিন্তু 0 এর সমান হওয়াযাবে না। এই শর্ত সম্বলিত option টি হচ্ছে (A)।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1279 (ID: 400952)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হয় তবে, [math](fog)(1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]
ঙ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Hints: } fog(x)=f(g(x))\\\text { Solve: } fog(1)=f(g(1)) \\\text { } g(x)=x^{2}+1 \\\therefore g(1)=1^{2}+1=2 \text { }, f(g(1))=f(2) \\f(x)=x^{2}-2|x| \text { } f(2)=2^{2}-2|2|=4-4=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1282 (ID: 400955)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math] হলে, [math]f(-4)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]
ঙ. [math]32[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]16[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=x-2 \therefore x=y+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}-2)=\mathrm{x}^{2}-2 \mathrm{x}+8[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y})[/math]
 [math]=(\mathrm{y}+2)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-2(\mathrm{y}+2)+8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-4)=16[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1283 (ID: 400956)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]p=f(q)=\frac{\sqrt{q}+1}{\sqrt{q}-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f(4)[/math] এবং [math]f(2)[/math] যথাক্রমে কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}+1[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{5}, \sqrt{2}-1[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt{3}, \frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
undefined. No correct answer


Correct Answer: .No correct answer

Solution:
[math]f(4)=\frac{\sqrt{4}+1}{\sqrt{4}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2+1}{2-1}=3 ;[/math]
 [math]f(2)=\frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]=3+2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1284 (ID: 400957)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}[/math] হলে [math]x[/math] এর মাধ্যমে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কি হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1+x[/math]
ঙ. No Correct Answer


Correct Answer: E.No Correct Answer

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 y+1}{4 y-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1}+1}{4 \frac{5 x+1}{4 x-1} 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25 x+5+4 x-1}{20 x+4-4 x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{29 x+4}{16 x+5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1285 (ID: 400958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x+2}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq 2\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in R\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq-2\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in \mathbf{R}: x \neq 0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \neq-2\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+2 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x 
eq-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\{x: x \in R, x 
eq-2\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1286 (ID: 400959)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{16-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](x \in \mathbb{R} : x \geq 4\}[/math]
খ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}:-4
গ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R} :-4 \leq x \leq 4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x \in \mathbb{R}: x \leq-4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{x \in \mathbb{R} :-4 \leq x \leq 4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]16-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 16[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-4 \leq x \leq 4[/math]

Question #1295 (ID: 400968)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
X ও Y শান্ত সেট (non-empty) দ্বয়ের কোন সাধারণ সদস্য না থাকলে [math]X-Y \cap Y[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]x[/math]
খ. [math]\varnothing[/math]
গ. [math]y[/math]
ঘ. [math](\varnothing)[/math]
ঙ. [math]x-y[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]X-Y[/math]
 [math]\cap Y=X-Y=X-X[/math]
 [math]\cap Y=X-\varphi=x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1296 (ID: 400969)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]y=\sqrt{x^{2}-9}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]|x|>3[/math]
খ. [math]|x| \geq 3[/math]
গ. [math]|x| \leq 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]|x|<3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]|x| \geq 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-9 \geq 0 ;(x+3)(x-3) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 3 \text { or } x \leq-3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \geq 3[/math]


Explanation:

D. 2x-1

================================================================================
Question #1298 (ID: 400971)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনটি অভেদ?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}=4 x e^{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}+4 x e^{x}=0[/math]
গ. [math]\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}-\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}+4 x e^{x}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(e^{x}+x\right)^{2}-\left(x-e^{x}\right)^{2}-2 x e^{x}=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(x+e^{x}\right)^{2}-\left(e^{x}-x\right)^{2}=4 x e^{x}[/math]

Solution:
Option (A) হতে পাই,[math]\text { L.H.S }=x^{2}+e^{2 x}+2 x^{2} e^{x}-e^{2 x}-x^{2}+2 x^{2} e^{x}=4 x^{2} e^{x}=\text { R.H.S }[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 Option (A) অভেদ গানচীচী

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1299 (ID: 400972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি যুগ্ম ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=\sin 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=\tan x[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]

Solution:
Option C হতে পাই, [math]f(x)=x^{2}+\cos x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}+\cos (-x)=x^{2}+\cos x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1300 (ID: 400973)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1301 (ID: 400974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1302 (ID: 400975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1303 (ID: 400976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1304 (ID: 400977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=0 \Leftrightarrow h(x)=1[/math] হলে, [math]g(h(0))[/math] ও [math]h(g(0))[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. 1 ও 0
B. 0 ও 1
C. 0 ও 0
D. 1 ও 1


Correct Answer: B.0 ও 1

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{h}(0)=\mathrm{g}(1)=0[/math]
 আবার, [math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{g}(0)=\mathrm{h}(0)=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1305 (ID: 400978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে [math](gof)(x)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}+2 x^{3}+1[/math]
C. [math]x^{6}+1[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-6 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{6}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(x)=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}\right)=\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1=x^{6}+1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1306 (ID: 400979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=|2 x-1|[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

খ. [math](0, \infty)[/math]

ঘ. [math]\{1, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]

Question #1308 (ID: 400981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1309 (ID: 400982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][3,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-3,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-3,3][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-9 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-3,3][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-3, 3][/math]
এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\{y \in R: 0 \leq y \leq 3\}=[0,3][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1310 (ID: 400983)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]R, f(x) \leq 1[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{3\}, R-\{6\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 ফাংশনটি x এর সকল মানের জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত বলে ডোমেন = [math]= R[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1311 (ID: 400984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1\right)[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2}+1=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(1)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1312 (ID: 400985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x+2[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] হলে (fof) (x) এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3x+2[/math]
খ. [math]9x+8[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই


Correct Answer: B.[math]9x+8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore(\mathrm{fof})(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}(3 \mathrm{x}+2)[/math]
 [math]=3(3 \mathrm{x}+2)+2[/math]
 [math]=9 \mathrm{x}+8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1313 (ID: 400986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math] ফাংশনের রেজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math][R-\{0,1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](-\infty, 0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{-1}{|1-x|}[/math]
 এর ডোমেন R- {1}এই ডোমেনের মধ্যে f(x) এর মান সর্বদা ঋণাত্মক কারণ [math]x[/math]
 এর [math](x ≠ 1[/math]
 ছাড়া) যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]|1 – x > 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]=(-\infty, 0)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1314 (ID: 400987)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X=\{-3,-2,0,1\}, \mathrm{f}: X \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] এবং [math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-1[/math] যারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, [math]f[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\{0,1\}[/math]
B. [math]\varnothing[/math]
C. [math]-3[/math]
D. [math]{-1,2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]{-1,2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+2 x-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(-3)[/math]
 [math]=9-6-1=2,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}(-2)=4-4-1[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]
 [math]f(0)=0+0-1=-1,[/math]
 [math]f(1)=1+2-1[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f[/math]
 এর রেঞ্জ [math]{-1,2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1315 (ID: 400988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}[/math] এর ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}, \mathrm{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]R-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}, R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,f(x) ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]2 x+1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow 2 x 
eq-1 \Rightarrow x 
eq-\frac{1}{2} \therefore[/math]
 আবার [math]f(x)=\frac{x-3}{2 x+1}=\frac{1}{2} \Rightarrow 2 x-6=2 x+1 \Rightarrow-6=1[/math]
 অসম্ভব [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]R-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ [math](a, b, c, d)[/math] হলে কোনটি এক-এক ফাংশন?

ক. [math]f(a)=b, f(b)=c, f(c)=d, f(d)=a[/math]

গ. [math]f(a)=b, f(b)=c, f(c)=d[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(a)=b, f(b)=c, f(c)=d, f(c)=a[/math]

Question #1317 (ID: 400897)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq \sin \theta \leq 1[/math]
খ. [math]0 \leq \sin \theta \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]-1>\sin \theta>1[/math]
ঘ. [math]1>\sin \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-1 \leq \sin \theta \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, a ও b দুটো উত্তরই সঠিক তবে a এর উত্তর অধিক যুক্তিযুক্ত ।

Explanation:

Question #1320 (ID: 400900)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+2 x^{2}+3 x+6[/math] ফাংশনটির একটি উৎপাদক নীচের কোনটি হতে পারে?

Options:
ক. [math]x-1[/math]
খ. [math]x+1[/math]
গ. [math]x+2[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x+2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+2 x^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]x+6=x^{2}(x+2)+3(x+2)[/math]
 [math]=(x+2)\left(x^{2}+3\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore(x+2)[/math]
 একটি উৎপাদক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1321 (ID: 400901)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]R[/math] বাস্তব সংখ্যার সেট এবং [math]A=\{-1,1,0,2\} ; f: A \rightarrow R[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+x-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,2,5)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1,5)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2,3)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,-2,3)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1,1,5)[/math]

Solution:
[math]Set[/math]
 প্রকাশের জন্য [math]Second bracket[/math]
 ব্যবহার হবে। যেমন: [math]\{ -1, 1, 5\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1322 (ID: 400902)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math] এর ডোমেইন হচ্ছে -

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0,2][/math]
গ. [math][0,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][0,2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x(2-x)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x(2-x) \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \geq 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x \leq 2[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math]x=[0,2][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1323 (ID: 400903)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x+5}{2 x-5}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{5\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 x-5 
eq 0 \therefore x 
eq \frac{5}{2} \therefore[/math]
 ডোম [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{5}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1324 (ID: 400904)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-9[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(7)=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\{-3,4)[/math]
খ. [math][-4,4][/math]
গ. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
ঘ. [math][-4,0][/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-4,4\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(7)=x \Rightarrow f(x)=7[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x^{2}-9=7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=16 \\\therefore x= \pm 4 \therefore x=\{-4,4\}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1325 (ID: 400905)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(2 x-1)=x+2[/math] হয়,তবে [math]f^{-1}(2 x-1)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 x-7[/math]
খ. [math]2 x-5[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+8}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7-4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 x-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}+2 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{x}-1[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x}+2)[/math]
ধরি, [math]x+2=2 y-1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 y-3[/math]
এখন, [math]2(2 \mathrm{y}-3)-1[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \mathrm{y}-7[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{y}-1) \therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{x}-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1327 (ID: 400907)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=x^{2}+2[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=(x-1)^{2}[/math] হলে [math]gof (x)[/math] হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math]x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]
খ. [math]x^{4}-2 x^{2}+1[/math]
গ. [math]x^{4}-x^{2}+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{4}-2 x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math]gof(x)=\left(x^{2}+2-1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=x^{4}+2 x^{2}+1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1328 (ID: 400908)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\text { fog }(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-4[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3|x|[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=1-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(g(0))=f\left(g(0)^2\right)=f(1-0)[/math]
 [math]=f(1)=(1)^2+3|1|=1+3=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1329 (ID: 400909)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math](gof) (x)-[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]2 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]
B. [math]4 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]
D. [math]3 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g \circ f(x)[/math]
 [math]=2\left(x^{2}+3 x+1\right)-3[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}+6 x-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=x-tanx -[/math] হচ্ছে একটি-

Options:
ক. [math]\text { Odd function }[/math]
খ. [math]\text { Even function }[/math]
গ. [math]\text { Imaginary function }[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { Complex function }[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\text { Odd function }[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) = −f(x)[/math]
 হলে তাকে [math]odd[/math]
 বা অযুগ্ম ফাংশন বলে ।

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] এর রেঞ্জ [math]\text { (range) }[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
B. [math](-1,1)[/math]
C. [math][-1,1][/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{R} \backslash\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\{-1,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{ \pm x}= \pm 1[/math]

Question #1332 (ID: 400913)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
প্রথম বর্ষের বিজ্ঞানের মোট [math]120[/math] জন ছাত্রের মধ্যে [math]85[/math] জন গণিত, [math]90[/math] জন পদার্থবিজ্ঞান ও [math]62[/math] জন গণিত ও পদার্থবিজ্ঞানের উভয় বিষয়ই নিয়েছে। কতজন ছাত্র গণিত অথবা পদার্থবিজ্ঞান বিষয় দুটির কোনোটিই নেয়নি?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]7[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]13[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M} \cup \mathrm{P})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{P})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{M} \cap \mathrm{P})[/math]
 [math]=85+90-62=113[/math]
গণিত অথবা পদার্থবিদ্যার কোনটিই নেয়নি [math]= 120-1137[/math]
 জন

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1333 (ID: 400914)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]n(A)=17, n(B)=28[/math] এবং [math]n(A \cap B)=14[/math] হয়, তবে [math]n(AUB)[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]30[/math]
B. [math]29[/math]
C. [math]31[/math]
D. [math]35[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]31[/math]

Solution:
[math]n(A \cup B) =n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]=17+28-14=31[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1334 (ID: 400915)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি সেট [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]n(A)+n(B)=n(A \cup B)[/math] হবে যদি-

Options:
ক. নিচ্ছেদ সেট হয়
খ. [math]n(A)=n(B)[/math] থাকে
গ. [math]A \cap B \neq \varnothing[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.নিচ্ছেদ সেট হয়

Solution:
[math]n(A)+n(B)=n(A \cup B)[/math]
 দেওয়া আছেআবার পাই, [math]n(A \cup B)=n(A)+n(B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow n(A \cup B)=n(A \cup B)-n(A \cap B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})=0 \therefore(\mathrm{A} \cap \mathrm{B})=\phi[/math]
 অর্থাৎ, [math]A[/math]
 ও [math]B[/math]
 নিশ্চেদ সেট।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1335 (ID: 400866)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]1-\mathrm{x}^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}^{2} \leq 1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1336 (ID: 400867)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}, g(x)=x^{2}+1, h(x)=x+2[/math] হলে [math]\text { hogof(2) =? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]54[/math]
B. [math]92[/math]
C. [math]113[/math]
D. [math]67[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]67[/math]

Solution:
[math]h(g(f(2)))=h(g(8))=h(65)=67[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x-1}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}+\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x-1 
eq 0 \Rightarrow x 
eq 1 \quad \therefore D_{f}=\mathbb{R}-\{1\}[/math]

Question #1338 (ID: 400869)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f: x \rightarrow x+3[/math] এবং [math]g: x \rightarrow x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হয়, তবে [math]g f(2)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]44[/math]
B. [math]22[/math]
C. [math]55[/math]
D. [math]66[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]44[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(f(2))=g(2+3)=g(5)=5^{2}+3.5+4=44[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1339 (ID: 400870)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{4} 3 y-2 \log _{4} x=1[/math] হলে [math]y[/math] কে [math]x[/math] এর আকারে প্রকাশ কোনটি হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{3 x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3 x^{2}}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3} x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{4} 3 y[/math]
 [math]=1+2 \log _{4} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4^{1+2 \log _{4} x}[/math]
 [math]=3 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{44^{\log _{4} x^{2}}}{3}[/math]
 [math]=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore y[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 x^{2}}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1340 (ID: 400871)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}}[/math] হলে [math]f(a+1)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]e^{a+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} ; f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1^{32}}=e[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1341 (ID: 400872)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A = {1,2,3,4}[/math] এবং [math]B = {6,7,8}[/math] এই সেটদ্বয়কে কী বলে?

Options:
ক. উপসেট
খ. পূরক সেট
গ. সার্বিক
ঘ. নিচ্ছেদ সেট


Correct Answer: D.নিচ্ছেদ সেট

Solution:
[math]A \cap B=\{1,2,3,4\} \cap\{6,7,8\}[/math]
 [math]=\phi=\{\}=[/math]
 নিচ্ছেদ সেট

Explanation:

Question #1342 (ID: 400873)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\{7,9,\{1,2\}\}[/math] সেটের সূচক সেটের উপাদান সংখ্যা কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]8[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 সূচক সেটের উপাদান সংখ্যা = [math]2^{3}=8[/math]

Question #1343 (ID: 400874)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ফাংশন [math]f: R \rightarrow R[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{4}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, ফাংশন কী হবে?

Options:
ক. এক-এক
খ. এক-এক ও সার্বিক
গ. ধ্রুব
ঘ. ধ্রুব


Correct Answer: C.ধ্রুব

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{4}+1 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[4]{x-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 এর যেকোনো একটি মানের জন্য [math]4[/math]
টি ভিন্ন মান পাওয়া যায়। [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1344 (ID: 400875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math](1, 1)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{R}-\{1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math][-1,1][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]1-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-1,1][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-1,1][/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
এবং [math]x= \pm 1[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-( \pm 1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1-1}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1345 (ID: 400876)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1346 (ID: 400877)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1347 (ID: 400878)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5} \Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3 \times \frac{1}{3}+4}{\frac{1}{3}-5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1348 (ID: 400879)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1349 (ID: 400880)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math](x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}}{1+\frac{1}{\frac{1}{2}}}=\frac{3-1}{1+2}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1350 (ID: 400881)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=|2 x-6|[/math] ফাংশনটিতে নিম্নোক্ত কোন শর্ত [math]f(x)> 2x[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x<3[/math]
খ. [math]x>3[/math]
গ. [math]x<1.5[/math]
ঘ. [math]x>1.5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x<1.5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)>2 x \Rightarrow|2 x-6|>2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-(2 x-6)>2 x \Rightarrow 4 x2 x \Rightarrow-6>0[/math]
 যা অসম্ভব।

Explanation:

Question #1351 (ID: 400882)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(a+1)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{32}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a}+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{(x-a)^{32}} \Rightarrow f(a+1)=e^{(a+1-a)^{32}}=e^{1}=e[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1352 (ID: 400883)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+5}{3}[/math] এবং [math](x)=c x+d[/math] হলে, cওd এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3,-5[/math]
খ. [math]3, 5[/math]
গ. [math]-3, -5[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3, 6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3,-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+5}{3} \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=3 x-5[/math]
দেওয়া আছে, [math]f^{-1}(x)=c x+d \Rightarrow c=3, d=-5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1353 (ID: 400884)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(6)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\frac{x+6}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(6)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6+6}{3}=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1354 (ID: 400885)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-2[/math] হলে, [math](gof)(-5)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-43[/math]
খ. [math]43[/math]
গ. [math]167[/math]
ঘ. [math]-167[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]167[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{g} \circ \mathrm{f})(-5)=\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(-5))=\mathrm{g}(-10-3) \\=\mathrm{g}(-13)=(-13)^{2}-2=169-2=167\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1355 (ID: 400886)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][3,+\infty)[/math]
খ. [math][-3,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty,-3][/math]
ঘ. [math][-3,0][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math][-3,3][/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-9 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-3,3][/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-3, 3][/math]
এবং রেঞ্জ [math]=\{y \in R: 0 \leq y \leq 3\}=[0,3][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1356 (ID: 400887)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq-4[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]4-x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x-4 \leq 0 \therefore x \leq 4[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1359 (ID: 400890)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ-

Options:
ক. [math]R, f(x) \leq 1[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{3\}, R-\{6\}[/math]
গ. [math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\{2\}, R-\{0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R,-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 ফাংশনটি x এর সকল মানের জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত বলে ডোমেন = [math]= R[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]-2 \leq \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1360 (ID: 400891)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R} ;[/math] [math]g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R},[/math] [math]h: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R},[/math] [math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1} x, g(y)=\sin y[/math] এবং [math]h(z)=\frac{1-z}{1+z}[/math] হলে [math]g\left[\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right][/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1-\sqrt{3}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1+\sqrt{3}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(h\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\frac{1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}}{1+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{\sqrt{3}+1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=15^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{g}\left[\text { foh }\left(\tan 30^{\circ}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}\left(15^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sin 15^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1361 (ID: 400892)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 \tan x[/math] ফাংশনটির পর্যায় কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pi[/math]
গ. [math]2 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
f(x) = 2tan(x) ফাংশনের পর্যায় π, কারণ এটি মূলত গুণফলকৃত ট্যাঙ্গেন্ট ফাংশন এবং গুণফল ফাংশনের পর্যায় মূল ফাংশনের পর্যায়ের সমান।

Explanation:

Question #1363 (ID: 400894)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]e^{y}=x^{x}[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]y[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R-\{0\}[/math]
গ. [math]\{x: x \leq 0\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{x: x \geq 0\}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\{x: x>0\}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\{x: x>0\}[/math]

Solution:
কোন একটি ফাংশনে x এর value হিসেবে যা যা input দেওয়া সম্ভব, তা-ই ডোমেন ।Solve: [math]e^{y}=x^{x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\ln e^{y}=\ln x^{x} \\y \ln e=x \ln x \\y=x \ln x\end{array}[/math]
এখানে, X কে ধনাত্মক হতে হবে।অর্থাৎ, ডোমেন = [math]\{x \in R: x>0\}[/math]


Explanation:
log এর ভিত্তির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত :i) ভিত্তি > 0 হতে হবেii) ভিত্তি = 1log বা In এর সাথের রাশির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত:log এর সাথের রাশিটিকেও 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে। log এর ভিত্তি e হলে তাকে In দ্বারা প্রকাশ করা হয়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1364 (ID: 400895)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{100-x^{2}}+\log _{(2-x)} \sqrt{x+12}[/math]- কোন সেটে সংজ্ঞায়িত?

Options:
A. (0,3)
B. (-12,0)
C. (0,10)
D. (-10,10)
E. (-10,2)


Correct Answer: E. (-10,2)

Solution:
এখানে, [math]100-x^{2} \geq 0 \Rightarrow-10 \leq x \leq 10[/math]
 এবং [math]2-x>0 \Rightarrow x0 \Rightarrow x>-12[/math]
 সুতরাং ডোমেন: [math][-10,10] \cap(-\infty, 2) \cap(-12, \infty) \equiv[-10,2][/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ f(x) ফাংশনটি কোন সেটে সংজ্ঞায়িত কথাটি দ্বারা বুঝাচ্ছে, ফাংশনটিতে x এর কোন কোন value ইনপুট দেয়া সম্ভব। অর্থাৎ ফাংশনটির ডোমেন যা, তা-ই হচ্ছে প্রদত্ত প্রশ্নটির সমাধান ।[math]\sqrt{ }[/math] চিহ্নের ভিতরের মানকে সবসময় ধনাত্মক বা শূণ্যের সমান হতে হয়, যদি কোনো ফাংশনকে সংজ্ঞায়িত হতে হয়। আবার log এর ভিত্তিকেও সবসময় ধনাত্মক হতে হয় এবং একইসাথে ভিত্তি কখনো 1 এর সমান হতে পারে না। এই শর্তগুলো ব্যবহার করেই প্রশ্নটি সমাধান করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1365 (ID: 400838)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2004-2005, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{|x|}[/math] ফাংশনের বিস্তার কত?

Options:
ক. [math][-1,1][/math]
খ. [math]{-1,1}[/math]
গ. [math][0,)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{-1,1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|x|=x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1[/math]
আবার, [math]x < 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]|-x|=-x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{-x}{|-x|}=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর বিস্তার {-1, 1}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1366 (ID: 400839)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-3 x ;-6 \leq x \leq 6[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
খ. [math]-18 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
গ. [math]18 \leq y \leq 54[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4 \leq y \leq 28[/math]
ঙ. [math]-2


Correct Answer: E.[math]-2

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-3 x[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]-6≤x≤6[/math]
 এর মধ্যে, [math]x = 0[/math]
 বসালে,[math]\begin{array}{l}f(0)=0-0=0, f(-6)=36+18=54 \\f(6)=36-18=18, f(2)=4-6=-2 \\f(1)=1-3=-2 \\\therefore-2

Explanation:

Question #1367 (ID: 400840)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{4 x-13}{x-5}[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]R[/math]
খ. [math]R-{5}[/math]
গ. [math]R-{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R − {6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]R-{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{4 x-13}{x-5}=4 \Rightarrow-13=-20[/math]
 যা সম্ভব নয়[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= R - {5}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R-{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1368 (ID: 400841)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x+4}[/math] ফাংশনটির Domain Range কত?

Options:
A. [math]R[/math]
B. [math]x>4[/math]
C. [math]x<4[/math]
D. [math]x \geq-4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x \geq-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+4 \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \geq-4[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ x = -4 হলে,[math]f(x) = 0 \ যখন, x > -4, f(x)>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ = [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1369 (ID: 400842)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x} \text {}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)+g(x)[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
B. [math][1,+\infty)[/math]
C. [math](0,1][/math]
D. [math][0,1][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}}[/math]
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x ≥ 0[/math]
 অথবা[math]1-x \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-1 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [0, 1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
