Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 1)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন[math]1-x \geq 1 \Rightarrow-x \geq 1-1 \Rightarrow-x \geq 0 \therefore x \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(-\infty, 0][/math]

Question #1372 (ID: 400845)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-|x+1|+2[/math] ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. সর্বোচ্চ মান 1
খ. সর্বনিম্ন মান 1
গ. সর্বোচ্চ মান 2
ঘ. সর্বনিম্ন মান


Correct Answer: C.সর্বোচ্চ মান 2

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-|x+1|+2[/math]
 যখন [math]x=-1[/math]
 [math]f(x)=-t-1+1 \mid+2=2[/math]
এছাড়া x-এর অন্য মানের জন্য [math]f(x) <2[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:

Question #1373 (ID: 400846)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1
গ. [math]0 \leq x<1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x<0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন, [math]1-x^{2}>0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-1<0 \Rightarrow x^{2}<1 \Rightarrow|x|<1 \Rightarrow-1[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটির ডোমেন [math]=-1 [math]=[1, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1374 (ID: 400847)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+5}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন-

Options:
ক. [math][0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math][2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+5}=\sqrt{x^{2}-2 x+1+4}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+4}[/math]
 যা [math]x[/math]
 এর যেকোনো বাস্তব মানের জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 ধনাত্মক হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}=(-\infty, \infty)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1375 (ID: 400848)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]=\mathrm{R}=(-\infty, \infty)[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. [math][-1,1][/math]
B. [math](-1.1)[/math]
C. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]
D. [math]R[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{-1,1\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x>0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{x}=1, x<0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\frac{-x}{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ [math]=\{-1,1\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1376 (ID: 400849)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } A=R-\{3\}, B=R-\{1\}[/math] [math]\text { and a function } f:[/math] [math]A \rightarrow B \text { is defined by } f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3} \text {. What is the value of }[/math] [math]f^{-1}(0) ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{f}^{-1}(0)=\mathrm{z},[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{z})=0[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } f(\mathrm{z})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{z}-2}{\mathrm{z}+3}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{z}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1377 (ID: 400850)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(-x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(x+1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1378 (ID: 400851)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If three roots of } f(x)=0[/math] [math]\text { are } 1,-1,2[/math] [math]\text { the roots of } f(2 x)[/math] [math]=0 \text { are- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{2},-1[/math]
C. [math]2,-2,4[/math]
D. [math]0,1,-2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=(x-1)[/math]
 [math](x+1)(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(2 x)=(2 x-1)[/math]
 [math](2 x+1)(2 x-2)[/math]
 [math]f(2 x)=0 ;(2 x-1)[/math]
 [math](2 x+1)(2 x-2)[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{2}, 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1379 (ID: 400852)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{(2-x)}(2 x+1)(3-x)>2[/math] এর ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math]
খ. [math](-1 / 2,2)[/math]
গ. [math](-1 / 2,1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1 / 2,3)[/math]
ঙ. [math](-1 / 2,1) \cup(1,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](-1 / 2,2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{(2-x)}(2 x+1)(3-x)>2 \ldots \text { (i) }[/math]
এর [math]\text { base }(2-x)>0 \therefore x(2-x) \Rightarrow \frac{(2 x+1)(3-x)}{(2-x)^{2}}>0 \ldots \text { (iii) }[/math]
(ii) সত্য হবে যদি [math](2x + 1 )[/math]
 ও [math]( 3 – x)[/math]
 যদি উভয়ে ধনাত্মক বা উভয়ে ঋণাত্মক ।[math]\therefore\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 3\right)[/math]
 হলে (iii) সত্য হবে । কিন্তু (ii) হতে [math]x<2 \therefore[/math]
 সঠিক উত্তর [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, 2\right)[/math]


Explanation:
log এর ভিত্তির ক্ষেত্রে শর্ত:i) ভিত্তি > 0 হতে হবেii) ভিত্তি [math]\neq[/math]
 হতে হবেlog এর সাথের রাশির ক্ষেত্রে শর্তঃlog এর সাথের রাশিটিকেও 0 এর চেয়ে বড় হতে হবে।[math]\\ \ \\[/math]
এ প্রশ্নের Solve এ প্রথমে ভিত্তি (2 - x ) কে ধনাত্মক ধরে পাওয়া গেছে x -\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এবং x -\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এ এবং x 
[বিগত কয়েক বছর ধরে SUST এর ভর্তি পরীক্ষায় ফাংশন অধ্যায় থেকে শুধুমাত্র Logarithmic Function এর ডোমেন নির্ণয় অংশ থেকেই প্রশ্ন আসতেছে]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1380 (ID: 400853)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
A. [math](-1,0)[/math]
B. [math][-1,0][/math]
C. [math](-0.5,0)[/math]
D. [math][0,1][/math]
E. [math][-0.5,0][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0,1][/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)\\\therefore 2 \cos x \geq 0[/math]
আবার, [math]y=\cos \left(\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{1-2 \cos 2 x}\right)=\sqrt{1-2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1-2 \cos 2 x \geq 0 \\\Rightarrow 2 \cos 2 x \leq 1[/math]
 যখন [math]2 \cos 2 x=1, \\y_{\min }=0 \\2 \cos 2 x=0,\\ y_{\max }=1[/math]


Explanation:
[math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}\right)[/math]
 ফাংশনটিতে [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান কখনো ঋণাত্মক হওয়া সম্ভব না। তাই [math]\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান পেতে হলে [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হতে পারবে 1 এবং সর্বনিম্ন হতে পারবে 0।যদি [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান 1 হয়, তবে [math]y=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{2 \cos 2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} 1\right)=\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\\ \Rightarrow y_{\min }=0[/math]
আবার যদি [math]\sqrt{2 \cos 2 x}[/math]
 এর মান 0 হয়, তবে y এর মান হবে সর্বোচ্চ।[math]\therefore y_{\max }=\cos \left(\sin ^{-1} 0\right)=\cos 0=1[/math]
.:. y এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হতে পারবে 1 এবং সর্বনিম্ন 0ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ হবে 0 থেকে শুরু করে 1 পর্যন্ত সকল মান অর্থাৎ [0, 1]

Question #1381 (ID: 400854)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}+1=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(2)=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3-\frac{1}{2 x}}{1+\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / 3[/math]
B. [math]3 / 2[/math]
C. [math]-3 / 2[/math]
D. [math]5 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{3-1}{1+2}=2 / 3[/math]

ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]8[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]

Question #1384 (ID: 400857)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{9-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন এবং রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [0, 3] এবং [0,3]
খ. [−3,3] এবং [0, 3]
গ. (3,3) এবং (0,3)
ঘ. (-3, 3] এবং [ 0 – 3 )


Correct Answer: B.[−3,3] এবং [0, 3]

Solution:
[math]9-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 \leq x \leq 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore D_{f}=[-3,3] R_{f}=[0,3][/math]


Explanation:

Question #1385 (ID: 400858)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হ্য,তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x ; f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}-x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয় ,তবে [math]f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)+4}{\frac{1}{3} 5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x}[/math] এর ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}[/math]
খ. [math]x \geq-4[/math]
গ. [math]x \leq 4[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{4\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x \leq 4[/math]

Solution:
[math]4-x \geq 0 \Rightarrow x \leq 4[/math]

Question #1388 (ID: 400861)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \cos \mathrm{x}[/math] রেঞ্জ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1 \leq f(x) \leq 1[/math]
B. [math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
C. [math]0 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]
D. [math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
 হলে, রেঞ্জ [math]\rightarrow-1 \leq f(x) \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=2 \cos x[/math]
 হলে, রেঞ্জ [math]\rightarrow-2 \leq f(x) \leq 2[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]0 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]; 1-\mathrm{x}^{2} \geq 0 \therefore \mathrm{x}^{2} \leq 1 \quad \therefore-1 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq 1[/math]

[math]f(x)=\frac{x+5}{3}[/math] এবং [math]f^{-1}(x)=c x+d[/math] হলে c ও d এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3,-5[/math]
B. [math]3,5[/math]
C. [math]-3,-5[/math]
D. [math]-3,5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3,-5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=3 x-5 \therefore c=3, d=-5[/math]

Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R} ; f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog(4) }[/math] এবং [math]\text { gof }(-3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4225,720[/math]
B. [math]4020,725[/math]
C. [math]4120,730[/math]
D. [math]4225,730[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4225,730[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { fog }(4)=\left(4^{3}+1\right)^{2}=4225 ;[/math]
 [math]\text { gof }(-3)=(-3)^{6}+1=730[/math]

Question #1392 (ID: 400865)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ফাংশন [math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=x^{4}+1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে, ফাংশনটি কি হবে?

Options:
ক. এক-এক
খ. এক-এক ও সার্বিক
গ. এক-এক নয়
ঘ. ধ্রুব


Correct Answer: C.এক-এক নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{4}+1 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[4]{x-1}[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে, যখন [math]x-1 \geq 0[/math]
 হয়, x এর যে কোনো একটি মানের জন্য 4টি ভিন্ন মান পাওয়া যায়।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি এক-এক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1393 (ID: 400776)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}: \mathbf{R} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হলে [math]f^{-1}(-8,8)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\{-4,4\}[/math]
B. [math]\{-3,3\}[/math]
C. [math]\{-2,2\}[/math]
D. [math]\{-1,1\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\{-3,3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]x=-8, f^{-1}(-8)=\sqrt{-7}= \pm 7 i, \text { But } f: R \rightarrow R[/math]
 [math]x = -8[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(-8)[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য নয়।আবার, [math]f^{-1}(8)=\sqrt{9}= \pm 3 \therefore f^{-1}(-8,8)=\{-3,3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1394 (ID: 400777)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S=\left\{x: x^{2}-5 x+6=0\right\}[/math] এবং [math]T=\left\{x: x^{2}-11 x+24=0\right\}[/math] হলে, [math]s \cap T[/math] এবং [math]T - S[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]\{2,3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
B. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{2\}[/math]
C. [math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]
D. [math]\{8\}[/math] এবং [math]\{3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\{3\}[/math] এবং [math]\{8\}[/math]

Solution:
S এর জন্য , [math]x^{2}-5 x+6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,3[/math]
 [math]\therefore S=\{2,3\}[/math]
আবার T এর জন্য, [math]x^{2}-11 x+24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-8)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=3,8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{S} \cap \mathrm{T}[/math]
 [math]=\{2,3\} \cap\{3,8\}[/math]
 [math]=\{3\}[/math]
এবং [math]\mathrm{T}-\mathrm{S}[/math]
 [math]=\{3,8\}-\{2,3\}[/math]
 [math]=\{8\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1395 (ID: 400778)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}-1[/math] g(f(3)) এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]24[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{f}(3))[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(2 \times 3-1)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{g}(5)[/math]
 [math]=5^{2}-1[/math]
 [math]=25-1=24[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1396 (ID: 400779)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\log \sqrt{x^{2}-49}[/math] ফাংশন এর ডোমেন কোনটি? যেখানে x একটি ধনাত্মক সংখ্যা।

Options:
ক. [math][7, \infty][/math]
খ. [math](7, \infty)[/math]
গ. [math][49,0][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 7][/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math](7, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\log \sqrt{x^{2}-49}[/math]
 ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে ।যখন [math]x^{2}-49>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}>49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|^{2}>49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x|>7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x>7[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = [math](7,∞)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1397 (ID: 400780)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log \sin x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 x \cot x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\cos x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\log \sin x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}} \times \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1398 (ID: 400781)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2} e^{-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2} e^{x}[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{e^{-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{-x}}} \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{-x}}} \times\left(-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2} e^{-\frac{x}{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1400 (ID: 400783)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2, g(x)=2 x+5[/math] হলে, [math](\mathrm{gof})(-2)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-11[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(-2)=-8[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{gol}(-2)=g(-8)=-16+5=-11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1401 (ID: 400784)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x \in \mathbb{R}[/math] এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math] হলে, [math]f o g^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{g(x)-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore g^{-1}(x)=\frac{x-2}{3} ;[/math]
 [math]g^{-1}(2)=0 ; f(0)=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1402 (ID: 400785)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{7}+6[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt[7]{x-6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt[7]{x^{7}+6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{7}-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+6[/math]
 [math]=x^{7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{y+6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt[7]{x+6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1403 (ID: 400786)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]S[/math] ও [math]T[/math] যে কোনো দুইটি সেট এবং [math]S^{c}[/math] হলো S এর পুরক সেট। [math]\mathbf{T}-\mathbf{S}^{\mathrm{c}}[/math] এর মান কতা

Options:
ক. [math]S \cup T^{c}[/math]
খ. [math]S \cap T[/math]
গ. [math]S^{c}-T[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{S}^{\mathrm{c}} \cap \mathrm{T}^{\mathfrak{c}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]S \cap T[/math]

Solution:
[math]T-S^{c}=T \cap\left(S^{c}\right)^{c}=T \cap S=S \cap T[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1404 (ID: 400787)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সেট [math]A=\{1,2,3,5,7,8\}[/math] এবং [math]B=\{2,4,5,6,7,10\}[/math] হলে, [math](A-B) \cup(B-A)=?[/math]

Options:
A. { [math]{1, 3, 7, 8}[/math]}
B. { [math]{1, 4, 6, 10}[/math]}
C. { [math]1, 2, 5, 8[/math]}
D. { [math]{1, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10}[/math]}


Correct Answer: D.{ [math]{1, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10}[/math]}

Solution:
[math]A-B=\{1,3,8\}[/math]
 এবং [math]B-A=\{4,6,10\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(A-B) \cup(B-A)=\{1,3,4,6,8,10\}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1405 (ID: 400788)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x+1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
গ. [math]2 f(x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
 [math]f(-x)=(-x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(-x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]f(x+1)=(x+1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-(x+1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+2 x+1-x-1[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+x=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1406 (ID: 400789)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{13}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3 x+4}{x-5} \Rightarrow f\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=\frac{3 \times \frac{1}{3}+4}{\frac{1}{3}-5}=-\frac{15}{14}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1407 (ID: 400790)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}3 x-1, & x>3 \\x^{2}-2, & -2 \leq x \leq 3\end{array}\right.[/math] হলে, [math]f(6)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]12[/math]
B. [math]11[/math]
C. [math]17[/math]
D. [math]34[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=6>3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=3 \mathrm{x}-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(6)=3 \times 6-1=1^{17}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1408 (ID: 400791)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})=\mathbf{e}^{\mathbf{x}}[/math] হলে, এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]Inx[/math]
B. [math]e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]\ln \frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]logx[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]Inx[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{x} \Rightarrow y=e^{x} \Rightarrow x=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1409 (ID: 400792)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f: R-\{3\} \rightarrow R-\{1\}[/math] ফাংশনটি [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়, তবে [math]r^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=f^{-1}(y)[/math]
 [math]f(x)=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x-2}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x-3 y[/math]
 [math]=x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(y-1)[/math]
 [math]=3 y-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{3 y-2}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x-2}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \cdot \frac{1}{2}-2}{\frac{1}{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3-4}{1-2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1410 (ID: 400793)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x-1)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)[/math]
গ. [math]f(-x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]f(-x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=(x-1)^{2}+(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=(x-1)(x-1+1)[/math]
 [math]=x(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}-x[/math]
আবার, [math]f(-x)=x^{2}-x \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x-1)=f(-x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1411 (ID: 400794)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2, g(x)=2 x+5[/math] হলে [math](g o f)(-2)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-11[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-6-2=-8[/math]
এখন, [math](g \circ f)(-2)[/math]
 [math]=g(f(-2))[/math]
 [math]=g(-8)=2(-8)+5[/math]
 [math]=-11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1412 (ID: 400795)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{x} \in \mathbb{R}[/math] এর জন্য [math]f(x)=2 x-1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math] হলে, [math]\left(f og^{-1}\right)(2)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=3 x+2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow g^{-1}(2)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(fog^{-1}\right)(2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f\left(g^{-1}(2)\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(0)=2 \times 0-1=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+4[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-1[/math] হলে, [math]g(f(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+7[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2}+3[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x^{2}+7[/math]

Solution:
[math]g\left(f(x)=g\left(x^{2}+4\right)=2\left(x^{2}+4\right)-1=2 x^{2}+7\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1414 (ID: 400797)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=0 \Leftrightarrow h(x)=1[/math] হলে, [math]g(h(0))[/math] ও [math]h(g(0))[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. 1 ও 0
B. 0 ও 1
C. 0 ও 0
D. 1 ও 1


Correct Answer: B.0 ও 1

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{h}(0)=\mathrm{g}(1)=0[/math]
 আবার, [math]\mathrm{h}(\mathrm{g}(0)=\mathrm{h}(0)=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1416 (ID: 400799)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] হলে [math](gof)(x)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}+2 x^{3}+1[/math]
C. [math]x^{6}+1[/math]
D. [math]4 x^{2}-6 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{6}+1[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(x)=g(f(x))=g\left(x^{2}\right)=\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1=x^{6}+1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1417 (ID: 400800)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1+2 x)[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ = R
খ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R: y ≤ 2}
গ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R: y ≥ 2}
ঘ. রেঞ্জ = {y ∈ R : y ≤1}


Correct Answer: A.রেঞ্জ = R

Solution:
[math]1+2 x>0 \Rightarrow 2 x>-1 \Rightarrow x>-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন, [math]D_{f}=\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \infty\right)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জে = R

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1418 (ID: 400801)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{2 x}-9=0$[math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}>0[/math]
 সর্বদা [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 \cdot \frac{3}{2}+9 \cdot \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1419 (ID: 400802)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[math]y=|x+3|[/math] ফাংশনটির রেঞ্জ কত?

ক. [math][3, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math][0,3][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 3)[/math]
ঘ. [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][0, \infty)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন = R এবং রেঞ্জ = [math][0, \infty)[/math]

Question #1421 (ID: 400804)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A, B \subset R, B=R-\left\{\frac{1}{3}\right\}, g: A \rightarrow B, g(x)=\frac{x-5}{3 x+1}[/math] এবং [math]h(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=\frac{x^{2}-3}{x-\sqrt{3}}[/math] ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ কত?

Options:
A. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{5}\}[/math]
B. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2\}[/math]
C. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{\sqrt{3}\}[/math]
D. রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.রেঞ্জ [math]f=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x^{n}-a^{n}}{x-a}[/math]
 আকৃতি ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে,[math]D_{f}=R-\{a\}, R_{f}=R-\left\{n a^{n-1}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=\frac{x^{n}-3}{x-\sqrt{3}}=\frac{(x)^{2}-(\sqrt{3})^{2}}{x-\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে,[math]r=R-\{a\}=R-\{\sqrt{3}\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=R-\left\{n a^{n-1}\right\} .[/math]
 [math]=R-\left\{2(\sqrt{3})^{2-1}\right\}=R-\{2 \sqrt{3}\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1422 (ID: 400805)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-3}{3 x-4}[/math] ফাংশনটির ডোমেন কত?

Options:
ক. রেঞ্জ [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{4}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]
গ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{3}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]3 x-4 
eq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]=R-\left\{\frac{4}{3}\right\}[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]\equiv R-\left\{\frac{2}{3}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:

[math]y=\left|x^{2}-3 x-10\right|[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math][0, \infty)[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0][/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left[\frac{3}{2}, \frac{49}{4}\right][/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=\mathrm{R}=(-\infty, \infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ = [math]=[0, \infty)[/math]

Question #1424 (ID: 400807)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (x-2)[/math] ) ফাংশনটির ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ হবে যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math](2, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]
গ. [math][2,2][/math] ও [math](2, \infty)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 2)[/math] ও [math](2, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2, \infty)[/math] ও [math]R[/math]

Solution:
ফাংশনটি সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন [math]x-2>0 \Rightarrow x>2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]=(2, \infty)[/math]
 এবং রেঞ্জ [math]= R[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1426 (ID: 400809)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, g: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math]\operatorname{gof}(2)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]15[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]19[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]19[/math]

Solution:
[math]g o f(2)=g(f(2))=g[/math]
 [math]\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=g(11)=2[/math]
 [math]\times 11-3=19[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1427 (ID: 400810)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] হলে, [math]\text { fog(2) }[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(2)=2^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\times 2+4=14[/math]
 [math]\therefore f o g(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f(14)=14+3[/math]
 [math]=17[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1428 (ID: 400811)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f[/math] একটি এক-এক বাস্তব ফাংশন এবং [math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]a[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]2+i \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
যেহেতু, f এক এক ফাংশন ।[math]\therefore \mathrm{a}^{2}+1=4 \mathrm{a} \quad \therefore \mathrm{a}^{2}-4 \mathrm{a}+1=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{a}=2 \pm \sqrt{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1429 (ID: 400812)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math] হলে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2y[/math]
খ. [math]2x+5[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 y-7}{2 y-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-7}{2\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{16 x-28-14 x+28}{2 x-4}}{\frac{8 x-14-8x+16}{2 x-4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1432 (ID: 400815)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেইন কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-\infty, 0][/math]
খ. [math](-\infty, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](-\infty, 1][/math]
ঘ. [math](-\infty, 1)[/math]
ঙ. [math][0, \infty)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](-\infty, 0][/math]

Solution:
Hints: x এর যেসব মানের জন্য কোনো ফাংশন সংজ্ঞায়িত, সেসব মান নিয়ে গঠিত সেটই হচ্ছে ঐ ফাংশনের ডোমেন।Solve: [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\sqrt{\ln (1-x)}[/math]
এখানে, [math]1-x \geq 1 \Rightarrow x \leq 0[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math](-\infty, 0 \ )[/math]
Ans. (A)

Explanation:
√ এর ভিতর কখনো ঋণাত্মক সংখ্যা বসতে পারে না। আর Inx-এ x এর মান যদি 0 থেকে 1 এর মাঝে হয় তবে Inx এর value আসবে ঋণাত্মক। যেমন In (0.5 ) এর মান – 0.693। তাছাড়া Inx-এ x এর মান 0 বা এর চেয়ে ছোটও হওয়া সম্ভব না। তাই এ প্রশ্নে In ( 1 − x ) এ (I - x ) এর value কে হতে হবে 1 থেকে বড় বা I এর সমান।[SUST-এ এটাইপের Logarithmic function এর ডোমেন নির্ণয়ের প্রশ্ন খুবই কমন একটি প্রশ্ন। বিগত কয়েক বছর ধরে প্রায় প্রতিবছরই এ ধরনের ফাংশনের ডোমেন নির্ণয়ের প্রশ্ন আসতেছে]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1433 (ID: 400816)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+5[/math] এর বিপরীত ফাংশন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt[3]{5+x}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{x-5}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{x+5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}+5 \Rightarrow x^{3}=y-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=(y-5)^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=\sqrt[3]{x-5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1434 (ID: 400817)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x-1}{x+1}[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{y+1}{y-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y+1}{y-1}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y-1}{y+1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x-1}{x+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y+y=x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y-x=-(y+1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{-(y+1)}{y-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=-\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1435 (ID: 400818)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] হলে, নিচের কোনটি সত্য ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \geq x[/math]
খ. [math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]
গ. [math]x \in \mathbb{R}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \leq 0.5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1 \leq x \leq 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{lll}f(x)=\sin (x) & (-\infty,+\infty) & {[-1,1]} \\f(x)=\cos (x) & (-\infty,+\infty) & {[-1,1]} \\f(x)=\tan (x) & \text { All real numbers except } \pi / 2+n^{*} \pi & (- \text { in },+\infty) \\f(x)=\sec (x) & \text { All real numbers except } \pi / 2+n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,-1] \cup[1,+\infty) \\f(x)=\csc (x) & \text { All real numbers except } n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,-1] \cup[1,+\infty) \\f(x)=\cot (x) & \text { All real numbers except } n^{*} \pi & (-\infty,+\infty)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1436 (ID: 400819)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \mathrm{g}: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}+3 \mathrm{x}+1[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x-3[/math] হলে, [math]\text { gof(2) }=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]15[/math]
C. [math]13[/math]
D. [math]19[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]19[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{gof}(2)=g\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+1\right)=g(11)[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 11-3=22-3=19[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1437 (ID: 400820)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] নিম্নের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3 x+2[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-2[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x-3[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 y=x+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 y-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(y)=(2 y-3)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{-1}(x)=2 x-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1438 (ID: 400821)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math] হলে [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math](3,-3)[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]\{3,-3\}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\{3,-3\}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=x^{2}-7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=y+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}= \pm \sqrt{y+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})= \pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})= \pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)= \pm \sqrt{2+7}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{9}= \pm 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=\{3,-3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1439 (ID: 400822)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
টেনজেন্ট ফাংশনের মৌলিক পর্যায় কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pi[/math]
গ. [math]2\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan \theta[/math]
 এবং [math]\cot \theta[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=\pi[/math]
 [math]\sin \theta, \cos \theta, \sec \theta, \operatorname{cosec} \theta[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=2 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1440 (ID: 400823)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math] হলে [math]f(y)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 y[/math]
খ. [math]2 x+5[/math]
গ. [math]x[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(y)=\frac{4 y-7}{2 y-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-7}{2\left(\frac{4 x-7}{2 x-4}\right)-4}=[/math]
 [math]\frac{\frac{16 x-28-14 x+28}{2 x-4}}{\frac{8 x-14-8 x+16}{2 x-4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

 এবং [math]\cot \theta[/math]
 এর মৌলিক পর্যায় [math]=\pi[/math]
 [math]\sin \theta, \cos \theta, \sec \theta, \operatorname{cosec} \theta[/math]

Question #1442 (ID: 400825)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f[/math] একটি এক-এক বাস্তব ফাংশন এবং [math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math] হয়, তবে a এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2+i \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2+\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f\left(a^{2}+1\right)=f(4 a)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+1=4 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-4 a+1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=\frac{4 \pm \sqrt{16-4}}{2.1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=\frac{4 \pm 2 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=2 \pm \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=2+\sqrt{3}, 2-\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1443 (ID: 400826)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{f}: \mathrm{R} \rightarrow \mathrm{R}[/math] কে [math]f(x)=e^{x-3}[/math] দ্বারা সংজ্ঞায়িত করা হলে [math]f^{-1}(e)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x-3} \Rightarrow x-3=\ln y \Rightarrow x=\ln y+3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow f^{-1}(y)=\ln y+3 \Rightarrow f^{-1}(x)=\ln x+3 \\\therefore f^{-1}(e)=\ln e+3=1+3=4 .\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1444 (ID: 400827)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = (x-2) (1-x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(f(3))[/math] এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]1 / 2[/math]
খ. [math]-12[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(3)[/math]
 [math]=(3-2)(1-3)[/math]
 [math]=1(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]
 [math]f(f(3))[/math]
 [math]=(-2-2)\{1-(-2)\}[/math]
 [math]=-4(1+2)=-12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1445 (ID: 400828)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{3}+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}[/math] হলে [math](fog)(3)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(x)=f(g(x))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\sqrt[3]{\frac{x-2}{3}}\right)^{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot \frac{x-2}{3}+3[/math]
 [math]=x-2+3=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { fog }(3)[/math]
 [math]=3+1=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1446 (ID: 400829)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation And Aerospace University, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{4-x^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনের ডোমেন ও রেঞ্জ যথাক্রমে-

Options:
ক. [math][-4, 4] ও [0, 2][/math]
খ. [math][-2, 2] ও [0, 4][/math]
গ. [math][-2, 2] 3 [0, ও 1][/math]
ঘ. [math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math][-2, 2] [0, 2][/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)[/math]
 সংজ্ঞায়িত হবে যখন,[math]4-x^{2} \geq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 \leq 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} \leq 4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|x| \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \leq x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ডোমেন [math]= [-2, 2][/math]
 [math]x = ± 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x) = 0 ⇒ x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x) = 2 \therefore[/math]
 রেঞ্জ [math]= [0, 2][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1447 (ID: 400830)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+3, g(x)=x^{2}+3 x+4[/math] 4 হলে [math]fog(2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]27[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-10[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](f \circ g)(2)[/math]
 [math]=f(g(2))[/math]
 [math]=f\left(2^{2}+3 \times 2+4\right)[/math]
 [math]=f(4+6+4)=f(14)[/math]
 [math]=14+3=17[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1448 (ID: 400831)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=3^{x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{f(x+3)}{f(x-1)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{f}(0)[/math]
B. [math]f(2)[/math]
C. [math]f(3)[/math]
D. [math]f(4)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f(4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{f(x+3)}{f(x-1)}=\frac{3^{x+3}}{3^{x-1}}=3^{x+3-x+1}=3^{4}[/math]
আবার, [math]f(4)=3^{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1449 (ID: 400832)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(x)[/math] নিম্নের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3x+2[/math]
খ. [math]3x-2[/math]
গ. [math]2x+2[/math]
ঘ. [math]2x-3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2x-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{3+x}{2} \therefore f^{-1}(x)=2 x-3[/math]

Question #1450 (ID: 400833)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(2)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math](3,-3)[/math]
ঘ. [math](3, -3)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](3,-3)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-7[/math]
ধরি, [math]y=x^{2}-7 \Rightarrow x^{2}=y+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{y})=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{y}+7}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{\mathrm{x}+7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=[/math]
 [math]\pm \sqrt{2+7}= \pm \sqrt{9}= \pm 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{-1}(2)=\{3,-3\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1451 (ID: 400834)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]f(f(x))[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-1}{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x+1}{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x}{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+1}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{f(x)+1}{f(x)-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x+1}{x-1}+1}{\frac{x+1}{x-1}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+1+x-1}{x+1-x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{2}=x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1452 (ID: 400835)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{n}[/math] হলে [math]f(g(x))=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln f(x)[/math]
B. [math]n f(x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{n} \ln x[/math]
D. [math]x^{n}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]n f(x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(g(x))=f\left(x^{n}\right)=\ln x^{n}=n \ln x=n f(x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1453 (ID: 400836)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=x^{3}+1[/math] এবং [math]h(x)=x+2[/math] হলে [math]hogof=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{6}+3[/math]
B. [math]x^{6}-3[/math]
C. [math]x^{8}+3[/math]
D. [math]x^{8}-3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x^{6}+3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { (ho go } f(x)=h(g(f(x)))[/math]
 [math]=h\left(g\left(x^{2}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]=h\left\{\left(x^{2}\right)^{3}+1\right\}[/math]
 [math]=h\left(x^{6}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]=x^{6}+1+2=x^{6}+3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1454 (ID: 400837)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]: R \rightarrow R, g: R \rightarrow R, f(x)=x^{2}+3 x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x+3[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 x+3[/math] হলে, [math]gof (1)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]20[/math]
B. [math]11[/math]
C. [math]40[/math]
D. [math]25[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]11[/math]

Solution:
[math](g \circ f)(1)=g(f(1))[/math]
 [math]=g\left(1^{2}+3 \times 1\right)[/math]
 [math]=g(4)=2 \times 4+3[/math]
 [math]=11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1455 (ID: 474316)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})=\frac{|\mathbf{x}|}{\mathbf{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]f(100)+f(-100)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{|x|}{x} \Rightarrow f(100)=\frac{|100|}{100}=\frac{100}{100}=1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \Rightarrow f(-100)=\frac{\vdash 100}{-100}=\frac{-(-100)}{-100}=-1 \\\therefore \mathrm{f}(100)+\mathrm{f}(-100)=1-1=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1456 (ID: 474317)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x^{2}-3 x & ; \quad x \geq 2 \\x+2 ; & x<2\end{array}\right.[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(2)+f(-2)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(2)=2^{2}-3.2[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(2)+\mathrm{f}(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2+0=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]In2[/math]
গ. [math]1+In2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x+\ln x \therefore f(1)=2.1+\ln (1)=2[/math]

D. [math]0[/math]

Question #1460 (ID: 401177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = 2x + lnx[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]f(1) =?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]In2[/math]
গ. [math]1+In2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x+\ln x \therefore f(1)=2.1+\ln (1)=2[/math]

Sub-Questions:
